column3: Niǥida moko jowooǥotaǥa Cristo me ǥodemaa , leeǥodi dinajigo me yeleotedoǥodomi . Odaa oko leeditibige maǥaǥa ǥodigo me ǥodeleotema ǥonioxoadipi .

Naǥa nipegi lalokegi judeutedi anodita me Páscoa . Jesus ja yowooǥodi naǥanipegi me noditedicogi niǥina iiǥo migo miniwataǥa Eliodi . Idioka limedi me yemaa niǥijo ane nepilidi , maleeǥinaaǥite digoina iiǥo , codaa me yemaa neǥepaaǥicota noko me yeleotetema .
Amiidi ica Aneotedoǥoji ane yelatetema icoatigilo cwareenta nicaaǥape ? Yelatetema niǥijo anowote loenataka ane beyagi odaa ja nigo miditaǥa nipodigi ane yadilo ane diǥicata niǥeladimigipi .
Iwaǥati Aneotedoǥoji micataǥa niǥina nionigi meyiwaǥadi eliodi , odaa jinaǥaleeǥawiite niǥijoa ǥadakataǥa ane beyagi anawii niǥijo maleedoǥowooǥotiteda Aneotedoǥoji .

Leeǥodi ijotawece oko aǥoyiwaǥadi Aneotedoǥoji , odaa jeǥeote me diǥicata ane yakadi me ika nibeyacaǥa , micataǥa daǥa dinigoetiniwace , daǥa niwilogojegipi . Aneotedoǥoji eotedibige me niwikodetediniwace inatawece oko .

Odaa ja jajipata ica ane dotaǥa liwigotigi niǥidiwa cwaatolo ewikaǥa , meeta , “ Itoatadiǥida goopa leyeema licawa loojedi mabaa onidateci noko , codaa noove goopatedi ‘ cevaada ’ aaǥaǥa licawa loojedi mabaa onidateci noko . Pida jinaǥa itineǥeni najidi , codaa viinyo adaǥaǥa abeyacaǥati ! ”
Adiniwikodenitibecetiwaji lodoe Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji , odaa jaǥadawacenitacedibige .

Leeǥodi jeǥeote lakatagi noko me iwi anigotediogi inatawece oko digoina iiǥo , codaa meote ane iǥenaǥa nige iwi anigotediogi niǥina oko . Odaa eote ibake Ǥoneleegiwa niǥijo ane ixipetedice mepaa iwi anigotiogi oko . Ikeetediogi inatawece oko mewi micota me ibake niǥijoa Ǥoneleegiwa me iwi anigotediogi niǥina oko , niǥijo neǥeote me yewiǥatace niǥijoa Ǥoneleegiwa . ”

Odaa niǥijoa iodaǥawadi joǥoyoetema lale , macataǥa naǥana lale inionigi-eliodi , pida boǥodatika lalepiǥigo moyoe . Odaa joǥonixotinece lacilo Jesus , codaa onixomeǥetedinigi ajo caapa ocaǥataǥa nolidigo-lawoǥo liciagi naǥana nicaapa inionigi-eliodi .

Enice jajoi niǥina wajekalodipi baǥalee awicijipi me nadonaǥatace , amaleeǥaǥa ica lionigipi , codaa amaleeǥaǥa odowediteloco epaa liǥeladi , amanagawini aǥica gaantokaaǥini leeǥodi ǥodaxakawa daǥa beyagi me dotaǥatibigoǥoji .

Leeditibige me iwaǥatitiwaji me idejo miniwataǥa Eiodi , codaa Eiodi miniwa meetaǥa . Nige daǥa iwaǥatakanitatiwaji leeǥodi niǥinoa yotaǥa , enice iwaǥatakani leeǥodi niǥijoa ǥodoxiceǥetedi ane jaote .
Odaa ja ma némaǥa codaa aneiticoace ja ma , oyaladiticogi midataǥa noledi libegi . Niǥida noledi libegi joaniǥidaaǥida niǥica eledi ǥodemaǥa ane diǥica liniogo .

Daǥaleetiǥidaaǥee daǥanagawini , idioka limedi me dawikode niǥijo maleekoka yoeteda Aneotedoǥoji niǥina iiǥo codaa niǥina natigide . Pida aniǥidaaǥee . Natigide , ja dinojogotedini icoa owidijedi nokododi , odaa ja dinikee digoina iiǥo onijoteci me dinikee me dinajigo me yeleo eotedibige me noǥa libeyaceǥeco oko .
Aneotedoǥoji eliodi me dinatitediogi niǥijo midiaaǥi midi nipodigi ane yadilo ane diǥicata niǥeladimigipi . Idiaaǥi niǥicoatigilo cwareenta nicaaǥape me doweditedeloco .
Enice , inioxoadipi , niǥina mateciǥitiwaji maniodi , codaa macipe viinyo me ǥadalakitibigetiwaji Ǥoniotagodi , adinaliitiwaji .

Odaa ja jinadi niǥijoa Waxacoco naǥaǥa yaaǥadi niǥijo naǥa seis lapadijegi ane noxoco naǥajo notaǥanaǥaxi . Odaa digawini ! Ijo natalalaǥa niǥina ane yoniciwadi , yatalale inatawece iiǥo . Aligeǥe ja nabidi macataǥa naǥana lipegeteǥe ane nabidi ane dinixotinigi ane dininya , codaa epenai jaǥaǥa ixagodi micoataǥa niǥinoa ǥodawodi .

Leeǥodi monakato Aneotedoǥoji , ijo iwaalepodi anodibatacege lionaǥa me newiǥatace , idaaǥida naǥa domaǥa nigo . Niǥijo eledi oko anidiaaǥidi niǥidi noiigi nawikodeeǥa me iteloco libaaǥadi laxakawepodi neǥepaaǥicota me nigo . Aǥoyemaa me beyagi modotaǥatibige Aneotedoǥoji oditaǥa dinikaticoace me diniwilotibigiwaji leeǥodi moyiwaǥadi Aneotedoǥoji meote me newiǥatace midioka limedi me idei Miniwataǥa , codaa meote ane daǥaxa mele lewiǥa .

Pida Paulo jeǥeetiogi niǥijoa iodaǥawadi , “ Niǥijoa ǥoniwinoǥododi odiiǥenatakatoǥowa metiǥodalaketibige lodoe eliodi oko naǥana nigotaǥa , pida aǥecoǥotace oiwi migica ǥobatiigi , igaataǥa ǥodiciagi romaanotedi . Pida aǥododigotoǥowa digo minoataǥa niǥinoa romaanotedi . Odaa joǥodiiǥenatakatoǥowa metiǥodokoletiwece niwiloǥonaǥaxi . Odaa natigide ja leedi metiǥodiiǥe me ǥododitice , me diǥica ane yowooǥodi . Pida ayakadi ! Leeditibige mijaaǥijo enagitibeci etiǥodikatice . ”

Mee Aneotedoǥoji , “ Emaani eledi oko digo aneni madinemaani . ” Niǥina oko nigeo niǥida niiǥenatakaneǥegi , odaa jeǥeote niǥijoa eletidi liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji ane iditedini Moisés , “ Jinaǥa ǥadoomatewa ane daǥa ǥadodawa . Jinaǥa domaǥa aijee . Jinoǥolice . Jinaǥa aniliitibige eledi oko . Jineǥemaani niǥina ane daǥa ǥanebi . ” Odaa niǥidiwa niiǥenatakaneǥeco codaa okanicodaaǥica eledi liiǥenatakaneǥegi Aneotedoǥoji liciagi niǥijo niiǥenatakaneǥegi anee , “ Lajo memaani eledi oko digo aneni madinemaani . ”
Inatawece niǥina oko anonibeotege lanokegi Cristo idioka limedi me diniwilegitema inoatawece ane beyagi , digo mijoataǥa Cristo me yapidi , aǥica gaantokaaǥidi libeyaceǥegi .
Igaataǥa emeǥeeta domaǥa jemaa Aneotedoǥoji liiǥenatakaneǥeco .
Ele midokee maniniitibecitiwaji leeǥodi mida anenitege Ǥoniotagodi . Ejitacaǥawatiwaji , aniniitibeci !
Odaa ja inawiilitetege me jiwi niǥica ane idotaǥaneǥe , odaa ja jinadi seete noledaǥaxiidi oolo .

Niǥijo Aneotedoǥoji neǥeote ligegitediogi ica noiigi me doǥoyakadi motota ane yoetetema me nipenaǥadi loiigi , amiidi ica aneetediogi Aneotedoǥoji ? Eetetece Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo ane doǥoyiwaǥaditeda .
Ijotawece niǥijo anenagitibeci maleediǥicatibige me janagi , niǥijo abeyaceǥegipi , codaa molicaǥaǥa . Pida niǥinoa waxacocoli aǥowatacotece lotaǥaneǥegi leeǥodi me iomaǥaǥa .

Niǥida makaamitiwaji anakaami niotagipi , leeditibige midioka limedi me iwaǥati ǥaniotagododi , codaa me eemiteetigi . Jinaǥa eemiteetigi inokina niǥina ǥaniotagododipi anele anoyowo niǥina aneletaǥadomitiwaji . Pida aaǥaǥa eemiteetigi niǥina ǥaniotagododipi ane abeyaceǥegipi .

Odaa joǥoniditiogi niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi anoyedia me niwitakaǥa modakapetege Estêvão , odaa niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi modi , “ Niǥida ǥoneleegiwa anotokotini beyagi me dotaǥatibige Aneotedoǥoji liǥeladi ane diiǥenatakate moyoe mepoka nebiteda , codaa eledi beyagi me dotaǥatibige lajoinaǥaneǥeco Moisés .

Aneotedoǥoji ja iigi ǥodaaleǥena , codaa najigotedoǥowa gela anejinaǥa me ǥodewiǥa . Niǥida moko niǥijo jotigide oko laxakawepodi Aneotedoǥoji , pida niǥina natigide Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeote moko lokaaǥetedipi leeǥodi Cristo . Odaa najigotedoǥowa ǥobakedi me jeloǥotaǥatibece anodaaǥee niǥina eledi oko moyakadi me lokaaǥetedipi Aneotedoǥoji .

Inioxoadipi , analakitibigetiwaji niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko , odaa awii digo mijotaǥa . Nawikodeeǥa leeǥodi moditece Aneotedoǥoji ane iiǥete , pida odinatitalo inoatawece ane lawikodico .
Odaa inatawece niǥina oko ane dipokotalo Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji me iwikode , jiǥiniaa aneote Ǥoniotagodi me yewiǥatace . ” ’ ”

Iditawece modi , “ Jiǥidaaǥee . Jiweniǥidenaǥa codaa joǥeeǥatalo Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji . Iniotagodeeǥatalo , codaa me jiweniǥidenaǥa leeǥodi minoa lixaketedi , yowooǥodi inoatawece , codaa minoa nimaweneǥeco , eliodi loniciwaǥa . Idioka limedi me daǥa diniigiteda . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee . ( Amém ) . ”

Jinoǥoleetibige makaami libinienigipi inokina niǥina manadini , diǥidioka limedi madinitecitibece , mabakeni ǥanadinaǥajetecidi , niǥilagi oolo , oǥoa domigetaǥa wetiǥa anida niwaló , oǥoa domigetaǥa ina madinixomitinigilo nowoodi libinienaǥa ane dakake loojedi .

Enice jinaǥa aniboliki meloǥotitedibece nibodicetedi anele aneetece Ǥoniotagodi , codaa jinaǥa anibolikitici me ee niwilogojegi leeǥodi me ee liotagi Ǥoniotagodi . Pida leeditibige me ǥadigomi mawikodeetema niǥinoa ǥodawikodico anenagi leeǥodi me jeloǥotaǥatedibece ǥobodicetedi anele , digo analeeǥeji me jawikode . Iniaaǥiniwa Aneotedoǥoji yajigotedaǥawa ǥadoniciwaǥa me ixomaǥateenitedijo niǥinoa ǥadawikodico midokee matiteti .
Odaa idiniomaǥaditaǥadomi leeǥodi niǥina anoniotici . Jao niǥida anejitaǥawa amaleeǥaǥa odiniomaǥaditaǥadomi makamokakaami me ǥanepilidi . Atiitiogi ǥadotaǥa me iomaǥatiticoace .
Enice anoleetice codaa oniciwaǥati anida makaamitaǥatiwaji , igaataǥa ja leedi me ma . Igaataǥa jowooǥodi ǥabaketedi aiǥenaǥa lodoe Aneotedoǥoji .
Odaa ijo eledi aanjo jaǥaǥa yadotice nibaxiawaanigi yadotinigilo inoatawece akiititedi , inoa ninyokotiidi libecoli , odaa inoatawece ane ninyokotiidi ja liciagi ǥodawodi .

Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo ja yomoketedoǥodomi ǥoligi miniǥa lodoe Aneotedoǥoji . Odaa natigide idioka limedi Aneotedoǥoji meletedoǥodomi leeǥodi me jinakatonaǥa . Odaa ǥodinitibece leeǥodi me inibeoonaǥatege me ǥodiweniǥide ǥodawanaǥaditetege Cristo .

Igaataǥa ele me jowooǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji me daǥa dibatetege niǥina oko ane loomatewa okanicodaaǥica eledi oko , codaa niǥina oko ane yowo inokina ane napioi , inaaǥina oko ane nocetema ane nebi eledi oko . Niǥina oko oceeǥegi liciagi niǥina oko ane daǥatalo niwicidi . Odaa jowooǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji me daǥa ikatediobece niǥidi oko me dakatiobece miniwataǥa , midioka limedi meite lodoe , oteǥexaaǥaǥa me Cristo lodoe , aneite lionigipi modibatege icoatawece Aneotedoǥoji ane laǥajeditetege .

Leeǥodi Abraão me nakato Aneotedoǥoji , odaa jeǥeyiwaǥadi niǥijo naǥa eniditeta . Odaa jiǥigo miditaǥa ica iiǥo Aneotedoǥoji ane ligegita me yajigote me nebi . Niǥica naǥa noditice ayowooǥodi niǥica ane diiticogi .
Jinaǥacipeta viinyo daǥa adinemakatiti , igaataǥa ǥadibeyacaǥatitiwaji . Pida ikani Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji me ǥadajacaǥati .

Eliodi oko odioteci niǥijoa liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco , odaa owo niǥinoa ane beyagi ǥodolaadi ane yemaa . Odaa leeǥodi mowo niǥinoa ane beyagi , odaa eliodi oko beyagi modotaǥatibige ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi anewi .
Odaa leeǥodi me yeleo Cristo , Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo anokinitece ǥodadeegi okotawece , judeutedi inaaǥina ane daǥa judeutedi , ja ǥodadeegita lodoe Aneotedoǥoji ane Ǥodiodi .

Pida niǥijo ane daǥa judeutedi anonakato Ǥoniotagodi , jiwakateenaǥatibige ǥodidie notaǥanaǥaxi me jeloǥotaǥatiogi ane ǥodowoogo . Jajoinaǥatece me doǥoyeligo niweenigi niǥina eledi oko anoilokotajeta niwigo , migetaǥa lawodi eijeeǥagi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa okanicodaaǥica eijeeǥagi anoiǥiwoola . Eleditace me daǥa noomatewa ane daǥa lodawa . ”

Odaa Pedro jeǥeeta Ananias , “ Igame leeǥodi madinikanitece Satanás me ǥadiiǥeni ? Jeǥeo manakeni minaaleni Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo me diǥijoatawece anajici niǥijoa dinyeelo lojetedi me aani ǥanipodigi .

Enice jinaǥalee ǥodiciagi nigaanigipawaanigi ane diǥicata loniciwaǥa catinedi niwatece , niǥinoa ebekadi oyalaketibigeloco , codaa niocodi ane yoniciwadi yadeegiticogi ane yemaa meyaticogi . Odaa niocodi ane yoniciwadi inaaǥinoa ebekadi oiciaceeketege niǥinoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ane deǥewiteda anoditece niǥinoa ǥoneleegiwadi anodoletibige moninaaletiniwace oko . Niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi oibake nimaweneǥeco mowote oko me eyamaǥaticoace , moika niǥijo niiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi anewi .

Aǥowooǥotitiwaji niǥina ane daǥa iǥenaǥatiwaji aǥodakatiwece niǥica Aneotedoǥoji ninioxadi ? Odaa jinaǥa adininaalenitiwaji ! Niǥijo ane loomatewa ane daǥa lodawa , niwicomaǥa , aǥolaǥatakanaǥaǥa , ǥoneleegiwa ane loomatewa eledi ǥoneleegiwa , iwaalo opitege eledi iwaalo , olicaǥaǥa , adodigomadadi , acipaǥaǥa , ina ane dotaǥatibige eledi , codaa me aijekaǥa , iditawece niǥidi aǥoyakadi modakatiwece liǥeladi ninioxadi Aneotedoǥoji .

Jinaǥa jikanaǥa me jatecoǥojoǥo me jilokaǥatege eletidi anonakato Ǥoniotagodi anee niǥina eledi oko , ane daǥa yatecoǥotibece . Pida joniciwaǥataǥa eledi oko , eneǥegi jaoǥate igaataǥa me jinataǥa ja nipegi niǥica noko nige dopitedijo Ǥoniotagodi .

Jinaǥawii ane beyagi ane yemaa ǥadaaleǥenali , pida awii micataǥa niǥina oko baanaǥa yeleo aǥalee yakadi meo ane beyagi . Enice jinaǥa ǥadoomatewa ane daǥa ǥadodawa . Jinaǥa domaǥa emaanitibige niǥina ane napioi , jinaǥawii , oteǥexaaǥaǥa owoo niǥina ane napioi ane ilidaǥaditigi ǥadoolatedi . Jineǥemaanitibige midioka limedi meliodi niǥina anakati , igaataǥa nigidaaǥeni ja daǥaxa maweniǥideni niǥica anakamaǥa emaani , odaa aǥalee oǥeetetalo Aneotedoǥoji .

Pida niǥida moko biǥida anejinaǥatege noko , odaa leeditibige me idinajacaǥataǥa . Niǥida moko nigidioka limedi me jinakatonaǥa Ǥoniotagodi , codaa me jemaanaǥa okanicodaaǥica oko , odaa idinowetaǥatema ǥodaxakawa , macataǥa aca oecaǥaxi elipogo iodaǥawa ane yolitege ninyaagi niǥina laxakawa naǥa domeǥeo anigota . Codaa nige inibeoonaǥatege me dopitedijo Ǥoniotagodi , ja idowetaǥateloco ǥodacilo me daǥa jowooǥa ane beyagi , micataǥa ica iodaǥawa lamakaladi ǥapileceǥe ane dowediteloco lacilo me diǥica ninyaagi .

Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji anajigotedoǥowa niwigo aneo moko ageleemagipi , pida najigotedoǥowa Liwigo aneo ǥodoniciwaǥa , codaa meo me jemaanaǥa eledi oko , codaa meo me idinajacaǥataǥatema niǥinoa lidaǥataka ǥodolaadi codaa me ǥodowooko .
Niǥina oko anee me yowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji , pida aǥeyiwaǥadi liiǥenatakaneǥeco , niǥini oko awitakegi , codaa niǥica anewi aǥica minitaǥa .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me jipokotaǥawatiwaji midokida ǥadowoogo , codaa madinemaanitiwaji oleetibige midokida aneni , codaa jipokotaǥawatiwaji mateciǥiteloco niǥica ane ǥadowoogo codaa niǥica anemaanitiwaji . Joaniǥidaaǥee nigawii niǥida anejitaǥawa , odaa eliodi me idinitibeci .
Odaa joǥodoletibige moniwilo Jesus , leeǥodi niǥijoa lotaǥa . Pida aǥica ane dibatalo , leeǥodi aniǥicota limedi me yeleo .
Ajoini mowo anele , nigepaa owidi niǥicoa libaketedi libinienaǥa , me liciagi niliicaǥajetecidi mowidi . Codaa ajoini me nigomaǥa moyawalace moyedia eledi oko .
Noǥoigidi , modita , “ Ajinadeegaǥatedaǥawa niǥidoa ǥoneleegiwa daaditiǥicata loenatagi ane beyagi ” .

Niǥina ane diletibige diǥida noko me daǥaxa mida ane jaoǥa , yotete niǥida noko me doǥetetalo Ǥoniotagodi . Codaa niǥina ane yeligo okanicodaaǥica niweenigi , niǥina naǥa yeligo , doǥetetalo Ǥoniotagodi , codaa diniotagodetalo Aneotedoǥoji leeǥodi midi ane yeligo . Odaa niǥina ane inoka yeligo ane ǥotanigijedi , aaǥaǥa doǥetetalo Ǥoniotagodi leeǥodi me diniotagodetalo Aneotedoǥoji midi ane yeligo .
Aniniitibeci leeǥodi manibeoonitibigege lanokegi Ǥoniotagodi . Adinatiitalo ǥadawikodico , codaa jiniǥikani motaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji .

Félix iiǥe ica jajeentegi ane nowienoǥodi Paulo mecoǥotace ikanawaanigitice micataǥa daaditaǥa niwilogojegi , codaa me ikatiobece niǥinoa lokaaǥetedipi Paulo modalita codaa moyadeegita ane yopotibige .

Niǥina oko anida lemaanaǥaneǥegitema eledi oko ixomaǥateetice ane beyagi anodigota , codaa eyiwaǥadi niǥina mini ane yotaǥaneǥe , codaa nibeotege midioka limedi mowo anele , codaa idioka limedi me dinatitalo lawikodico .

Maditaǥa lotaǥanaǥaxi Aneotedoǥoji diniditeloco , “ Ee ja jinakato Aneotedoǥoji , joaniǥidaa leeǥodi mejitece . ” Oko eledi jinakatonaǥa Ǥoniotagodi , ǥodiciagi niǥijo oko aneetece niǥinoa notaǥa . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi maǥaǥa ejinaǥatece Cristo .

Ǥonioxoadipi . Digawini ane jiladeenaǥataǥadici : Iiǥeni niǥina oko nigojigipi me nibaaǥa , oniciwaǥati niǥidi oko ane daǥadiaa oilidaǥadi modiotece Ǥoniotagodi , axawani niǥidi oko ane diǥica loniciwaǥa modinajacaǥaditema lakataǥa ane beyagi , codaa adinatiitiogi iditawece niǥidi oko .

Odaa ijo eledi aanjo ja yadotice niǥijo aaǥaǥa nibaxiawaanigi , yadoteloco ajo nibaanco ane nicote niǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide . Odaa icatawece niǥica ane ninioxadi ane iiǥe , ja nexocaǥa . Odaa niǥidi oko joǥoyowagi locexodi leeǥodi anoilee .

Jemaa Aneotedoǥoji meote mele laaleǥenali , codaa me iwikode , inatawece niǥina anodioteci niǥinoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anele , codaa minatawece judeutedi anonakato Ǥoniotagodi , odaa beǥewi me loiigi Israel .

Apolo yowooǥodi owidi niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anoditece Ǥoniotagodi , codaa eliodi me yoniciwadi niǥina naǥa datematika codaa me diiǥaxinaǥatece Jesus . Idioka limedi me diiǥaxinaǥatece anewi . Pida idoka yowooǥodi ane leeǥodi João me nilegetiniwace oko .
Ee jiǥidaaǥee me jowo . Niganioditiwaji , oǥoa domigacipe , oǥoa domigawii okanicodaaǥica , idioka limedi moleetibige oko modoǥetetalo Aneotedoǥoji .

Pida Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji ane yajigotedaǥawatiwaji idei catiwedi ǥadaaleǥenali , odaa aleeditibige eledi oko daǥa ǥadiiǥaxinitiwaji , igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo ǥadiiǥaxinitecetiwaji inoatawece ane leeditibige mowooǥoti . Ǥadiiǥaxinitece anewi , codaa aǥodinaale . Enice oleetibige midioka limedi madinexocaǥatitege , niǥijo anodaaǥee me ǥadiiǥaxinitetiwaji .

Igaataǥa jiǥidaaǥee niǥina ǥodolaadi me diǥicata ǥodiwigo miditaǥa , odaa jeǥemeǥegi . Jiǥidaǥaǥa ejinaǥa nige daǥa jaoǥa ane niiǥetedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji me jikeenaǥa mewi mejiwaǥatakanaǥa , odaa ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi ja micataǥa niǥina émeǥegi .
Igaanaǥa nigotini Paulo me dotaǥa , odaa ja dibata ijo paon , odaa ja diniotagodetalo Aneotedoǥoji lodoe iditawece niǥijo oko . Naǥa yawalace ijo paon , odaa ja yeligo .

Pida jaoǥa ǥodidietibige me jajoinaǥa me doǥoyeligo niǥina niweenigi niǥina eledi oko anoiboota niwigo , aneeteta Aneotedoǥoji me daǥa yakadi me jelicaǥa . Codaa ele me jajoinaǥatece me doǥoyeligo eijeeǥagi anoiǥiwoola oteǥexaaǥaǥa lawodi eijeeǥagi , codaa me daǥa noomatewa niǥinoa ane daǥa lodawadi .

Odaa Paulo jeǥeeta Ananias , “ Aneotedoǥoji icota me ǥadabakeni , leeǥodi mokawii makaami ele . Etakaami digoina mawini anemiitiwa , domigica yoenatagi ane dakapetege ǥonajoinaǥaneǥeco ? Pida niǥida makaami jaǥawii ane dakapetege ǥonajoinaǥaneǥeco niǥina me iiǥenatakanitiwa metidaxacoǥotigi . ”

Ja jinataǥa Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo me ǥodoǥatedice mejonaǥateloco loniciwaǥa nibeyacaǥa , odaa Aneotedoǥoji aǥalee ǥodiloikatidi leeǥotedi ǥobeyaceǥeco , oko ane ǥodexogotege Jesus Cristo , ane daǥadiaa iniwinaǥatalo epaa lidekeco ǥodaaleǥena , pida jibaaǥatema Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji .

Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji aǥodiomaǥaditedice daǥa ǥodiloikatidi leeǥodi niǥinoa ǥobeyaceǥeco , pida ǥodiomaǥaditedice me najigotedoǥowa gela ǥodewiǥa ane yemaa me najigotedoǥowa . Jakataǥatace me ǥodewiǥa leeǥodi niǥijo loenatagitedoǥodomi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo .

Odaa noditice me ninaaletiniwace noiigi inatawece iiǥo , niǥijo noiigi ane liboonaǥadi Gogue iniaa Magogue ( one diitigi me lakapetedi Aneotedoǥoji ) . Satanás yatecoǥotee me iwitideǥe , odaa elioditiogi micataǥa niǥina dotiwadi , ane daǥa jakataǥa me jinilaaǥataǥa .

Niǥijo jotigide onateciǥidi niǥina akaami jiǥijo me ǥadakataǥa niǥinoa ane beyagi anoditece . Pida Aneotedoǥoji ja ǥadapitaǥatitetiwaji , codaa ǥadiolaatedice makaami nepilidi , codaa eote me ǥadeǥenakitiwaji . Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji jiǥijaaǥeo niǥida libakeditaǥadomi , leeǥodi managi miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo naǥabakeni Liboonaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi minoa niǥinoa yawikodico digoina niwiloǥonaǥaxi , pida aidiboliǥa me idiniwilo . Leeǥodi eliodi me jowooǥodi Niǥijoa anejiwaǥadi , odaa leeǥodi me jowooǥodi , ajawienataka me yakadi me yotete ijotawece niǥijo ane jajigotalo nigepaaǥicota noko nige dopitedijo Cristo .

Ele midioka limedi motaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji , odaa niǥina motaǥaneǥeni , idioka limedi mikani Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo me ǥadaxawanitiwaji motaǥaneǥeni , codaa mipokitalo . Niǥina motaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji , adinowetitiwaji ade dinelio ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi , pida ipokiteloco inatawece loiigi Aneotedoǥoji .

Ee Paulo , Silas , iniaa Timóteo , jiwakateenaǥatibigaǥaji naǥadi ǥodiwakate ane emeǥee jidi . Jiwakateenaǥatibigaǥaji anakaami ǥonioxoadipi , ane iwaǥatitetiwaji Ǥoniotagodi manitaǥa nigotaǥa Tessalônica , akaami ane ǥadexocitege Aneotedoǥoji Ǥodiodi , iniaa Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo . Jemaanaǥa Aneotedoǥoji Ǥodiodi , codaa me Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo midioka limedi meletaǥadomitiwaji , codaa mowo mele ǥadaaleǥenali .
Oleetibige makaami niǥina ane niǥiwatece okanicodaaǥica oko . Igaataǥa Ǥoniotagodi ayajebi , dopitacedijo .
Igaataǥa niǥina melici paon codaa macipeteloco goopa viinyo , niǥida anenitiwaji , idioka limedi me ikeeni Ǥoniotagodi me yeleotedoǥodomi nigepaaǥicota me dopitedijo .

Niǥidiwa lacilodi nigoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi me icilatidi niǥina eelotaginaǥa niǥina modipokoteloco , odaa icí . Nigica loenatagi ane beyagi niǥina eelotaginaǥa , nigodipokotalo Ǥoniotagodi , odaa Ǥoniotagodi ja iwilegitetema laaleǥena libeyaceǥeco .

Idioka limedi me iniotagodetalo Aneotedoǥoji , ane ee liotagi digo mijotaǥa niǥijo jotigide yaamipi modibatema , idioka limedi me jeemitetece me diǥica ibatiigi catiwedi yaaleǥena . Codaa idioka limedi me jotaǥaneǥe Aneotedoǥoji noko , codaa menoale . Niǥina me jotaǥaneǥe Aneotedoǥoji , odaa jipokotalo me ǥadaxawani .

Odaa joǥodapaawetiogi niǥinoa wetiadi ane leegitibigimece niǥinoa wetiadi eloodoli , modi , “ Aniitoǥoloco amaleeǥaǥa ǥodaǥateǥegitema Aneotedoǥoji ane nicotedeloco nibaanco miniwa me ǥoneǥegi , codaa niǥiniwa Waxacoco ane yelatedoǥodomi .

Ane yemaa me wajipa , dice ajipaata Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji ane ligegitiogi lapoli loiigi Ǥoniotagodi ! Niǥina anoiǥeke niciniǥico , jajigotiogi niweenigi ane diǥica me jinataǥa ane icoǥotibigimece ditibigimedi . Codaa aaǥaǥa jajigotiogi wetikawaana lapaceǥe ane diniditeloco boonaǥadi ane diǥica ane yowooǥodi , iniokini niǥini ane dibatege baǥa yowooǥodi ane diitigi . ”

Odaa leeǥodi me oceeǥaǥa niǥijo niiǥaxinaǥanadi awitakaǥa , odaa odinigaanyetece ǥaninyeelotiwaji , codaa etiǥadinaaleni mowotibige me iwaǥatitiwaji niǥinoa ane deǥewi . Pida ja jotigide Aneotedoǥoji me iwitediogi , odaa ja igo me iloikatidi , codaa me yaaǥadi niǥijoa awitakaǥaǥa .
Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me niiǥe ica niwigo anida nimaweneǥegi me ninaaletiniwace niǥidi oko , eotedibige moyiwaǥadi liwitakeco niǥini ǥoneleegiwa abeyaceǥegi .
Joaniǥidaaǥeeta Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa , “ Niǥina ane daǥa judeutedi beyagi modotaǥatibige Aneotedoǥoji leeǥodi ǥadakataǥa , anakaami judeutedi . ”

Niǥijo jotigide ijoa itoataale oxikonaǥaǥa ane liboonaǥatedi Janes ijaa Jambres nakapetegi Moisés aneetece lotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji . Idaaǥee niǥinoa ǥoneleegiwadi abeyacaǥaǥa modakapetege niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anewi . Aǥaleeǥica deǥele lowooko , oteǥexaaǥaǥalee oyiwaǥadi niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi .
Niǥina ane jemaa , japeteǥe codaa me jiloikatidi . Enice adinoniciwaǥati maniwitici , codaa adinilaanitibecetiwaji .
Aneotedoǥoji eote me ǥodeǥenaǥa leeǥodi me jinakatonaǥa . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji meote mele ǥodaaleǥena leeǥodi niǥijo aneote Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo .
Akamaǥakaami adinoweti codaa adowetiteloco ǥadiiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi . Nigidokee mawii niǥina anejitibigaǥawa , odaa Aneotedoǥoji ǥadewikatititace , codaa me niǥina anowajipataǥawa .

Elioditibece me jaoǥa lawikodigi , jametibigo minoataǥa niǥinoa liiakanaǥaxiidi judeutedi , codaa me jiedeǥe me beyagi modotaǥatibige Ǥoniotagodi . Eliodi me idelatema codaa ejigo minoataǥa niǥinoa nigotadi ane ideitedice we niǥidi nipodigi me jiniatetiniwace . ”

Pida ele me jowooǥotaǥa niǥicoa anepaa lemaanaǥa ǥodolaadi . Niǥina metiǥodiiǥe niǥinoa anokomaǥa ǥodemaanaǥa me jaoǥa , owo oko me nigopeloǥotege okanicodaaǥica eledi oko , owote loenatagi ane beyagi , codaa aǥoyakadi modinajacaǥaditema niǥinoa lakataǥa .
Niǥina anetanaǥa inaaǥina ane ilege nawodigijedi aǥica ane jaoǥa , pida Aneotedoǥoji biǥida ane jaoǥate , igaataǥa jiǥiniaa eote ǥotanigijedi me ili .
Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi aǥica ananiaditaǥadomitiwaji nixakedi ane yajigotaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo . Codaa anibeoonitibigegetiwaji niǥica noko nige dopitedijo Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo .

Odaa jajipata ica ane dotaǥa digoida ditibigimedi , layaagaǥawa niǥina laxoǥokeǥegi ninyoǥodi ane igedi , codaa layaagaǥawa micataǥa niǥina niximaǥaǥa , codaa liciagi niǥina oko eliodi anoyatetigilo noǥoxiǥa-liwenadi .

Ijotawece niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko niǥijo jotigide oditece Jesus , codaa oditece Aneotedoǥoji micota me ixomaǥateetedice libeyaceǥeco inatawece niǥina anonakato Ǥoniotagodi Jesus leeǥodi loniciwaǥa Liboonaǥadi . ”

Niǥina oko anidioka limedi mowo anele , codaa anodoletibige Aneotedoǥoji me iweniǥide , codaa anoyocaǥaneǥe Aneotedoǥoji , codaa anodoletibige lewiǥa miniwataǥa , odaa Aneotedoǥoji yajigote lewiǥa niǥini oko ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo .

Ee João ane jidi naǥadi notaǥanaǥaxi , jidikotibige seete lapoli loiigi Ǥoniotagodi ane liǥeladi nipodaǥa Ásia . Jemaa Aneotedoǥoji midioka limedi meletedaǥadomitiwaji , codaa meote mele ǥadaaleǥenalitiwaji . Ane yoetaǥadomitiwaji niǥida , Aneotedoǥoji , Niǥijoa aniniwa , anakaaǥiniwa maleediǥicatibige me ǥodoe , codaa micota menagi digoina mokotaǥa , codaa meletedaǥadomitiwaji , codaa idi eledi anoyoetaǥadomitiwaji niǥijo anele , niǥijoa seete niwicidi ane idei lodoe nibaanco Aneotedoǥoji .

Odaa Paulo jeǥeetiogi , “ João iiǥe niǥijo oko me dinilegetibigiwaji niǥijo naǥa odinilaatece libeyaceǥeco . Pida meetiogi loiigi Israel me leeditibige moyiwaǥadi Niǥijoa anicota menagi nigidiaaǥidi , Niǥijoa Aneotedoǥoji ane niiǥe . Odaa niǥini oko aneeta jiǥijaaǥijoa Jesus . ”

Odaa Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji yowooǥodi me yatamaǥatee niǥina oko ane iǥenaǥa niǥina ǥodaxakawa micaaniǥigota me domeǥeo me nawikodeeǥa . Codaa Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji yowooǥodi meote anigotediogi niǥina oko anodakapetege me daǥa iwoko niǥica noko nige limedi me iwi codaa me iloikatidi inatawece niǥina oko ane doǥoyiwaǥaditeda .

Pida odoletibige nipodigi baǥa daǥaxa mele , niǥica nipodigi digoida ditibigimedi . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji aniboliǥatetece moyatedigi “ Inoenoǥodi ” , igaataǥa ja igodi me yoe naǥaca nigotaǥa ane yajigotediogi .

Pida leeditibige mikani niǥijoa latematiko niǥina laxokodipi , igaataǥa aǥica jaoǥate niǥinoa lotaǥa , codaa aicoǥotedigi miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji . Adinoniciwaǥati me ǥadewiki mawii niǥica ane yocaǥaneǥe Aneotedoǥoji micataǥa niǥina nalokodeǥecajo ane dinoniciwaǥadi me diniiǥaxi .

Odaa ilaagiteloco inatawece iiǥo , oyawiile anei Aneotedoǥoji loiigi , codaa me naǥajo nigotaǥa ane lemaana Aneotedoǥoji . Pida noledi dinikatiogi icoǥotibigimece ditibigimedi , odaa yaaǥaditiogi niǥidi anonawiile .
Odaa Pedro ja diiǥenatakatiogi monilegetiniwace odatika Liboonaǥadi Jesus Cristo . Odaa niǥidiaaǥidi joǥodipokota Pedro midiaaǥi miditaǥa onateciǥidiwa nokododi .
Aǥica daǥawienatakanitiwaji makati makaami ligiilaǥadi ǥoladi , codaa aleetibige daǥakaami nilokokena niǥina ane idei nexocaǥa .
Joaniǥidaa ane ligegi Aneotedoǥoji me najigotedoǥowa . Najigotedoǥowa ǥodewiǥa ane diǥica liniogo miniwataǥa .

Pida niǥina Aneotedoǥoji me yajigote lixakedi oko , odaa niǥica anee me yewiǥa niǥini oko aǥica lapioyaǥajegi . Codaa niǥini oko doletibige meo niǥina eledi oko me ilaǥatiwage . Niǥini oko inoka doletibige meo aneletema eledi oko , codaa doletibige me lokaaǥedi okanicodaaǥica oko . Codaa eliodi me iwikode eledi oko , codaa eo inokina niǥina ane yaxawa eledi oko . Niǥina meo niǥina anele , eotema inatawece oko , aǥica ane dinetetema . Aǥokeo me daǥaxa meletema eledi oko .
Aneotedoǥoji , ane Eniodi , yemaa Lionigi . Odaa yajigoteta naǥatetigi me iiǥe inoatawece .

Ǥoniotagodi adinopaǥadi meote niǥina ane ligegi , codaa alowoocaǥawa niǥina oko anodiletibige daaditiǥicota niǥina ane ligegi . Pida Aneotedoǥoji dinatitedaǥawatiwaji , leeǥodi ayemaa diǥica ane yaaǥadi , pida domaǥa yemaa minatawece oko dinilaatibigiwaji , oditaǥa joǥoika mowo ane beyagi .
Domaǥa jemaa diǥinatawece oko iciagepodi . Pida oninitecibeci oko ida anepaaǥigote Aneotedoǥoji , anigotedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji adiniciamico .
Enice adinoniciwaǥati madinemaanitiwage . Odaa oleetibige Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo me yajigotaǥawa ǥadixakedi , pida daǥaxa mida ane jaoǥa nige yajigotaǥawa ǥanimaweneǥegi meloǥoti lowooko Aneotedoǥoji .

Aneotedoǥoji ligegi niǥijo jotigide , mee , “ Jidaǥadi lokokena miditaǥa nexocaǥa ! ” Codaa Iniaaǥiniwa jeǥeote me ídi nilokokena catiwedi ǥodaaleǥena . Naǥani lokokena eo me jowooǥotaǥa anodaaǥeeteda Aneotedoǥoji me datale , anodaaǥee me jinataǥa latobi Cristo me datale .
Ini ica judeu ane liboonaǥadi Apolo ane lanikadi nigotaǥa Alexandria . Odaa Apolo jiǥigo nigotaǥa Éfeso . Niǥini ǥoneleegiwa ele me dotaǥa , codaa eliodi me yowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi .
Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Jesus maǥaǥa yeleo wetice ica lapoagi-nelegi nigotaǥa , eotedibige me yakadi me ibake epaa lawodi me napitaǥadi libeyaceǥeco noiigi .

Tito , leeditibige midioka limedi me iiǥaxinaǥanitece niǥijoa anejitedaǥawa . Abakeni ǥanaǥatetigi niǥina moniciwaǥati laaleǥena , codaa moxoki oko ane wajipataǥawa . Jiniǥikani deǥetiǥadomilenitice , micataǥa daaditaǥa akaamita ǥoneleegiwa ǥoneǥegi .

Aneotedoǥoji ikee mewi me ǥodemaa niǥijo me niiǥe niǥijoa onijoatece me Lionigi menagi digoina iiǥo eotedibige me jakataǥa ǥodewiǥa ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo miniwataǥa , leeǥodi Lionigi me yeleotedoǥodomi .
Eiodi . Jemaa niǥijo ananajicitiwa odaa anejote jiǥidiaaǥaǥa ite , codaa amaleeǥaǥa onadi malecatinitibigimece Iboonaǥadi , leeǥodi ademaani maleediǥicatibige me oeni niǥina iiǥo .
Niǥina ane diitiwe oyaaǥadi inoatawece , codaa mowo eledi oko magecaǥalo .

Enice ele me jatitaǥateloco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , igaataǥa iniwa ǥonisacerdoti ǥoneǥegi aneletedoǥodomi , ane dakatediwece digoida ditibigimedi , lodoe Aneotedoǥoji . Jesus jiǥiniaa ǥonisacerdoti , Lionigi Aneotedoǥoji .

Idejonaǥatice manitaǥa wetiǥa Aneotedoǥoji naǥa iweniǥide Jesus . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji ane Eliodi Jesus jeǥeote meliodi me datale Jesus . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji ane datale , anida nimaweneǥegi caticedi inoatawece , mee , “ Niǥidoa Ionigi daǥaxa me jemaa . Codaa eote me daǥaxa me idinitibece . ”

Pida oninitece Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo , odaa iniokini me yajigotiogi oko inoatawece ane lixaketedi . Yajigota oko lixaketedi ane daǥa diniciamico , anepaa yemaa me yajigota oninitecibeci oko me lixakedi .

Odaa niǥijo eledi aanjo ja yatetigi nigoloneeta . Odaa jeǥeo anigota oniniteci liwai niǥidiwa iniwatadiǥini liwailidi aligeǥe , epenai , codaa me yotetitedi . Odaa ja nexocaǥa oniniteci liwai niǥiniwa iniwatadiǥini liwailidi aligeǥe , epenai , codaa me yotetitedi , Odaa ja nexocaǥa oniniteci liwai niǥidiwa itoatadiǥida laǥaagetedi noko codaa menoale .
Odaa niǥijoa judeutedi joǥodibata Sóstenes niǥijo gela nowienoǥodi liiakanaǥaxi judeutedi , odaa joǥonalaketibige lodoe niǥijo diimigi-nelegi . Pida Gálio aǥica meo niǥijo niciagi .
Odaa joǥodoletibige moniwilo Jesus leeǥodi modiletibige daǥa dotaǥatedibige Aneotedoǥoji , pida oiwoko .
Enice oleetibige midioka limedi mabo ǥadaaleǥena . Icaaǥica ǥodolaadi nigidokee me diǥica loniciwaǥa , Aneotedoǥoji eote ǥodiwigo me micataǥa daǥa gela inoatawece nokododi .

Odaa Maria ja dibata aca bootawaana ane nolee ladokojegi , idatawece “ nardo ” , one dakake loojedi . Odaa ja yadotelogo loǥonaka Jesus , igaanaǥa igodi me yadotelogo , odaa yatita lamodi me iwilegi . Odaa niǥijo lanigi aneletege niǥijo ladokojegi jiǥigotigi initawece diimigi .

Leeǥodi me nakato Aneotedoǥoji , odaa jiǥidiaa liǥeladi niǥidi nipodigi micataǥa daǥa iomiǥigi miditaǥa niǥidi nipodigi Aneotedoǥoji ane ligegite me yajigoteta . Diǥeladetigi nopegedi noiigiwa Isaque ijaa Jacó . Aneotedoǥoji eledi ligegiteta Isaque ijaa Jacó me yajigotediogi idiaaǥidi niǥidi nipodigi .
Inioxoadipi , anowiikitiwa aneji me idewiǥa akaamitawecetiwaji , codaa ina baǥa awini niǥijo ane newiǥa digo meetaǥa aneji me idewiǥa .

Adinaxawanitiwaji nigina mini oko anida ane iwaaǥaditema , ane micataǥa diǥidi loyaǥagi ane iwaaǥadi . Odaa nigidaaǥeni joǥoteteni liiǥenatakaneǥegi Cristo ane najigotedoǥowa me ǥodiiǥe me leeditibige me idinemaanaǥatiwage .

Odaa ja jakataǥa me jinataǥa Aneotedoǥoji me dibatetege oko me iǥenaǥa leeǥodi niǥina oko meo ane liiǥenatakaneǥegi Aneotedoǥoji , idiǥida aleeǥodi niǥina oko moka ligegitibece me nakato Aneotedoǥoji .
Aneotedoǥoji domige iǥenaǥa ina me iolatedicoace ina oko anepaa yemaa ? Ayakadi diǥideǥejalaǥatigi ǥogegi !
Abaatege ǥadiwigotigitiwaji niǥina ane deǥeliodi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi . Pida jinaǥabaatege daǥadinotigimadenitege leeǥodi niǥicoa anaǥaǥa lowooko .
Odaa jiǥijo nidelaǥa digoida ditibigimedi . Miguel ijaaǥijoa niaanjotedi oideleǥe niǥijo Ǥowidi . Odaa ja didele niǥijo Ǥowidi laxawepodi niǥijoa aaǥaǥa niaanjotedi .
Niǥina midatecibece me eliǥidee , jiniǥikani ǥadelaǥa deǥeo mawii ane beyagi . Codaa jineǥeliǥidee idatawece noko .

Nigica niǥina oko aneo ane beyagitaǥadomi , jinaǥa domaǥawii ane beyagitema . Codaa jinaǥa ameni niǥina oko ane ǥadame . Pida ipokitalo Aneotedoǥoji me ibinie niǥini oko , igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji eniditedaǥawa makaami lionigipi eotedibige me yakadi me ǥadibinienitetiwaji .
Niǥijoa ane idimonya etiniwa meetaǥa . Aǥica daǥa idika doǥoka eetece , igaataǥa idioka limedi me jao ane yemaa ” .

Enice , leeditibige me ǥadigomitiwaji . Micataǥa niǥina iodaǥawa me dinixotinigilo lowoodi me dinowedi , jiǥidaaǥee me adinixomitiwaji . Niǥina motaǥanitiwaji codaa mowoo niǥina anewi , odaa niǥina anewi micataǥa daǥa ǥanigoenaǥadi . Niǥida anee ǥadewiǥa me iǥenaǥa , micataǥa daǥa naǥana noecaǥaxi iodaǥawa elipogo ewacogo me dinowedi .

Jiǥijo me dinaǥaditedini , aǥica ane yowooǥodi anodaa diitigilo niǥijoa seete yotetitedi ananati ibaaǥadi ijaaǥijoa seete noledaǥaxiidi oolo . Digawini anodaa diitigi niǥijoa seete yotetitedi , niaanjotedi niǥidiwa seete lapoli loiigi Ǥoniotagodi , odaa niǥidiwa seete noledaǥaxiidi , baǥa niǥijoa seete lapoli loiigi Ǥoniotagodi . ”

Pida ijoa me jinataǥa Jesus . Onateciǥijoa nokododi Aneotedoǥoji ideyate Jesus natinedi aanjotedi , eotedibige me yeleotetema inatawece oko meote lewiǥa , leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me iwikode niǥina oko . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji naǥa iweniǥide codaa me yajigote eliodi loniciwaǥa .
Leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji Niǥijoa anidokee me diba ǥadiwigotigitiwaji , eotedibige moleetibige , codaa makati mawii niǥica ane yemaa , aneletaǥadomitiwaji .
Jeǥejitedaǥawatiwaji niǥinoa yotaǥa amaleeǥaǥa itiwaǥaji inikegi , odaa eliodi ǥadinikegitiwaji .
Ee Paulo , ee liiǥexegi Jesus Cristo . Aneotedoǥoji ane Ǥonewikatitoǥodi , joaniǥiniaa idiiǥe , iniaa Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo , ane inibeoonaǥatibigege niǥica noko nige dopitedijo .

Eledi jemaa iwaalepodi me doǥodinixotinigi nowoodaǥagi aneo me beyagi lowooko ǥoneleegiwadi , niǥinoa ane dakake loojedi , codaa me deǥewianaǥa oyoigeǥe lamodi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa daǥaxa me dinanatece oolo , oteǥexaaǥaǥa niǥinoa eletidi elomaǥajetecidi .

Odaa Jesus jeǥeote lalakenaǥanaǥadi waca-lolaadi , ja niticoitedice iditawece digoida we niogó Aneotedoǥoji liǥeladi . Eletidi nixotedice niǥijoa waxacocoli ijaaǥijoa ǥodinadi . Odaa jaǥaǥa ilaagaǥaditedice niǥijoa dinyeelo , ninyeelo niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi ane nicotiniwace moiikoaǥe dinyeelo . Yamaǥatedini ijoa nameejatedi .

Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji micataǥa daǥa gela me ǥodoetace niǥijo naǥa ǥodexocaǥaditetege Jesus Cristo , eotedibige me jakataǥa me jaoǥa ǥodoenataka anele anakaa lowoogo Aneotedoǥoji meote , codaa me yoetedini .
Yokaaǥetedipi yemaanigipi , jinaǥanawela leeǥodi ǥadawikodico ane dakake . Niǥinoa ǥadawikodico anetiǥadicinitiwaji aǥolalaǥa , akaaǥinoa .
Ǥodinitibece , idinanenaǥatibece . Odaa jocaǥanaǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji . Igaataǥa jiǥicota lakata lalokegi ladoneǥegi Waxacoco , codaa naǥani liomaǥata me lodawa jaǥaǥa dinenyaǥaditege .

Niǥina gela ǥodewiǥa ǥodotete liciagi lamakaladi iodaǥawa me yotete lacilo . Odaa lotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji oiciaceeketege iodaǥawa lodaajo-ocaǥataǥa . Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo najigotedoǥowa lotaǥa eotibige me idinaǥakatitaǥatalo , codaa me jiǥekenaǥa ǥodaxakawa .

Igaaniǥicotiogi , odaa ja nadi ica Egípcio ane yametibigo ica ǥoneleegiwa israelita . Odaa Moisés ja nienaǥaneǥe niǥijo ǥoneleegiwa israelita ane nalaketibige niǥijo ǥoneleegiwa Egípcio , odaa Moisés ja yeloadi niǥijo Egípcio .
Pida akaami inioxoadipi , jinaǥa anigaaxe me oeni anele .
Adinowetitiwaji , codaa jinaǥamiǥitice ane ǥoniiǥaxinaǥaneǥegitece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi . Awii liciagi ǥoneleegiwadi anabo laaleǥenali , codaa adinoniciwaǥatiteloco ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi .

Oyaǥatitibece niǥijo lopegedi niwigo anodita Moloque anenita me ǥanoenoǥoditiwaji , codaa adeegitibece niǥijo niwigo ane liciagi yotedi anodita Renfã aneledi enitatiwaji me ǥanoenoǥodi . Joaniǥidiaaǥidiwa ǥaniwiciditiwaji ǥadoenataka anoǥeetetiogi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me ǥadadeegiticogitiwaji caticedi nigotaǥa Babilônia . ’

Enice , ǥonioxoadipi , oleetibige midokee matiteteloco ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa otetenitiwaji niǥijoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco aneetece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , ane jiiǥaxinaǥatedaǥadici niǥijo me jeloǥotaǥatedaǥawa , codaa niǥijo me jiwakateenaǥatibigaǥaji ǥodiwakate notaǥanaǥaxi .
Aneotedoǥoji jiǥiniaaǥeote naǥa ǥodigo me idinixomaǥatinigi gela ǥodolaadi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me najigotedoǥowa Liwigo me ikee mewi micota me najigotedoǥowa ǥodolaadi gela .
Niǥina iwaalepodi leeditibige me notokotiniwace niǥina mowajipata modiniiǥaxitece anodaaǥee ica mejiwaǥatakanaǥa , codaa leeditibige modeemitetibige niǥinoa lacilodi anoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi .

Jinaǥa domaǥa ajipaata nigica ane doletibige me dakapetege niǥijo laxokodipi anoiiǥe Ǥoniotagodi loiigi . Pida idoka ajipaata niǥina nige idiwa iniwataale mige iniwatadiǥini oko nakataǥanadi , anonadi meo anigida libeyaceǥegi .
Adinecoatitiwaji amaleeǥaǥa ikeeni madinemaanitiwage , awiitibige me ninitedibece Aneotedoǥoji . Niǥina eletidi lapoli anoyiwaǥadi Cristo oyecoaditibigaǥajitiwaji .

Odaa joǥoilojietigi amoǥo inoa lacilodi ( ane lakatigi moikee magecaǥalodipi ) , odaa ja napaawaǥateloco codaa me nacaagaǥateloco , modi , ‘ Nagoodo naǥani nigotaǥa eloodo aneiticoace naǥa liicotedi ijotawece niǥijo aninoa latogoli , leeǥodi niǥinoa elaanaǥa anoyadeegitedibece . Catiwedi onaniteci lakata naǥani nigotaǥa ja ma . ’

Owootiwaji Aneotedoǥoji Ǥodiodi meliodi me ǥodemaa . Ikee meliodi me ǥodemaa niǥina meetedoǥowa moko lionigipi , codaa ewi moko lionigipi . Niǥina oko anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo aǥetiǥodowooǥodi , leeǥodi aǥoyowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji .

Akaamitiwaji , lionekadipi , idaǥaǥaeni . Iwaǥatitiwaji niǥinoa ǥoneleegiwadi laxokodi ane niiǥenatakanaǥa . Codaa akaamitawecetiwaji leeditibige me adinilioniǥatiti lodoe niǥina eledi oko , codaa awii liciagi niǥina niotagipi me dinaxawatiwage . Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa mee , “ Aneotedoǥoji lakapetedipi niǥina anaǥaxakenaǥaǥa , pida eote aneletema niǥina ane diniwikodetibece . ”

Ayakadi daantiǥidaa leeǥodi ! Leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji ewi , aǥica daǥa diwitaka . Pida inoatawece ǥoneleegiwadi baǥa awitakaǥaǥa . Joaniǥidaaǥeeta lotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji , mee , “ Iniotagodi , leeditibige me dinikee makaami ane iǥenaǥa niǥina motaǥani , codaa icota maǥekeni niǥina anodotaǥatibigaǥaji . ”

Odaa natigide etini jeǥenotoǥowa , codaa idiwa anoyajigota notaǥanaǥaxiidi lidiko niǥijo anoiiǥe sacerdotitedi . Niǥidiwa notaǥanaǥaxiidi oikee mida naǥatetigi me niwilotiniwace inatawece oko anoibake Ǥaboonaǥadi niǥina moyotaǥaneǥe Aneotedoǥoji . ”

Niǥijo jotigide ijo oko awitakaǥa anodi moyeloǥoditedibece lowooko Aneotedoǥoji . Niǥijoa awitakaǥaǥa icotiogi liwigotigi loiigi Israel . Odaa idaaǥee jaǥaǥa ototicogi ǥadiwigotigitiwaji oko awitakaǥa anodi mewi modiiǥaxinaǥatece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi . Odiiǥaxinaǥatece niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ane deǥewiteda owotibige moibeyacaǥadi ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegitiwaji . Niǥijoa liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco doide . Pida niǥina oko aǥoyowooǥodi niǥijoa liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco me lakapetedi Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa . Codaa niǥijoa awitakaǥaǥa modi Jesus me daǥa Ǥoniotagoditeda ane nadooǥodi lawodi meote me ǥodilaǥatege Aneotedoǥoji . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji nige yaaǥadi niǥina me doǥoditigi .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi niǥijoa lacilodi judeutedi neǥepaanaǥa odoletibige moyeloadi Jesus . Igaataǥa odiletibige daataǥa yoteteteda niǥijo niiǥenatakaneǥegi leeǥodi saabado , eleditace leeǥodi niǥina mee me Eliodi niǥicoa Aneotedoǥoji , odaa diniciaceeketetege Aneotedoǥoji .
Jemaatibigaǥajitiwaji leeǥodi manalakitibige ijoatawece baanaǥa jiiǥaxitedaǥadici , codaa motetenitetiwaji niǥijoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ane jajigotedaǥawa .
Igaataǥa Davi meetece Jesus , niǥijo mee , ‘ Idioka limedi me jinadi Ǥoniotagodi me ideite yodoe . Codaa ideite iwai ibaaǥadi me idaxawa , odaa jiǥidaaǥee aǥica ane idoǥowikomata .

Igaataǥa niǥida ǥadewiǥa gela aixomaǥatijo , aliciagi ǥadewiǥa anoyajigotaǥawa ǥadiododipi . Pida ida ǥadewiǥa gela leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa , ane micataǥa niǥina anida lewiǥa , odaa aǥica daǥa ma .

Enice adinatematiitiwage niǥina me idatibece ǥabeyaceǥegi , codaa ipokiteloco miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji niǥina eledi oko ane neelotikanaǥa , amanagawini Aneotedoǥoji ǥadicilatititetiwaji . Niǥina oko ane iǥenaǥa lewiǥa nige dipokotalo Aneotedoǥoji , odaa lipoketegi ida eliodi loniciwaǥa , igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji idioka limedi me wajipate niǥini oko .
Jemaa mejitaǥawatiwaji niǥina anewi . Niǥina ane idadiwaǥadi idiokaanaǥa limedi me yewiǥa miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Aǥadalatitiwaji doǥodaa micataǥa daǥakaami exiijigipi . Pida idopitacaǥawatiwaji .
Niǥina moko judeu eliodi mele . Odoejegi leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji najigotedoǥowa lotaǥa me jeloǥotaǥatedibece .

Akaamitiwaji anakaami niotagipi , iwaǥati ǥaniotagodepodi digoina iiǥo . Eemiteetibige codaa me adoiitiogi , codaa catiwedi ǥadaaleǥenali emaanitibige mawii inoatawece anoiiǥetedaǥawa , micataǥa daǥa Cristo niǥini ane iwaǥati .

Akati ina me diǥica ane jaoǥa Aneotedoǥoji me daǥaxa meletedoǥodomi , odaa anaǥa ǥodiloikatidi leeǥodi meliodi me yakadi me dinatitedoǥowa . Ejinoǥowooǥoti Aneotedoǥoji meletedaǥadomi , eotedibige madinilaanitece ǥabeyaceǥeco , odaa opilitalo Aneotedoǥoji .
Niǥina me jotaǥaneǥenaǥa Aneotedoǥoji , jinakatonaǥa me najipatedoǥowa okanicodaaǥica ane ǥodipoketegitalo , niǥina me jipokaǥatalo niǥica ane yemaa .

Aneotedoǥoji jiǥiniaaǥeote me inibeoonaǥatege lanokegi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus . Odaa jipokotalo meliodi me yajigotedaǥawa ǥadinikegitiwaji , codaa meote mele ǥadaaleǥenali malee iwaǥatitetiwaji , amaleeǥaǥa yajigotaǥawatiwaji Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo ǥanimaweneǥegi mepaanaǥa anibeoonitege lanokegi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus .
Niǥijo anoyelite Jesus moyototedeloco nicenaǥanaǥate ipegitege ijoa nawodigijedi niale lawoǥo aneitice niǥijo lawimaǥajegi-wetiǥa gela moigodi , analeediǥicata émeǥegi anoixotiwece .

Odaa niǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide joǥoniwilo , ijaaǥijo awitakegi anee me yeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko , aneote inoa loenataka ane joxicaǥatema lodoe niǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide , aneote me ninaaletiniwace niǥijo oko anodinanatece nibikotaxete niǥijo eijeeǥagi codaa modoǥeteta niwilanigi anowo me liwigo . Odaa niǥijo eijeeǥagi ijaaǥijo niǥijo ane ninaaletiniwace oko oyokoletinece elagigi nelegi aneite noledi ane daǥa ipe , inaa ǥocilaǥadi ane lanicaǥawa aligopenaǥaneǥe loǥocilaǥadi lanigi .

Dice awii aneeta lotaǥanaǥaxi Aneotedoǥoji , niǥijo neǥee , “ Nige nigicile ǥadaxakawa , edianitece niweenigi , nige yeloadi ecibi , acipeǥeni . Igaanigawii niǥida aneni , odaa eliodi me niboliǥa ǥadaxakawa . ”

Oleetibige mele mowookonitiwaji codaa midioka limedi me nalaǥatibigaǥaji niǥijoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anoyalaǥatalo Cristo , codaa mele me iiǥaxinaǥani , codaa niǥina me aladeeni eledi oko , abakeni initawece ǥadixakedi ane yajigotedaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji . Codaa agaani Enaco ane diniditelogo lotaǥanaǥaxi Aneotedoǥoji , codaa eletidi Enaco , codaa agaani noǥeeǥeco ane ǥadiiǥaxinitece Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo . Agaanaǥanitibigimece Ǥoniotagodi , codaa oleetibige midioka limedi maniotagodeetalo manitawece ǥadaaleǥena .
Akaamitiwaji , ǥoneleegiwadi , emaani niǥinoa ǥadodawadi , codaa jinaǥakaami aojokomatadipi .

Nigica ǥoneleegiwa , oǥoa domige iwaalo aneyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi anidi litacepodi wajekalodipi , leeditibige modowediteloco niǥidi wajekalodipi , odaa ele me doǥoikatece loiigi Ǥoniotagodi doǥonediatiniwace . Odaa loiigi Ǥoniotagodi yakadi moilaaǥatece moyaxawa niǥina eledi wajekalodipi ane diǥica anodinaǥakatidi .
Joaniǥidaa ane nikeetedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji me najigotedoǥowa ǥodewiǥa ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo miniwataǥa , codaa niǥida ǥodewiǥa icoǥotigi miniwataǥa Lionigi .

Niǥina oko aniniwa Aneotedoǥoji Lionigi minitaǥa joaniǥiniaaǥida lewiǥa ane diǥica liniogo miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji . Pida niǥina oko ane diǥicoateda Lionigi Aneotedoǥoji minitaǥa , joaniǥiniaaǥini aǥica lewiǥa ane diǥica liniogo .
Nige Aneotedoǥoji Lionigi ǥadowilecenitetematiwaji ǥabeyaceǥeco me ǥadikanitedice , odaa beǥewi madinikaniticoace .
Enice jipokotaǥawatiwaji , jinaǥadinajicitini leeǥodi me jawikodeteloco niǥida ibakedi me ǥadaxawanitiwaji . Pida leeǥodi me jawikode Aneotedoǥoji ǥadiweniǥidenitetiwaji .

Igaataǥa niǥina anowo eledi oko maniaditema eliwaǥatakaneǥegi aliotagipi Cristo , ane Ǥoniotagodi . Pida odioteci niǥicoa anepaa lidaǥataka lolaadi . Ele me notaǥanaǥa codaa oiletibigo oko , owotibige moyakadi moinaale niǥina ane diǥica lixakedi .

Niǥidi oko nolee inoatawece ane latopaco nibeyaceǥeco ; noomatewadi niǥina ane daǥa lodawadi , codaa inoatawece nimaweneǥeco mowo ane beyagi , idioka limedi madodigomadadi , codaa idioka limedi mowo ane beyagitema eledi oko . Niǥidi oko daǥaxa moceeǥaǥa , codaa ǥonematagododi , idioka limedi me nidelaǥa , awitakaǥa , inoka oyowo mowo ane beyagitema eledi oko . Niǥidi oko odotaǥatibige eledi , enalaǥanaǥa oiatiwage eledi oko . Neleǥedi Aneotedoǥoji , aǥodeemitetibige eledi oko moyotaǥaneǥe . Anabakenaǥaǥa , odiletibige me daaditiǥica liciagi , lemaanigi monaǥaxateloco eledi oko . Idioka limedi modoletibige geladi nimaweneǥeco mowo ane beyagi . Niǥidi oko aǥoyiwaǥadi eliododipi . Aǥaleeǥica doǥoyowo niǥica ane iǥenaǥa . Ajakataǥa daǥa jinakatonaǥa ane lotaǥa niǥina oko liciagi . Oteǥexaaǥaǥa oyemaa litacepodi . Aǥoixomaǥateetedijo eledi oko libeyaceǥeco , codaa aǥoiwikode eledi oko .
Abakeni loniciwaǥa Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo ane diǥeladetigi catiwedi ǥadaaleǥena moteteni niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anele ane yajigotedaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji .

Odaa jiǥidaaǥee nige jaoǥa niǥica anepaa yemaa ǥodolaadi , idioka limedi me ǥodeleo , codaa leegitalo Aneotedoǥoji me jotonaǥatedice . Pida nige jaoǥa ane yemaa Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo , odaa idioka limedi me ǥodewiǥa miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Aǥele daǥa idineenaǥatalo Ǥoniotagodi , digo anee onateciǥijo niǥijo noiigi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me niiǥe laketedi ane diniweneene monoǥojatiniwace niǥidi oko , odaa eliodi oko ja nigo .
Niǥina oko anida lemaanaǥaneǥegi , aǥica loenatagi ane ǥoboliǥa , codaa adoletibige ganigidi mepoka yakadi . Codaa aloidenigi , analaǥatibige anigida anodigota ane beyagi .
Elipogo liciagi naǥana oecaǥaxi ǥapileceǥe yapoǥoditini natecoǥodi . Labadi layaagaǥawa niǥinoa nagaagenali anowidi apolicaǥanadi anoixigi baanaǥa waleditiobece me witidi .
Niǥina daaditaǥa janagi , jeloǥoditiogi , agotiǥica libeyaceǥegi ane yeloǥo . Pida niǥina natigide aǥaleeǥica oko ane yakadi me yaǥaditini libeyaceǥegi .
Abakeni ǥadixakedi niǥina midatecibece madinadeegitege niǥina oko analeedoǥoyiwaǥaditeda Ǥoniotagodi . Niǥina midatecibece makati maxawani , odaa ikeenitiogi mida anenitege Cristo .

Igaataǥa jowooǥotaǥa Cristo me yeleotedoǥodomi madataǥa nicenaǥanaǥate . Odaa niǥijo jotigide anejinaǥa , aneo me jaoǥa ane beyagi , ja ma , micataǥa daǥa lemaǥawa Cristo madataǥa nicenaǥanaǥate , niǥijo naǥa yeleo . Odaa niǥina nibeyacaǥa aǥaleeǥica loniciwaǥatoǥoloco .

Joaniǥidaa me jakataǥa me jowooǥotaǥa niǥina oko ane lionigipi Aneotedoǥoji , inaaǥina niǥina ane lionigipi diaabo ; niǥina oko ane deǥeo ane iǥenaǥa alionigi Aneotedoǥoji , oteǥexaaǥaǥa niǥina oko ane daǥa yemaa nioxoa .

Igaataǥa niǥina aninoka yowoteda lakataǥa ane beyagi ane yemaa laaleǥena , joaniǥiniaa laxakawa Aneotedoǥoji , codaa aǥoyiwaǥadi Aneotedoǥoji liiǥenatakaneǥeco , oteǥexaaǥaǥa yakadi meniwaǥatakanaǥa .
Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me ninitibece yaaleǥena , codaa mejitece notaǥa aneo ǥodinikegi . Odaa jakadi me inibeotege Aneotedoǥoji meote yolaadi me yewiǥatace .

Pida ane leeǥodi me idalaǥata niǥina oko moyedia niwigo noenatagi , jaǥaǥa oyedia niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa , idiǥida aǥoyedia Aneotedoǥoji . Joaniǥidaa ajemaa diǥica anenitegetiwaji niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa .

Onidiwa icoa ǥoneleegiwadi anoyeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko , icoa eletidi boǥone niiǥaxinaǥanadi anodiiǥaxinaǥatece anodaaǥee ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi . Niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi idi liwigotigi loiigi Ǥoniotagodi digoida nigotaǥa Antioquia . Ini ica ane liboonaǥadi Barnabé , ica eledi Simão anoyatigi me “ Nabideǥegi ” , ica Lúcio anelatibige nigotaǥa Cirene , ica Manaém ane niliidaǥatagiwa niǥijo inionigi-eliodi Herodes , ijaa Saulo .

Jiniǥikanitiwaji diǥica ane ǥadinaaleni , niǥina aneetece notaǥa ane diǥica ane jaoǥate . Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji yelatetema codaa me iloikatidi niǥina oko ane doǥoyiwaǥaditeda , codaa anowote niǥinoa ane beyagi baaneǥejinaǥatece .

Niǥidi oko ane doǥoyiwaǥadi niǥinoa lacilodi leeditibige me amakenitiniwace , igaataǥa joǥoibeyacaǥadi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi eliodi dinoiigiwepodi niǥina modiiǥaxinaǥatece ane deǥewi . Niǥidiwa niiǥaxinaǥanadi idokowotibige modinigaanyetece dinyeelo , codaa niǥida lowoogo ǥoboliǥa .
Jesus yowooǥodi niǥijo ane yajigo modibatalo neloǥododi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi mee , “ Ini oniniteci ane daǥa yapidi niǥina akaamitiwaji . ”

Eǥidaaǥee Jesus me dotaǥa , odaa mee , “ Ejitaǥawatiwaji niǥina anewi . Niǥina ane dakatiwece liotaanigi waxacocoli , ane daǥa diotiwece epoagi , pida daǥaxatio me dakatio , joaniǥiniaa abejeweǥegi , oliceǥegi .

Niǥijo noǥoika naigi anewi , odaa jaǥaniatagigipi . Odaa joǥodioteci niǥijo naigi ane deǥele , odaa ja liciagi Balaão , niǥijo lionigi Beor , aneo niǥijo jotigide , leeǥodi daǥaxa me yemaa me dinigaanyetece dinyeelo meo niǥina ane beyagi .

Odaa niǥijoa judeutedi ijaaǥijo ane daǥa judeutedi joǥodinilakidetege niǥijoa lacilodi me lowoogo mowote ane beyagi modakapetege niǥijoa liiǥexedi Ǥoniotagodi , codaa monigidatiniwace oyatitiogi wetiadi .

Odaa jiǥicota me itoatadiǥida me ige , meeteta , “ Simão , lionigi Jonas , ida makaami ademaani ? ” Odaa Pedro jaǥagecaǥalo leeǥodi jiǥitoatadiǥida Jesus me ige meeteta , “ Ida makaami ademaani ? ” Odaa Pedro jeǥeetalo , “ Owooǥoti inoatawece , Iniotagodi . Owooǥoti me ǥademaani ” . Odaa Jesus jeǥeeteta , “ Enice , adowetitelogo iniwaxacocoli !

Odaa adakatio niǥina oko aneo ane beyagi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa niǥina ane noomatewa okanicodaaǥica oko , oteǥexaaǥaǥa awitakaǥaǥa . Idioka dakatiobece niǥijo anidiwa liboonaǥatedi me diniditelogo lotaǥanaǥaxi Waxacoco , aneite liboonaǥatedi niǥica baanaǥa idioka limedi me newiǥa .

Naǥajo iwaalo dinixotinigi lipegeteǥe ane ixagodi , me nolidigo lawoǥo . Anitawece nolee icoa nadinaǥajetecidi oolo , wetiadi ane diniwaloe , acaaǥaca “ pérola ” . Ilokadita ijo baxiawaanigi oolo ane nolee , niǥida laxegi eo me nalaǥatibigoǥoji ijoatawece niǥijoa loenataka ane napioi niǥina me loomatewepodi ǥoneleegiwadi .
Odaa ane daǥaxa me leeditibige madinemaanitiwaji , amaleeǥaǥa ǥadilakiitiwage , codaa me ǥadeǥenakitiwaji .
Naǥa niniǥodi Jesus , meetediogi , “ Jiǥicota noko Aneotedoǥoji me idinelecaǥatee , Ee , Ǥoneleegiwa ane jicoǥotibigimece ditibigimedi .
Codaa menitiwaji me daǥa yakadi me joǥolaǥatakanaǥa , pida akamaǥakaami aǥolaǥatakanitiwaji . Codaa ǥadeleǥetedi niwicidi noenataka , pida olicetalo niǥinoa laxedi liǥelatedi niwicidi .

Pida leeǥodi niǥinoa liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji ( me jowooǥodi ane iǥenaǥa ) , odaa nibeyacaǥa ane idei catiwedi yaaleǥena jeǥeo me idocetema ane nebi eledi oko . Igaataǥa daaditiǥicoateda niiǥenatakaneǥeco , nibeyacaǥa ane idei catiwedi yaaleǥena taǥa liciagi niǥina émeǥegi .
Idoweditaǥaloco me diǥicata anodigotaǥawa niǥijoa judeutedi idiaaǥidi ane daǥa judeutedi anicota makaami nakapetegi miditaǥa ane ǥadimonyaatiogi .

Igaataǥa niǥijo jotigide okomoǥoko aǥica deǥele me jowookonaǥa , oteǥexaaǥaǥa ejiwaǥataǥa Aneotedoǥoji , oteǥexaaǥaǥa niǥinoa aninoa naǥatetico , codaa oko ninaalexegi . Jiwaǥatece niǥinoa lidaǥataka ǥodolaadi ane beyagi , codaa joleeǥatibige inokina me jalooǥa . Niǥijo jotigide joleeǥatibige me jaoǥa ane beyagitema eledi oko , codaa oko oceeǥaǥa . Niǥijo oko aǥetiǥodemaa , codaa oko ajinemaanaǥatiniwace .

Lodoe Aneotedoǥoji , codaa me Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo , codaa me lodoe niǥijoa aanjotedi liomaǥataka Aneotedoǥoji , ǥadiiǥeni moteteni niǥinoa ǥanajoineǥeco anejitedaǥawa . Codaa oleetibige midokida anemiitiogi ǥonioxoadipi , codaa niǥina mawini anee eledi oko , jiniǥica ananienaǥaneǥeni daǥa leeǥodi me ǥadokaaǥedi .
Enice idioka limedi mawii mabo ǥadaaleǥena manakatoni Aneotedoǥoji , igaataǥa yajigotedaǥawa niǥica ǥanaǥajegi anele .
Leeditibige niǥina niotagi anida naǥatetigi meo inokina ane yemaa niotagodi .
Odaa Pedro jiǥidiaaǥi owidi nokododi liǥeladi Simão niǥijo nilikenoǥodi ewacogo .
Aǥowooǥotitiwaji makaami liǥeladi Aneotedoǥoji ? Jowooǥodi mowooǥotitiwaji ! Codaa aǥowooǥoti Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo me diǥeladetiwaǥaji ? Jowooǥodi mowooǥotitiwaji !
Enice , inioxoadipi , abo ǥodaaleǥena me jakaǥatio aneite Aneotedoǥoji leeǥodi Jesus me nadooǥoditedoǥoloco lawodi .
Odaa jeǥeetacediogi Jesus , “ Niǥida me Ee icota me jopi . Domoǥoleetibigijitiwaji . Pida niǥida makaamitiwaji idokeeta me ǥademaǥawadi ǥabeyaceǥeco . Aǥakatitiwaji deǥemii ane jopiticogi ” .

Aneotedoǥoji ǥadiolaatedicetiwaji , ǥadiomaǥatitedice makaami loiigi , codaa me ǥademaani . Enice adiniwikodenitiwaji , oleetibige makaami eletema eledi oko , adiniwikodenitibece lodoe eledi oko , codaa ocaǥaneǥeni eledi oko , codaa adinatiitalo niǥinoa anicinoa .
Niǥina ane yemaa me dibatomi , leeditibige me niotici . Odaa anejote jiǥidiaaǥaǥa ite . Odaa Eiodi iweniǥide niǥina ane dibatomi ” .
Niǥini ǥoneleegiwa leeditibige mele me iiǥe liǥeladi , iiǥaxi lionigipi moyiwaǥadi , codaa modeemitetibige .
Enice oleetibige midioka limedi moniciwaǥati eledi ǥanioxoa , codaa axawani amaleeǥaǥa ili ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegitiwaji , niǥijo anenitiwaji jotigide .
Niǥijo natematigo anajipaatatiwaji maleekoka anakatoniteda Ǥoniotagodi yalaǥata me leeditibige me idinemaanaǥatiwage .
Igaataǥa niǥinoa nokododi dakaketoǥodomi . Odaa jakadi mele niǥina oko midaaǥee niǥida anee .
Ica ǥoneleegiwa liboonaǥadi Nicodemus , one fariseu , codaa me lacilo judeutedi .

Idaaǥigote Aneotedoǥoji naǥajo iwaalo agopeloa ane liboonaǥadi Raabe me yakadi me iǥenaǥa leeǥodi loenatagi anele , niǥijo mele me dibatege mini liǥeladi niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi liiǥexedi Aneotedoǥoji loiigi . Odaa Raabe yaǥaditiniwace niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi me doǥoyakadi laxakawepodi , odaa jeǥeo mopitibeci odibata eledi naigi me diǥicata ane doidetema .

Pida Aneotedoǥoji eote me yewiǥatace iwaalo , nige dinigaje , codaa nige dowediteloco lionigipi , nigidokee meyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi , nigidokee me yemaa eledi oko , nigidokee me yewiǥatema Aneotedoǥoji , nige yajacaǥadi lowooko , codaa nige dinajacaǥaditema niǥinoa anepaa lidaǥataka .

Aneotedoǥoji ane Noenoǥodi ǥodoiigi Israel iomaǥaditedice ǥodaamipi me loiigi niǥijo jotigide . Iomaǥaditedicoace niǥijo malee liǥeladi digoida niiǥo Egito , iomiǥigipi midiaaǥi niǥidi nipodigi . Odaa jeǥeote me noiigi-nelegi codaa me ibake loniciwaǥa niǥijo naǥa noǥatedicoace me ideiticoace nipodaǥa Egito .
Aneotedoǥoji yowooǥoditediwece inoatawece ǥodaaleǥenali . Odaa ja ikee me dibatetege niǥijo ane daǥa judeutedi niǥijo naǥaǥa yajigotediogi Liwigo digo anejinaǥa me najigotedoǥowa Liwigo .

Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji niǥijoa anee , “ Jinaǥaǥolaǥatakani ! ” Codaa eledi mee , “ Jinaǥa aijee ! ” Nige daǥa aǥolaǥatakani , pida aijee , akaami laagedi Aneotedoǥoji liciagi niǥijo oko ane daǥa yoteteteda idiwatawece liiǥenatakaneǥeco .
Jajigotiogi lewiǥa ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji , codaa aǥalee nigo . Odaa aǥica ane yakadi me noǥaticoace niǥina naǥa idei ibaaǥadi .

Aneotedoǥoji joaniǥiniaaǥeote mele ǥodaaleǥena . Aleegi , odaa eote manigaanyetece ǥodaxakawa Satanás . Jemaa Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo midioka limedi meletedaǥadomitiwaji . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee . ( Amém ) .
Niǥidi oko onowo modioteci naigi anewi , pida aǥoika Aneotedoǥoji me ibake loniciwaǥa me iigi anee me newiǥa . Timóteo , jiniǥipecitiogi niǥina noiigi liciagi .

Niǥida moko , oko eliodi , ǥodiciagi liwailidi ǥodolaadi . Pida okomoǥokotiwage ǥodiciagi ǥodolaadi mokiditece . Codaa niǥida moko okotawece ǥodexogotege Cristo . Odaa okotawece ida anejinaǥatiwage digo minoataǥa liwailidi ǥodolaadi .

Odaa jakataǥa me jinakatonaǥa niǥinoa notaǥa . Jemaa midioka limedi me iiǥaxinaǥanitece niǥijoa notaǥa amaleeǥaǥa niǥina oko anonakato Aneotedoǥoji midioka limedi me dinoniciwaǥaditibigiwaji mowote loenataka anele . Ele mowo niǥida anejita , odaa ja yaxawa inatawece eledi oko .

Odaa jiǥicotece niǥijo aneeta Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi , niǥijo mee , “ Abraão nakato Aneotedoǥoji , joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me yakadi me iniǥina oko ane iǥenaǥa . ” Odaa jeǥeyatedigi Aneotedoǥoji me “ Lokaaǥedi Aneotedoǥoji ” .

Inioxoadipi , jiǥiwaǥatitetiwaji Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo , Niǥijoa ane Niotagodi inoatawece aninoa , codaa meliodi nimaweneǥegi liciagi Aneotedoǥoji ane ideite digoida ditibigimedi . Enice , jinaǥawii ǥademaanigi oko leeǥodi anodaaǥee mida moko .
Niǥinoa niolatedi liciagi émeǥegi libegi ane domoke ( leeǥodi niǥinoa lotaǥa ) . Idioka limedi moninaaletiniwace oko oibake niǥinoa lotaǥa . Micataǥa diǥini lakeedi niweneeno niolatedi .
Odaa jiǥidaaǥee niǥinoa ǥoneleegiwadi me leeditibige moyemaa naǥana lodawa digo anee moyemaa epaa lolaadi . Niǥina ane yemaa lodawa iniaaǥini epaa dinemaa .
Aneotedoǥoji eniditediogi oko inatawece digawiniteloco ane noiigi . Ja jinataǥa Aneotedoǥoji me dibatetege ane daǥa judeutedi leeǥodi monakato , ane doǥodoletibige me dibatetege Aneotedoǥoji .

Niǥidi oko anoiiǥe libaketedi niiakanaǥaxi leeditibige mewi moyotete niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anoikee anodaaǥeeta ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa moyotete niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco me doǥodeemitetece catiwedi laaleǥena mida anigetiǥida libeyaceǥegi .

Niǥina niotagipi ane niotagodi inaaǥina aneyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi leeditibige me doǥoikatice lakatigi me dineemitetiwage idaaǥida me dinioxomigipi . Pida leeditibige me daǥaxa mele modibatema niotagodi , igaataǥa niǥina niotagodi me dinigaanye leeǥodi libaketedi anele niǥini liotagi , codaa iniaaǥini nakato Ǥoniotagodi , odaa Ǥoniotagodi yemaatedibigo . Iiǥaxinaǥanitece codaa ajoinaǥanitece niǥinoa ane jeloǥoditedaǥawa .
Pida eliodi judeutedi aǥoyiwaǥadi lotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji . Odaa manigidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me deǥeote ijo ane ligegi meote ?
Odaa jiǥijo iodaǥawa ane dibata napocenigi , odaa ja yapoace liwai Jesus . Odaa jaǥanado lawodi , ina ninyoǥodi .
Joaniǥidaa iiǥenatakaneǥegi , madinemaanitiwagetiwaji , digo anejigotaǥawa me ǥademaani .

Codaa jiniǥikanitece ǥadolaadi nibeyacaǥa me ibake meo ane beyagi . Pida adinajicitalo Aneotedoǥoji micataǥa oko ane nigo baanaǥa newiǥatace . Ajicitalo inatawece ǥadolaadi me ibake mawii ane iǥenaǥa .
Niǥida moko aǥoko niǥina anopitege lowidi , odaa jaǥaniatagigipi . Pida baǥa ejiwaǥataǥa Ǥoniotagodi , odaa idioka limedi me ǥodewiǥa .

Odaa jiǥidaaǥee , Aneotedoǥoji eote lewiǥa inatawece loiigi Israel . Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa yalaǥata niǥida niciagi , niǥijo mee , “ Ǥanewikatitoǥodi icoǥoticogi manitaǥa nigotaǥa Sião , odaa enagi napitaǥadi inoatawece libeyaceǥeco oko anida aneetege licoǥegi Jacó .

Niǥidiwa judeutedi jeǥepaa oyeloadi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus , codaa eledi onigodi Aneotedoǥoji liotaka niǥijo jotigide anoyeloǥoditedibece lowooko . Codaa moko eledi etiǥodiatetibece . Niǥidiwa judeutedi owotibige Aneotedoǥoji me yelatetema , codaa odakapetege inatawece oko .
Igaataǥa nigidapaǥa iniwinaǥata midioka limedi me jaoǥa ane beyagi , codaa nige daǥa jikanaǥa me jaoǥa , idaaǥida naǥa jowooǥotaǥa anewi , aǥica eledi ǥonimaweneǥegi menitedice ǥobeyaceǥeco .

Aneotedoǥoji yewikatiditace Cristo , odaa leeǥodi me ǥodexogotege Cristo , odaa ja gela ǥodewiǥa , midioka limedi me ǥodewiǥa miniwataǥa . Odaa icota me ǥodiweniǥide ǥodawanaǥaditetege Cristo digoida ditibigimedi .

Enice , jinaǥaleeǥawitakatiwaji . Pida akaamitawece leeditibige me enita ǥanioxoa inokina anewi , igaataǥa okotawece oko dinoiigiwepodi digo minoataǥa niǥinoa liwailidi ǥodolaadi midiokidi ǥodolaadi anoyexogoteloco .
Pida aǥodiwoditema , oteǥexaaǥaǥa onateciǥica , jaotibige akaamitiwaji midokee makati majipaata , codaa me iwaǥati nibodicetedi anele anewi .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi niǥina ane dotaǥatigi eledi ioladi leeditibige me dipokotalo Aneotedoǥoji me yajigote lowooǥotakaneǥegi me yowooǥodi epaa lotaǥa amaleeǥaǥa yeloǥoditiogi eledi oko ane diitigilo niǥicoa lotaǥa .
Niǥijoa nokododi , Saulo ja dibikotiogi me nigodi niǥijo anodiotibece Ǥoniotagodi Jesus , odaa jiǥigo minitaǥa niǥijo lacilo-sacerdotitedi digoida nigotaǥa Jerusalém .
Pida natigidawaanigi jeǥejigo makaamitaǥa . Ejitece niǥinoa yotaǥa maleeǥeetibige niǥina iiǥo , amaleeǥaǥa niǥina anoniotici eliodi me ninitibigiwaji digo aneji me idinitibeci .

Pida leeditibige maniniitibecetiwaji leeǥodi mawikodeetiwaji anodaaǥeeteda Cristo me dawikode , amaleeǥaǥa eliodi maniniitibece niǥica noko nige dopitedijo Cristo . Niǥica noko inatawece oko onadi niǥica nelegi nimaweneǥegi Cristo , codaa meliodi notoetiigi .
Naǥa jiwitinece , odaa ja jinadi inoatawece eijedi cwaatolo loǥonaka , niǥinoa eijedi ane doxice , inoa ane oyawaligeǥetinigi iiǥo le , codaa me ilaaǥaxodi .

Pida niǥina natigide ele mikani mawiite niǥinoa ane beyagi , jinaǥa eliǥidee , codaa jinoǥoteteni ǥadelaǥa catiwedi ǥadaaleǥenali , codaa jinaǥawii ane beyagitema eledi oko . Jinaǥabeyacaǥati ǥagegi motaǥani , codaa jineǥeni inoa notaǥa ane napioi .
Odaa Paulo jiǥigo dalitiogi , odaa jiǥidiaaǥi miditaǥa , ja libakawepodi , leeǥodi minaaǥina noenatagodi nopecetiidi digo miditaǥa moyoe nopecetiidi .
Odaa jinaǥa domiǥikani nibeyacaǥa daǥa iiǥe ǥadaaleǥena mawiite niǥinoa ane beyagi ane lidaǥataka ǥadolaadi anicota me daa .

Jibakenaǥa naǥatetigi Liboonaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo me jiiǥenaǥatibigiwaji codaa me inajoinaǥatiniwace me leeditibige me ilaǥatibigiwage , codaa me nibaaǥa amaleeǥaǥa odinigaanyetece anoyopotibige me newiǥa .

Niǥijo ǥodaamipi jotigide eliodi monocetema niǥijo ioxoa ane liboonaǥadi José , odaa joǥoyaa micataǥa daǥa niotagi . Odaa niǥijo anodinoojeteta joǥoyadeegiticogi niiǥo Egito . Pida Aneotedoǥoji idioka limedi miniwa mijotaǥa .

Liwigotigi niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko onini ica ǥoneleegiwa ane liboonaǥadi Ágabo . Niǥijo loiigi Ǥoniotagodi me yatecoǥo , noǥone dabiditini Ágabo me idei liwigotigi , odaa jeǥeetece niǥijo Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo ane ikeeta . Odaa jeǥee icota meno ica nigigi nelegi minoataǥa inoatawece ane nipodaǥa niǥina iiǥo . Odaa icota niǥica nigigi maleeǥiniaaǥini Cláudio me ninionigi-eliodi romaanotedi .
Niǥijo Paulo naǥa nigotini me dotaǥa , odaa ja yamaǥatedini lokotidi , codaa ijotawece niǥijo oko aaǥaǥa oyamaǥatedini lokotidi , odaa jiǥidiaaǥi me yotaǥaneǥe Aneotedoǥoji .

Odaa niǥina ane nepilidi Cristo , aǥaleeǥoika lolaadi me iiǥe mowo anepaa yemaa . Pida ja micataǥa daǥa yeleo lolaadi awatege Cristo niǥijo naǥa yeleo madataǥa nicenaǥanaǥate , odaa jiǥidaa niǥinoa lidaǥataka ane beyagi lolaadi , inaaǥinoa lowooko ane beyagi , ja ma .
Inioxoadipi , oleetibige midioka limedi maniniitibece niǥina micotaǥalocotiwaji inoatawece ane latopaco nawikodico .
Nigejinaǥa me ǥodexogotege Aneotedoǥoji , pida eidejonaǥa nexocaǥa miditaǥa nibeyacaǥa , odaa jiwitakaǥa , ajaoǥa niǥica anewi .
Nadi me domoke niǥica ditibigimedi , odaa ja dinikatini ica lakatigi liciagi naǥana niǥelate nelegi one dinigoe idiwatawece cwaatolo liwailidi . Odaa naǥaca niǥelate ja dinikatinigiiǥo .
Niǥida moko anejilapodaǥa inatecibece oicoǥoticogi niiǥotedi Pártia , Média , Elão , Mesopotâmia , niiǥotedi Judéia , Capadócia , Ponto , codaa me Ásia .
Odaa jiǥidaa nigakatitiwaji madiniwaxinaǥanaǥatiti mawii ane yemaa Aneotedoǥoji me eni , codaa mocaǥanitalo , codaa akati mawiite inoatawece anele , codaa mepaanaǥa owooǥoti Aneotedoǥoji .

Timóteo , idejigotaǥawa micataǥa deǥewi makaami ionigi . Jiiǥetaǥawa mawii niǥijoa baanaǥa ejitedaǥawa . Niǥinoa yotaǥa liciagi niǥijoa lotaǥa niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko anoditaǥadici . Niǥinoa notaǥa etiǥadoniciwaǥati mele mideleǥeni niǥinoa ane beyagi codaa manigaanyetece , maǥekeni .

Odaa niǥidiaaǥidi ja jajipata ijo ane napaawaǥateloco me notaǥanaǥa , layaagaǥawa niǥina anelioditiogi oko ane notaǥanaǥateloco digoida ditibigimedi modi , “ Oǥeetetalotiwaji codaa maweniǥideni Aneotedoǥoji ! Jiǥiniaaǥiniwa Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji ane najigotedoǥowa gela ǥodewiǥa . Jiǥiniaaǥiniwa aneliodi loniciwaǥa , codaa meliodi me datale .
Niǥijo jotigide ǥadiciagitiwaji émaǥaǥa , codaa leegitalo Aneotedoǥoji motonitedice , leeǥodi me daǥa iwaǥatiteda codaa leeǥodi ǥadoenataka ane beyagi .

Aǥakatitiwaji daǥa acipeteloco naǥada goopa me ǥodalaǥatibige lemeǥegi Ǥoniotagodi , oditaǥa diǥidiaaǥidi jaǥaǥa acipeteloco eledi goopa anowacipeteloco moiweniǥide niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa . Ayakadi deǥelicitiwaji paon niǥina me ǥodalaǥatibige moyacilotidi lolaadi Ǥoniotagodi leeǥodi okomoǥoko , oditaǥa diǥidiaaǥidi jaǥaǥelici eledi paon anoyeligo moiweniǥide niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa .

Niǥida makaamitiwaji , akaami noiigi ane iomaǥaditedice Aneotedoǥoji mepoka nepiliditeda . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi , jiniǥitineǥeni ane daǥa ǥadodawa , codaa jinoǥowoo niǥinoa ǥadowooko ane napioi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa anoceetema ane nebi eledi oko . Oteǥexaaǥaǥa otaǥanitibige eledi oko , codaa oteǥexaaǥaǥa ǥadalakitibige niǥinoa ane beyagi niǥina motaǥanitiwaji .

Pida niǥina oko ane yapidi laaleǥena yeligo okanicodaaǥica niweenigi , igaataǥa yowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me ikatetece me yeligo okanicodaaǥica niweenigi . Pida niǥina oko ane napioi laaleǥena , codaa ane daǥa nakatoteda Ǥoniotagodi , niǥini oko diletibige daatiǥica gaantokaaǥini ane yapiditema . Igaataǥa iniaaǥini deemitetece laaleǥena mini lapioyaǥajegi , codaa lowooko meletidi napioi .

Ijotawece niǥijo anowajipata Saulo me dotaǥa eliodi moyopo , odaa modi , “ Niǥida ǥoneleegiwa jiǥidaaǥida niǥijo aneote inoatawece me domaǥa yaaǥadi oko anoibake Liboonaǥadi Jesus digoida nigotaǥa Jerusalém . Odaa natigide jeǥenagi digoina idoka libakedi me niwilotiniwace niǥina anodiotibece niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwa , odaa yadeegiticogi midiwataǥa niǥijo anoiiǥe sacerdotitedi digoida nigotaǥa Jerusalém . ”

Pida natigide Cristo ja dibatetege libakedi ane daǥaxa mele caticedi niǥijoa jotigide libaketedi niǥijoa sacerdotiteditigi niǥina iiǥo . Codaa niǥijo Jesus aneote eo Aneotedoǥoji inaa ǥoneleegiwadi moyakadi gela nimaweneǥegi me dinilakidetiwage , eo ane daǥaxa mele , aliciagi niǥijo jotigide anee me dinilakidetetege oko . Igaataǥa niǥijo Aneotedoǥoji neǥeote ligegi , niǥijo aneetetece daǥaxa meletoǥodomi .
Igaataǥa digo aneji malee idewiǥa , idewiǥatema iniokiniwateda Cristo , pida nige ideleo , odaa ja jibatege ica inaǥajegi ane yotetetedomi .
Aneotedoǥoji jiǥiniaa yojogotedini meote niǥica anele catiwedi ǥadaaleǥenali . Odaa ajawienataka meote nigepaa igodi niǥida libakedi . Igodi niǥida libakedi niǥica noko Jesus Cristo nige dopitedijo .

Codaa jowooǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji Lionigi mewi mijoa menagi niǥina iiǥo , codaa me najigotedoǥowa ǥodixakedi , eotedibige me jowooǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji anewi . Codaa ǥodexogotege Niǥijoa anewi , leeǥodi me ǥodexogotege Jesus Cristo ane Lionigi . Iniaaǥiniwa , jiǥiniaaǥiniwa Ǥonoenoǥodi anewi , odaa ida ǥodewiǥa ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo , leeǥodi etoko miniwataǥa , ǥodexogotege .
Nigakatitiwaji , awii me ǥadilakiitege inatawece oko .
Idioka limedi me inibeoonaǥatege ica ǥonaǥajegi Aneotedoǥoji ane ligegitedoǥowa , me daǥa jawienaǥateda , igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji idioka limedi meote niǥina ane ligegi .

Jaote mele ǥadaaleǥenalitiwaji . Joaniǥidaa ane jaotaǥadomi . Aneji me jaotaǥadomitiwaji aliciagi anee niǥina oko anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo . Odaa jinaǥakaami agecaǥalodipi , jinaǥaǥowikomataa , codaa jinaǥadoiitiwaji .
Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi midioka limedi mabo ǥodaaleǥena . Jowooǥotaǥa niǥina maleeǥejonaǥateloco niǥina ǥodolaadi ane diǥica loniciwaǥa , etoko leegitalo me jotonaǥatice aneite Ǥoniotagodi .
Nigica ane wajipatalo yotaǥa , pida aǥeyiwaǥadi , aniǥica anejigota niǥina natigide . Igaataǥa anaǥa janagi daǥa jiwi anejigota oko , pida janagi me jao lewiǥa oko .

Aǥele daǥa ǥodiciagi Caim ane lionigi niǥijo abeyaceǥegi , diaabo . Caim yeloadi epaa nioxoa . Igame leeǥodi ina me yeloadi ? Yeloadi nioxoa leeǥodi Caim idioka limedi meo ane beyagi , pida niǥijo nioxoa biǥidioka limedi meo ane iǥenaǥa .
Codaa inoatawece lidelocotedi ja jabalaǥatigilo , inoa wetiadi nelecoli eletidi ma .

Abraão ja daǥaxa moxiiǥodi daǥaleeǥica lionigi , ja liciagi niǥina oko émeǥegi . Pida mijo owidi lawaǥa , ajakataǥa me inilaaǥataǥa , liciagi yotetitedi digoida ditibigimedi , codaa me liciagi dotiwadi liniogotibece akiidi-eliodi .

Natigide jiweniǥidenaǥa codaa idioka limedi mele me jiboonaǥateenaǥa niǥijoa ǥoninionigi-eliodi anidioka limedi me diiǥenataka , Niǥijoa ane daǥa yeleoteda , ane diǥicoateda me jinataǥa , oniniwatece me Ǥonoenoǥodi , anowidi lixaketedi . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee ( Amém ) .

Mee me dinigetaǥatee , “ Eemiteetibige Aneotedoǥoji , codaa oǥeetetalo leeǥodi jiǥiniaaǥiniwa ane daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi ! Leeǥodi jiǥicota lakata Aneotedoǥoji me iwi anigotediogi oko codaa me iloikatidi . Oǥeetetalotiwaji Niǥiniwa ane yoe ditibigimedi , iiǥo , akiidi-eliodi , codaa me niǥinoa ninyokotiidi-libecoli . ”

Niǥijoa nokododi eliodi me ili ane liwokodi anodiotibece Ǥoniotagodi . Odaa jiǥida ica notigimadigi miditaǥa judeutedi anodotaǥatigi nioladi greegotedi icaaǥica judeutedi anodotaǥatigi ioladi hebraico . Niǥijo anodotaǥatigi ioladi greego modi ica wajekalodipi aniditigi miditaǥa me diǥica modibatege liweenigi anoyopotibige niǥina modinawalacetibige niweenigi inoatawece nokododi .

Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji eniditedaǥawatiwaji mawii niǥica ane yemaa , odaa yemaa me ixomaǥateenitedijotiwaji niǥinoa ǥadawikodico , niǥina mawikodee leeǥodi mawii anele . Leeǥodi ijaaǥijoa Cristo dawikodetedoǥodomi , odaa ja nikeetedoǥowa ane leeditibige mejinaǥa niǥina me jawikodeeǥa . Odaa leeditibige me jaoǥa liciagi Cristo anee niǥijo me dawikode .
Igaataǥa niǥijo midiaaǥejonaǥa makaamitaǥatiwaji , eliodi me ǥadajoineǥegitece me niǥina ane daǥa yemaa me diba , ayakadi daǥaniodi .

Aneotedoǥoji eliodi me yemaa okotigi digoina iiǥo , joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me yajigo niǥijoa oniniwatece me Lionigi lemaanigi , eotedibige minatawece niǥina anoyiwaǥadi aǥalee nigo , pida jiǥida lewiǥa ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji .

Pida ica noko moibake Liboonaǥadi Jesus me domoǥoiticoitice niwigo abeyaceǥegi ane dakatiogi ica ǥoneleegiwa , odaa niǥica niwigo abeyaceǥegi ja niniǥodi , meetiogi , “ Niǥijoa Jesus jowooǥodi , codaa me Paulo jowooǥodi . Baǥakaami , amakaamitiwaji ? ”

Odaa niǥidiaaǥidi ja jinadi niǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide , ijaaǥijoa inionaǥa-eloodolitigi niǥina iiǥo , ijaaǥijoa niodaǥawadi , dinatecoǥotee moideleǥe niǥijo ane waxoditeloco apolicaǥanaǥa lapaceǥegi , ijaaǥijoa aaǥaǥa niodaǥawadi .

Odaa ja jibaǥata ajo etogo-nelegi ane icoǥoticogi nigotaǥa Adramítio . Odaa naǥajo etogo ja igo migo midiwataǥa nigotadi miditaǥa nipodigi Ásia , odaa ja iniwiajeeǥa . Ijo me ǥodixigaǥawa Aristarco anelatibige nigotaǥa Tessalônica aneiteloco nipodigi Macedônia .

Idioka limedi manalakitibigetiwaji maxawani niǥina anoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi ane niwilogojedi , micataǥa daǥakaami eledi ǥaniwilaǥawepodi . Eleditace oleetibige midioka limedi manalakitibige niǥina ane nawikodeeǥa leeǥodi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi micataǥa daǥakaami eleditetiwaji ǥadawikodaǥawepodi .

Enice okanicodaaǥicoateda ane ǥadotaǥa , codaa mokanicodaaǥica anawii , oleetibige manelecaǥateeni Liboonaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus . Codaa niǥina maniotagodeetalo Aneotedoǥoji , Ǥodiodi , abakeni Liboonaǥadi Jesus .
Niǥijo ane diniiǥaxitece niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anoditece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , leeditibige niǥijo oko me niwaiǥawatece icoa ane nepilidi niǥijo niiǥaxinoǥodi .

Aneotedoǥoji aǥica daǥa yajigote Abraão oteǥexaaǥaǥa liwaiawaanigi niǥidi nipodigi . Pida Aneotedoǥoji beǥeote ligegiteta Abraão micota me yajigoteta iditawece niǥidi nipodigi me nebi anida aneetege licoǥegi , idaaǥee maleediǥicata lionigi Abraão .
Odaa niǥica inionigi-eliodi ja ninaaletiniwace ǥodaamipi , codaa eote ane beyagitema neǥepaaǥicota me iedeǥe moyaladi niǥinoa lionaǥa baǥalee nigaanigipawaanigi , eotibige me nigo .
Odaa Pedro ijaaǥijo lokaaǥedi jaǥaǥigotibeci midataǥa wetiǥa-lawimaǥajegi anoyatice lolaadi Jesus .
Leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji meote niǥida anejita , odaa idioka limedi me idinoniciwaǥadi me diǥicata ane jeemitece catiwedi yaaleǥena ane beyagi lodoe Aneotedoǥoji codaa me niǥina eledi oko .

Niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi micataǥa niǥinoa nebekadi akiidi-eliodi , codaa niǥinoa libaketedi ane ǥoboliǥa liciagi niǥina latiamaǥa ebekadi . Niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi liciagi niǥinoa yotetitedi ane wakagi , odaa ipe miditaǥa nexocaǥa , igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji ja ilakidetedi niǥica nimedi ane daǥaxa me nexocaǥa midiaaǥiticoace nigepaa ganigicatibige .
Igaataǥa aǥoko ane najigotiwa niǥida natematigo anele , codaa aǥica ane idiiǥaxitece niǥinoa nibodicetedi anele . Pida Jesus Cristo jiniaaǥiniwa ane nikeetediwa niǥida natematigo .

Igaataǥa niǥijo malee ǥodiiǥe ǥolidaǥataka ane beyagi , odaa liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji joǥowo me jowooǥatibige ane iǥenaǥa . Pida niǥinoa ǥolidaǥataka owo mepaanaǥa jaoǥa ane beyagi . Odaa niǥijoa ǥobeyaceǥeco etiǥodadeegita ǥodemaǥa , odaa idiokaanaǥa domaǥa limedi me jotonaǥatedice Aneotedoǥoji .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Ǥoniotagodi meote me ee liiǥexegi . Idiiǥe me jeloǥodi ǥobodicetedi anele , codaa me jiiǥaxinaǥatece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi anewi miditaǥa niǥidi noiigi ane daǥa judeutedi . Niǥida me ee ajiwitaka , jeloǥodi anewi , leeǥodi mida anejitege Cristo .
Niǥina oko aneyiwaǥadi liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji idioka limedi me yexogotege , codaa Aneotedoǥoji iniwa mijotaǥa . Jowooǥotaǥa me iniwa catiwedi ǥodaaleǥena leeǥodi Liwigo ane najigotedoǥowa .
Aǥica ane yakadi me doletibige inokina ane yemaa , pida leeditibige me joleeǥatibige me jaoǥa inokina ane yaxawa eledi ǥonioxoa .
Aniwotitema eledi oko . Jinaǥakaami anaǥaxakeneǥegi , pida oleetibige me ǥadokaaǥedi ane daǥa ǥoneǥegi . Jinaǥaleetibige daǥa daǥaxa mida ǥadixakedi caticedi niǥina eledi oko .

Jinaǥaleeǥikani daǥa abeyaceǥe ǥadaaleǥenali , jinaǥaleeǥoteteni ǥadelaǥatema eledi oko , oteǥexaaǥaǥa eliǥidee . Jinaǥapaaweni eledi oko , jinaǥa iwoo eledi oko , codaa jinaǥalee beyagi mowootibige eledi oko .
Aneotedoǥoji eote me ee liotagi loiigi Cristo . Najigotediwa ibakedi me jao aneletaǥadomitiwaji . Ibakedi me jeloǥoditedibece inoatawece Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa .
Lamodi daǥaxa me yapacaǥa liciagi gotamoǥo . Ligecooǥe ídi me datale micataǥa niǥina ǥalewaǥa .

Igaataǥa ja jixomaǥateenaǥatedice inoatawece ane ǥodawikodico jaoǥatibige Aneotedoǥoji meote aneletaǥadomitiwaji . Joaniǥidaa Aneotedoǥoji midokee meote ane daǥaxa meletema eliodi oko . Codaa elioditace oko odiniotagodetalo Aneotedoǥoji , odaa jiǥidaaǥee eliodi oko odoǥetetalo Aneotedoǥoji .
Niǥina ane yeligo yolaadi , codaa ane wacipetalo yawodi , idiokaanaǥa limedi mini meetaǥa , codaa ite Ee minitaǥa .

Naǥa niniǥodi Marta , meetalo , “ Ejiwaǥadi , Iniwa-aagodi . Codaa ǥadadiwaǥati naǥa-aamaǥa-aami Niǥicoa ane ni-iiǥe Aneotedoǥoji meote ǥodewiǥa , niǥicoa Aneotedoǥoji Li-oonigi anenagi niǥina i-iiǥo ” .

Odaa ijotawece niǥijo anoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi idapaǥa diiticogi modeemitetigilo niǥijoa liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco niǥijoa liiǥexedi Ǥoniotagodi , codaa oikee me dinemaatiwage , codaa idioka limedi me dinatecoǥotee niǥina me niodaǥa codaa moyotaǥaneǥe Aneotedoǥoji .

Emaani niǥina ane iǥenaǥa , codaa ǥadeleǥedi niǥina ane beyagi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Ee , Ǥanoenoǥodi Aneotedoǥoji , me ǥadiolaatice , codaa me ǥadiweniǥideni caticedi niǥijoa ǥadokaaǥetedipi , codaa jiǥidaa me jao meliodi me aniniitibeci . ”
Odaa ja diiǥenatakata moyeloadi Tiago niǥijo nioxoa João , oyatita nodaajo-ocaǥataǥa moyeloadi .

Pida oxaxini jinaǥa adinotigimadenitege niǥina oko ane dinotigimadetiwage leeǥodi niǥinoa notaǥa ane diǥica jaoǥate , niǥidi oko ane doǥodeemitetibige Aneotedoǥoji . Igaataǥa niǥina me dinotigimadetiwage , owo eledi oko mepaanaǥa leegita me yetecetedice Aneotedoǥoji .
Niǥina oko ane leleǥedi nioxoa , aijekegi . Odaa owooǥotitiwaji niǥina aijekegi aǥica lewiǥa miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji .

Igaanaǥa niataǥa me niodaǥa , odaa Jesus jeǥeeteta Simão Pedro , “ Simão lionigi Jonas , ademaani caticedi niǥina eledi metidemaa ? ” Naǥa niniǥodi meetalo , “ Jiǥidaaǥee Iniotagodi , ǥademaani . Codaa owooǥoti me ǥademaani ” . Odaa jeǥeete Jesus , “ Enice , owieni iniwaxacocoli ! ”

Yajigota oko lixakedi me yajacaǥadi eledi oko mida lowooǥotakaneǥegi , odaa iniaaǥini Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo baǥa yajigota eledi oko me lixakedi me diiǥaxinaǥatece anodaaǥee me jowooǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Niǥijo niǥicota mitoataale migotibeci Egito , odaa José ja dinatematitiogi me niǥiniaaǥini . Odaa Faraó ja wajipatibece moyalaǥatiogi loiigiwepodi José .

Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa yalaǥata niǥini oko , mee , “ Niǥina oko ane yemaa midioka limedi me ninitibece , codaa nige yemaa niǥinoa nokododi me yewiǥa meletema , leeditibige me yajacaǥadi nioladi me deǥeetece niǥina ane beyagi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa inaale eledi oko .
Iditawece niǥijo anonakato Ǥoniotagodi idokida ane lowoogo , codaa idokida anee . Aǥica anee mepoka nepilidi niǥinoa ane nepilidi , pida iditawece odinawalacetibige inoatawece anoyakadi .

Niǥijo iniiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi anonajigotiwa , ane daǥaxa mida ane jaoǥa , joaniǥidaa ane jajigotaǥawatiwaji . Niǥida niiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi eetece Cristo me yeleotedeloco ǥobeyaceǥeco , digo aneeta nidigo midi liwai oxiiǥodi Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi .

Aneotedoǥoji iloikatidi naǥani nigotaǥa leeǥodi catiwedi aniaaǥani naǥani nigotaǥa oyakadi lawodi niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko , codaa me lawodi niǥijo noiigi Aneotedoǥoji ane iomaǥaditedice mepoka nepiliditeda , codaa me lawodi ijotawece niǥijo anonigodi digoina iiǥo . ”

Odaa niǥijo ane daǥa judeutedi noǥowajipatalo niǥinoa notaǥa , odaa eliodi me ninitibigiwaji , codaa moiweniǥide lotaǥa Ǥoniotagodi . Odaa joǥonakato Ǥoniotagodi ijotawece niǥijo Aneotedoǥoji ane ixipetedicoace meote me newiǥatace .
Niǥijoa ane yeloǥodi niǥinoa notaǥa anewi aniwoteloco naǥadi notaǥanaǥaxi mee , “ Ewi me daǥa leegi , odaa ja janagi . ” Jiǥidaaǥee ! ( Amém ) . Anagi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus !

Awii niǥijo ane jajigotaǥawa me oenitiwaji , baanaǥa jiiǥaxitaǥadicitiwaji . Awii niǥijo anejitaǥawa , codaa iwitece anodaaǥeji . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji eote ǥadaaleǥena mele , codaa ideite makaamitaǥatiwaji .
Pida jinaǥa ademiita micataǥa daǥa ǥadidelaǥawa , baǥa aladeeni micataǥa ǥanioxoa .

Adinowetitiwaji adiǥica aneo makaami nioǥododi leeǥotedi liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ane deǥewiteda , nowooko ane diǥicata jaoǥate , ane ninaaletiniwace oko . Odiiǥaxinaǥatece inokinoateda epaa lakataǥa ǥoneleegiwadi , lixaketedi ǥoneleegiwadi , ane daǥa icoǥotedigi miniwataǥa Cristo .

Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeniditediwa digoida ditibigimedi me idewiǥatema Jesus Cristo , odaa idinoniciwaǥadi ( micataǥa niǥina nalokodeǥecajo ) me joletibige me inigaanyetece niǥica inoǥeedi , aneetediwa Cristo me najigotediwa leeǥodi me idewiǥatema .

Iniaaǥiniwa Jesus Cristo dinajigo me yeleotedoǥodomi , eotedibige me yedia niǥica ane lica loojedi me ǥodoǥatedicogi inoatawece ǥobeyaceǥeco , codaa me ǥodapitaǥadi , codaa meote moko niǥina anida aneetetege , codaa me dinoniciwaǥaditibigiwaji moyoe niǥica anele .

Ejitaǥawatiwaji niǥina anewi . Niǥina ane wajipatalo yotaǥa , odaa eyiwaǥadi Niǥijoa ane idimonya , joaniǥiniaa ida lewiǥa miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo . Aneotedoǥoji aǥalee iwi ane igote , oteǥexaaǥaǥa icata lawikodigi , pida ja iwoko némaǥa , ja yewiǥa .
Niǥijo aanjo ane idotaǥaneǥe ida libikotanaǥanaǥadi oolo lajo me ibikota ane lica naǥani nigotaǥa , lapoaco , codaa me niǥidi niwilanigi .

Aneotedoǥoji iiǥetedicogi minitaǥa noledi ane daǥa ipe . Niǥidi oko inoka oyiwaǥadi niǥicoa anepaa lemaanaǥa lolaadi . Odinaǥaxaketece niǥicoa loenataka ane beyagi ane domaǥa leeditibige moniboliǥatece . Inoka oyowo niǥinoa anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo .

Niǥina ane dowediteloco loiigi Aneotedoǥoji , leeditibige me diǥiniǥina ǥoneleegiwa ane gela me nakato Ǥoniotagodi , amanagawini niǥini ǥoneleegiwa adinanetibece . Igaataǥa niǥina ane dinanetibece , Aneotedoǥoji icota me iloikatidi digo mijotaǥa diaabo me iloikatidi .

Yokaaǥetedipi yemaanigipi , domaǥa eliodi me jemaa me jidikotibigaǥajitiwaji me idalaǥata anodaaǥee Aneotedoǥoji meote me ǥodewiǥatace okotawece .
