Pida jakadi meneǥegi leeditibige me jidikotibigaǥajitiwaji me ǥadoniciwaǥati manienaǥaneǥeni niǥinoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa makapetege niǥina anoyemaa moiigi niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco Ǥoniotagodi ane nenyaǥaditetema niǥina anoyiwaǥadi , liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anidioka limedi mida ane jaoǥate .
Odaa neliǥideeǥa leeǥodi niǥijoa itoataale liiǥexedi Aneotedoǥoji modiiǥaxinaǥatece icoa émaǥaǥa micota me newiǥatace leeǥodi naǥa yewiǥatace Jesus .

Igaataǥa loenataka ane beyagi ja ili , ja liciagi niǥina niladienigi baanaǥa leegitibigimece , ane iwidatibigimece neǥepaa lolaadi . Pida Aneotedoǥoji nalaǥatigilo niǥina mowotema ane beyagi niǥina oko , joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me iloikatidi .

Odaa Jesus joǥopitacedicogi digoida nigotaǥa Caná nipodigi Galiléia . Joaniǥidiaa yelite neǥeote ninyoǥodi me viinyo . Oninica ǥoneleegiwa ǥoneǥegi niǥeladimigitigi nigotaǥa Cafarnaum . Niǥini ǥoneleegiwa liotagi inionigi-eliodi . Niǥijo lionigi niǥini ǥoneleegiwa deelotika digoida nigotaǥa Cafarnaum .
Jinaǥakaami abaciǥegitema ǥabakedi . Awii libakedi Ǥoniotagodi manitawece codaa mele ǥadaaleǥena .

Idaaǥidata me diǥicoateda manati Ǥoniotagodi , pida emaani . Idaaǥidata me diǥicoateda manati niǥina natigide , pida anakatoni , odaa eliodi maniniitibecetiwaji , codaa oteǥexaaǥaǥa akati meloǥoti anodaaǥee ǥadinikegi .
Jowooǥotaǥa me ǥodexogotege Aneotedoǥoji , codaa maǥaǥa iniwa catiwedi ǥodaaleǥenali , leeǥodi me najigotedoǥowa Liwigo .

Ada ajo laǥaaǥaxi viinyo ane daǥa dakake loojedi ( anepoka lacipaǥadi niǥinoda madewetedi ) . Odaa joǥoititinigi niǥijo viinyo naǥajo ane liciagi coxao . Odaa joǥoigoeteloco niǥijo iwoǥo anoyakagidi libiwe “ hissopo ” . Odaa joǥoyatiwece nioladi Jesus .
Ǥodoǥatedice mejonaǥateloco loniciwaǥa nexocaǥa , codaa eote Lionigi lemaanigi me iiǥe ǥodaaleǥenali .

Inioxoadipi . Jipokotaǥawatiwaji manidakitigi niǥina anodoletibige mowo mawalaceticoace , codaa madinotigimadenitiwage . Niǥidi noiigi oibeyacaǥadi eledi oko eliwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa modakapetege niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , baanaǥa owooǥotitetiwaji . Awalacetege niǥidi noiigi , jinaǥaleeǥawanitege .
Nige najigotedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji ǥodixakedi me jaxawanaǥa eledi oko , dice jaxawanaǥa . Nige najigotedoǥowa ǥodixakedi me jiiǥaxinaǥanaǥatece lotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji , dice jiiǥaxinaǥanaǥa .

Nigicota niǥica noko me jopiticogi miniwataǥa Eiodi , odaa aǥalee leeditibige madigee . Ewi niǥida anejitaǥawatiwaji . Nigabakeni Iboonaǥadi mipokita okanicodaaǥicata anemaani , odaa jiǥidiaa yajigotedaǥawa Eiodi .

Niwetiadi lipodaǥaladi niǥidi niwilanigi onadineǥeta inoatawece ane latopaco wetiadi ane diniwaloe . Niǥicoa wetiadi anoibake , liboonaǥatedi Jaspe , Safira , Ágata , Esmeralda , Sardônio , Sárdio , Crisólito , Berilo , Topázio , Crisópraso , Jacinto , Ametista .
Enice , niǥina oko ane domaǥa yakadi meo anigida anele , pida aǥeo , niǥini oko jeǥeo ane beyagi .

Odaa ja jajipata ica ane dotaǥa ipegitege naǥajo baanco ǥoneǥe mee me dotaǥa , “ Oǥeetetalo Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji , akaamitawece anakaami liotaka , akaamitawece anakaami iwikodadipi , codaa anakaami ǥoneǥaǥa , akaamitawecetiwaji ane eemiteetibige Aneotedoǥoji ! ”
Pida digoina iiǥo inikanaǥaticobece ǥodaadi leeǥodi meliodi me jemaanaǥa me age me jibaǥatege ǥodolaadi gela ane liciagi diimigi anele digoida ditibigimedi .

Igaataǥa oninitecibeci oko leeditibige me iwi niǥica ane loenatagi . Nigele niǥica aneo , enice yakadi me ninitibece leeǥodi loenatagi , idiǥida aleeǥodi daǥa diniciaceeketege eledi oko , oditaǥa yakadi meneǥegi ele .

Niǥina midi oko ane dinilakidetiwage me dinodawamigi , pida nige leegitege niǥica noko me nadonaǥa , odaa niǥini ǥoneleegiwa nige daǥadiaa yakadi me dinatita , pida nige yemaa me age me wado , enice ele me age me dinodawamigi . Aǥica libatiigi .
Etiǥaditicoiticoace wetice niiakanaǥaxiidi . Codaa icota noko , niǥina anetiǥadeloati odiletibige doǥowo libakedi Aneotedoǥoji .

Niǥidiaaǥidi ja jinadi digoida ditibigimedi niǥina ane jopooǥa codaa ane yakadi me ǥodawelaǥadi . Jinadi ijoa seete aanjotedi anonadeegi ijoa seete nawikodico . Pida joǥowidijedi leeǥodi joǥoigoditece icoatawece nawikodico ane niwakateetedigi Aneotedoǥoji niǥina oko digoina iiǥo . Yelatetema leeǥodi libeyaceǥeco .
Naǥa niniǥodi Jesus , meeteta , “ Nige beyagi niǥijo igegi , enice anikeenitiwa ica ibatiigi . Pida nigele niǥijo igegi , igatime leeǥodi madabakeni ? ”

Yokaaǥedi , anidokee madaxawani , jipokotaǥawa maxawani niǥidi itoataale iwaalepodi . Igaataǥa niǥidi itoa iwaalepodi , ijaa Clemente , codaa me iditawece niǥijo eletidi yokaaǥetedipi , eliodi me yaxawepodi me jibaaǥa , me jeloǥotaǥatedibece ǥobodicetedi anele ane icoǥotedicogi miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji . Aneotedoǥoji ja iditedini liboonaǥatedi niǥidi oko maditaǥa naǥajo notaǥanaǥaxi anidiwa liboonaǥatedi oko anicota me yewikatiditace odaa jiǥidiaaǥi miniwataǥa .

Igaataǥa niǥidi oko onadooǥodi lawodi noiigi anaolaatice me ǥadoiigi , codaa me lawodi niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece ǥadowooko . Odaa jaǥajicitiogi ǥodawodi mowacipetalo . Odaa natigide joǥodibatege ane loojedi niǥijo loenatagi ane beyagi . ”
Ayakadi diǥidaaǥejinaǥa ! Igaataǥa ǥodiciagi niǥina oko émeǥegi ane daǥadiaa yakadi meo ane beyagi . Odaa ayakadi diǥidioka limedi me jaoǥa ane beyagi .

Odaa niǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide baaniǥijo me yewiǥa , pida natigide aǥaleeǥica me yewiǥa , boǥone eledi inionigi-eliodi ane diiǥenataka nige nigotedice niǥijoa seete . Nokaaǥedi niǥijoa seete , codaa eledi igo minitaǥa noledi ane daǥa ipe .

Pida Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi ikee niǥica Aneotedoǥoji ane iiǥeteta Abraão , niǥijo meete , “ Amonyaa mopi naǥani iwaalo niota , iniaaǥini niǥini lionigi ! Igaataǥa niǥina lionigi naǥana iwaalo niota ayakadi daǥa yawalace ane nepilidi eliodi daǥa niwaiǥawa niǥijo lionigi naǥani iwaalo ane daǥa niota . ”

Pida niǥina anodoletibige me liicotedi , diaabo icota me dineetiogi , odaa ja dibatiogi eloona . Odaa eloona diaabo jeǥeo minoa lakataǥa ane deǥeleteda , codaa me lowooko yetoliwadi ane yaaǥadi lewiǥa , odaa jaǥaniaditema icoatawece niǥicoa ane domaǥa nepilidi .

Codaa niǥijoa deez libiwedi ananati , ijaaǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide oyelatema naǥani iwaalo agopeloa . Odaa icota monatetibige icoatawece niǥicoa ane nepilidi , codaa oyoladiti anitawece owo mokanitani . Oyeligo liboledi naǥani iwaalo , odaa nigica ane yeyaǥatice , boǥoyalegi .
Pida Aneotedoǥoji yowooǥodi niǥina oko anoyemaa .

Enice igamodaaǥee ? Ina anoko judeutedi domigica aneletoǥodomi agoda ǥodiciagi ina ane daǥa judeutedi ? Ee meji aǥica aneletoǥodomi ! Igaataǥa ja jikeenaǥa nibeyacaǥa mida loniciwaǥateloco inatawece oko , judeu , codaa ane daǥa judeu .

Joaniǥijaaǥijoatigilo niǥijoa nokododi noǥoibake oolo mowo ica wacawaanigi anowo me noenoǥodi , odaa joǥonigoditema eijedi modoǥeteta niǥijo wacawaanigi , codaa owo nalokegi moiweniǥide niǥijo niwigo anepaa loenatagi .

Pida niǥijo oko ane iwoko me nigo idioka limedi aǥoika mowo ane beyagi . Aǥoika modaǥatalo niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa , niǥinoa niwicidi anonoetedi odatikata oolo , beexo , “ bronze ” , wetiǥa , codaa me iwoǥo . Niǥidiwa niwicidi anodaǥatalo ayatetibigiwaji , anajipaaǥa oteǥexaaǥaǥa ewaligiteda .

Niǥida moko jowooǥotaǥa Ǥoniotagodi micota me iloikatidi niǥina oko leeǥodi libeyaceǥeco . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me jeemiteeǥatibige codaa me idoiiǥatalo niǥina me joleeǥatibige me jajacaǥataǥa niǥina oko moika mowo ane beyagi . Aneotedoǥoji yowooǥodi ane ǥodowooko , codaa anodaaǥejinaǥa me ǥodewiǥa . Odaa inibeotege makaami eleditetiwaji owooǥoti catiwedi ǥadaaleǥenali anodaaǥee ǥodowoogo codaa anodaaǥejinaǥa me ǥodewiǥa .

Niǥijo jotigide okotawece idejinaǥa digo mijotaǥa niǥijo oko , digo anee niǥijo oko ane yewiǥatema idokida mowo niǥica ane yemaa lolaadi . Jaoǥate okanicodaaǥica ane yemaa ǥodolaadi meote , codaa eledi jaoǥate okanicodaaǥica ane ǥodiiǥe ǥodowooko ane beyagi me jaoǥa . Odaa joaniǥidaa Aneotedoǥoji me yelatedoǥodomi leeǥodi ǥobeyaceǥeco , anigotediogi me yelatetema ijotawece niǥijo oko anidioka limedi mowote ane beyagi .
Pedro eǥidaaǥee me dotaǥa , odaa ja najoitiniwace , meetiogi , “ Adinenyaǥatitiwaji amaleeǥaǥa ǥadiwokoni niǥica noko Aneotedoǥoji nige iloikatidi niǥina noiigi abeyacaǥaǥa ! ”

Igaataǥa nige iwitecetiwaji ane lidaǥataka ǥadaaleǥenali , aǥica daǥawienatakanitiwaji me ǥadelewi , codaa midiokaanaǥa limedi motonitedice Aneotedoǥoji . Pida Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji yakadi me yajigotaǥawa ǥanimaweneǥegi me ikani mawii niǥinoa anakamaǥa ǥalidaǥataka mawiite . Odaa nigikani mawiite niǥinoa ǥadaaleǥenali lidekeco ane beyagi , odaa idiokaanaǥa limedi me ǥadewikitiwaji miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Igaataǥa mee Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi , “ Inatawece niǥina anonakato Ǥoniotagodi aǥica liboliǥa . ”

Odoejegi nimedi iniotagodetalo Aneotedoǥoji Inoenoǥodi leeǥodi akaamitawecetiwaji , leeǥodi niǥijo Jesus Cristo aneotedaǥadomitiwaji . Igaataǥa inatawece niǥina oko digoina iiǥo odibodiceta ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegitiwaji .
Ǥonioxoadipi , jowooǥotaǥa me ǥademaanitetiwaji Aneotedoǥoji , codaa me ǥadiomaǥatitedicoace makaami nepilidi .
Niǥica ane daǥaxa mida ane jaoǥa niǥina memaanitiwaji oninitecibeci ǥanioxoadipi manitawece ǥadaaleǥena . Igaataǥa niǥina oko ane yemaa nioxoa ixomaǥateetedice inoatawece ane beyagi aneotema .

Niǥijo aninoa naǥatetico naǥa lowoogo me leeditibige me jibaǥata ajo etogo-nelegi me iniwiajeeǥaticogi nipodigi Itália , odaa Paulo ijaaǥijoa onateciǥijoa eletidi niwilogojedi joǥoyajigota Júlio niǥijo jajeentegi anida aneetege niǥijo lapo iodaǥawadi anodibatema César , niǥijo ninionigi-eliodi romaanotedi .

Nigaanaǥanaǥa , oigaa ijo elaagi Moisés niǥijo liotagi Aneotedoǥoji ijaaǥijo elaagi Waxacoco . Modi me nigaanaǥanaǥa , “ Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji , eliodi ǥadoniciwaǥa . Codaa eloodoli niǥinoa ǥadoenataka ane joxicaǥatema . Jaǥakamaǥakaami ninionigi-eliodi noiigi ane aolaatice me ǥadoiigi . Iǥenaǥa codaa ewi niǥinoa ǥadowooko .

Niǥina nigaanigawaanigi ane gela menitini dacaagetibece doletigi milibi , odaa awii liciagitiwaji , oleetibige Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa ane jiciaceeketege niǥinoa lotiidi eniodo . Niǥidiwa notaǥa liciagi lotiidi eniodo ane diǥica lapioyaǥajegi , odaa jiǥidiaaǥowo me ili ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi , odaa ele mowooǥoti niǥinoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi . Odaa jiǥidaa nige ili niǥida ǥadewiǥa gela .

Odaa ja jajipata ica anee me dotaǥa digoida ditibigimedi , “ Idiitedini yotaǥa : Icota me ninitibigiwaji niǥina ane nigo niǥina natigide leeǥodi modiotece Ǥoniotagodi . ” Odaa Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo ja niwoditema niǥijo ane dotaǥa , meeta , “ Ewi ! Niǥidi oko ja nipenaǥatema libaketedi , codaa aǥaniaditema naǥajegi leeǥodi libakedi . ”

Aneotedoǥoji , ane Ǥodiodi , yakadi niǥina oko mida eliwaǥatakaneǥegi ane diǥicata libatiigi , codaa mewi , niǥina me yaxawa niǥina eledi oko aninoa ane yopotibige , digo micataǥa nigaanigipawaanigi exiijigipi , codaa me wajekalodipi . Niǥina oko anewi mida eliwaǥatakaneǥegi , niǥini oko ane dinotetetema niǥinoa ane napioi ane lakataǥa niǥina iiǥo .
Jao ǥadeemiditiwaji amanagawini aǥica ane ǥadinaaleni , aneetece niwitakeco , ibake niǥinoa notaǥa libinienaǥa .

Odaa ja jajipatiogi iditawece ane newiǥa digoida ditibigimedi , digoina iiǥo , codaa aneite émaǥaǥa , codaa aneitinigi akiidi-eliodi . Iditawece modi , “ Niǥiniwa ane nicoteloco nibaanco me ǥoneǥegi , idaaǥidoa anoiciaceeketege Waxacoco , leeditibige midioka limedi me joǥeeǥatiogi , jiweniǥidenaǥa , jocaǥanaǥatiogi , codaa me jikanaǥatece ane naǥatetigi . ”

Naǥa yatetigi niǥijo eledi aanjo nigoloneeta , ini ijo ane liciagi naǥana wetiǥa ane leegitibigimece ane yabidi , analee oyokoletinigi akiidi-eliodi , odaa oniniteci niǥidiwa iniwatadiǥini liwailidi niǥidi ninyoǥodi ja ǥodawodi .

Odaa joǥoyamaǥaticogi we nigotaǥa , odaa joǥoixipetedice niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi anakaa beyagi modotaǥatibige Estêvão monigidatice . Odaa niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi joǥoyoyato nicaapatedi ica lioneeǥa ane liboonaǥadi Saulo me yowie .
Codaa eleditace mee , “ Akaamitawecetiwaji ane daǥakaami judeutedi oǥeetetalo Ǥoniotagodi ! Igaataǥa inatawece ane noiigi leeditibige modoǥetetalo . ”

Igaataǥa iliidaǥadi inoatawece , codaa inoatawece aninoa idioka limedi minoa leeǥodi nimaweneǥegi , codaa inoatawece aninoa , iniaa loenataka , codaa modoǥetetalo leeǥodi loenataka . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me leeditibige midioka limedi me joǥeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee . ( Amém ) .

Neǥeledi noko João ja naditege Jesus migo midataǥa . Odaa João jeǥee , “ Digawinitege ! Niǥinoa joaniǥinaaǥinoa Waxacoco ane niwakateetedigi Aneotedoǥoji , ane noǥa libeyaceǥeco inatawece oko digoina iiǥo .

Aca Raabe , one ewocoma , pida ikee me nakato Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo mele me dibatege catiwedi liǥeladi niǥijoa israelitatedi anigotibeci moiǥoadita nigotaǥa me diǥica ane yowooǥodi . Leeǥodi Raabe me nakato Aneotedoǥoji , odaa ayeleo aǥawatege niǥijo eledi niǥeladimigipi ane doǥoyiwaǥaditeda Aneotedoǥoji .

Niǥina oliceǥegi inoka eletema me dolice , daije , codaa me yaaǥadi ane daǥa nebi . Pida Ee baǥa janagi me jao lewiǥa oko ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji codaa jao moyakadi inoatawece anoyopotibige me newiǥa digoina iiǥo , micataǥa niǥina nowienoǥodi waxacoco me doweditelogo niwaxacocoli , codaa me yediatece inoatawece anoyopotibige .

Pida okomoǥoko ǥonipodigi anejonaǥa baǥa digoida ditibigimedi . Idioka limedi me inibeoonaǥatege lanokegi me icoǥotedibigimece digoida ditibigimedi , Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo anicota meote me ǥodewiǥatace .
Dicabaategetiwaji eledi oko , digo anigotedoǥowa Cristo me dibatedoǥogi , amaleeǥaǥa odoǥetetibigimece Aneotedoǥoji niǥina oko .

Odaa emii mijotaǥa , adinawanaǥatitege adiniwileci , odaaǥedianiteda laakataka amaleeǥaǥoyakadi moyapitaǥadi lacilo , amanagawini inatawece oko oyowooǥodi me deǥewi me iiǥaxini niǥina oko me daǥadiaaǥodioteci ǥodakataǥa . Pida amaleeǥaǥa onadi maleeǥeemiteetigi lajoinaǥaneǥeco Moisés .
Abraão eledi micataǥa daǥa eniodi niǥina oko anoyakagidi lolaadi , pida niǥina modioteci anodaaǥee Abraão me nakato Aneotedoǥoji maleediǥicatibige daǥa yakagidi lolaadi .
Odaa joǥoiwi anepaǥa dinete modibateloco liboonaǥadi , odaa joǥodibateloco liboonaǥadi Matias . Odaa Matias ja dinawanaǥaditege me lokaaǥetedi niǥijoa oonze ǥoneleegiwadi liiǥexedi Ǥoniotagodi .
“ Ninitibece niǥina oko Aneotedoǥoji baanaǥa ixomaǥateetedice codaa me napitaǥadi niǥicoa libeyaceǥeco .

Odaa ijoa jinadi itoataale nialeli “ oliveira ” ijaaǥijoa itoataale noledaǥaxiidi ane dabiditiniwace lodoe Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji ane yoe niǥina iiǥo , niǥidiwa jiǥijaaǥijoa niǥijoa itoataale liotaka Aneotedoǥoji .

Adinigecaǥaloǥotititiwaji , acaagetiwaji , codaa me anoenitibece leeǥodi manati ǥabeyaceǥeco . Ikani me alajikanitibece , odaa adinigecaǥaloǥotititiwaji . Ikani maniniitibece , odaa agecaǥaloǥotiti ǥadaaleǥena .

Yokaaǥedi yemaanigi , jinaǥa domaǥa anowiikita niǥina oko aneo ane beyagi , pida anowiikita niǥina oko aneo anele . Niǥina oko anidioka limedi meo anele , joaniǥiniaa nebi Aneotedoǥoji . Pida niǥina oko anidioka limedi meo ane beyagi , aǥica daǥa yowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji .

Odaa niǥidiaaǥidi Abraão naǥa yakagidi lolaadi leeǥodi me liiǥenatakaneǥegi Aneotedoǥoji me ikee Aneotedoǥoji neǥeote me iǥenaǥa leeǥodi makaaǥeyiwaǥadi Aneotedoǥoji aniǥicatibige daǥa yakagidi lolaadi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Abraão me micataǥa daǥa eliodi inatawece oko anonakato Aneotedoǥoji , aneote Aneotedoǥoji me iǥenaǥatibigiwaji , idaaǥida me doǥoyakagidi lolaadi .
Igaataǥa niǥina oko naǥa yeleo , jaǥanipetema loniciwaǥa nibeyacaǥa .

Niǥina ǥodolaadi idioka limedi me dawikode , codaa me doidetibige me ǥodeleo , digo mijoataǥa Ǥoniotagodi Jesus me dawikode neǥepaa yeleo . Jiǥidaaǥejinaǥa me jawikodeeǥa eotedibige Aneotedoǥoji me ikee catiwedi ǥodolaadi niǥica anodaaǥeeteda Jesus mijoa me yewiǥa .
Igaataǥa digoina meetaǥa inatawece eledi oko odoletibige niǥica anidiokidi meletema , idiǥida aǥodoletibige Jesus Cristo ane yemaa .

Leeǥodi monakato Aneotedoǥoji , odaa jeǥeote loniciwaǥa Abraão ajaa Sara mijo lionigi , idaaǥida naǥa laxokodi , codaa Sara mina aǥica lionigi majo . Aneotedoǥoji eote loniciwaǥa Abraão leeǥodi meyiwaǥadi niǥijo neǥeote ligegitetege .
Codaa jiǥidaa yemaa Eiodi , ane idimonya . Yemaa me diǥicata ane jiniaditema inatawece niǥina ane najigotediwa . Pida yemaa me jewikatiditace iditawece nigicota owidijegi noko .

Pida natigide Timóteo neǥeno me icoǥotigi makaamitaǥatiwaji , ica mele ǥobodigitibigaǥajitiwaji ane nadeegitoǥowa , natematitoǥowa monaleeǥidaaǥeni me iwaǥati Ǥoniotagodi , codaa midioka limedi madinemaanitiwaji . Natematitoǥowa midioka limedi mele me ǥadalakitibigoǥoji , codaa meliodi memaani maǥaǥa ǥodateǥegi , digo anejinaǥa me ǥodipegeǥedi me ǥadateǥegitacetiwaji .

Odaa nigenagi Cristo , ane liciagi niǥina lacilo nowienoǥododi waxacocoli , odaa ja yajigotedaǥawatiwaji niǥica ǥanoǥeedi . Niǥica ǥanoǥeedi liciagi naǥana nale anidioka limedi me datale , codaa meo niǥina oko midioka limedi metiǥadiweniǥidenitiwaji .
Jowooǥotaǥa niǥida gela ǥonimaweneǥegi me idinilakidenaǥatege Aneotedoǥoji me daǥaxa mele . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi mabo ǥodaaleǥena mejinaǥatece nibodicetedi anele anoditece Cristo .

Pida niǥinoa niiǥaxinaǥanadi awitakaǥa onietigi niǥinoa ane diǥicoa moyowooǥodi . Odaa jiǥidaa me liciagi niǥinoa eijedi aninoa me ǥodawikajetedi . Codaa onietiniwace niǥinoa ane doǥoyowooǥoditeda , odaa jiǥidaa Aneotedoǥoji micota me yaaǥadi digo micataǥa me jinigotaǥa niǥinoa eijedi ane ǥodawikajetedi .
Judas eo niǥida ligegi aleeǥodi daǥa iwikode madewetedipi , pida leeǥodi moliceǥegi . Jeǥepaa dowediteloco dinyeelo , codaa dolicetibigalo dinyeelo .

Jowooǥotaǥa , codaa ejiwaǥatakanaǥa Aneotedoǥoji me ǥodemaa . Aneotedoǥoji eliodi me yemaa inatawece oko . Niǥina oko anidioka limedi me yemaa Aneotedoǥoji , codaa me yemaa eledi oko , idioka limedi me yexogotege Aneotedoǥoji , codaa Aneotedoǥoji iniwa minitaǥa .

Igaanaǥa yeleo Estêvão , odaa joǥoiatetibeci niǥijo eledi anodiotibece Jesus , odaa jiǥilaagitibigiwaji idiaanaǥadiite . Inatibece ototicogi neǥepaa nipodigi Fenícia , codaa me minitaǥa lidelogo-nelegi Chipre , codaa me manitaǥa nigotaǥa Antioquia . Odaa joǥoyatematitiogi idiokidi ane judeutedi nibodicetedi anele anoditece Ǥoniotagodi Jesus .
Pida niǥina oko anoyewiǥatema Aneotedoǥoji odibatege owidi anepeǥewi me niliicaǥajetecidi , niǥina nige ninitibigiwaji leeǥodi okanicodaaǥica anoyakadi .

Odaa niǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide joǥoikatece me ideleǥe Aneotedoǥoji loiigi , codaa me iǥeke . Dibatege loniciwaǥa me iiǥe inoatawece ane latopaco oko , inoatawece ane noiika , codaa minoatawece ane iolatedi .

Niǥini ǥanecalailegi nige ǥadalakeni leeǥodi mawii ane beyagi , idaaǥida me ixomaǥateenitedijo ǥadawikodico , aǥica ǥanoǥeeditalo Aneotedoǥoji . Nigawii niǥina anele , pida ǥanecalailegi idokee meo mawikodee , codaa nige ixomaǥateenitedijo niǥinoa ǥadawikodico , odaa Aneotedoǥoji ja ǥadibinieni .

Leeǥodi Cristo me dinibooteta Aneotedoǥoji , jiǥiniaaǥiniwa ane itedigi liwigotigi , Aneotedoǥoji inaaǥoko , odaa jeǥeote gela nimaweneǥegi me dinilakidetetege Aneotedoǥoji inaaǥoko . Joaniǥidaaǥeote Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo ane enidite me nepilidi , eotedibige moyakadi modibatege inoa anele anakaa ligegi Aneotedoǥoji me yajigotediogi , niǥinoa ane daǥa daateda . Aneotedoǥoji yakadi me yajigo niǥinoa anele igaataǥa niǥijo Jesus naǥa yeleo , odaa ja noǥatedicoace oko me itelogo libeyaceǥeco anowote niǥijo maleeǥijo niǥijo odoejegi nimaweneǥegi me dinilakidetetege Aneotedoǥoji .
Enice , amiida ica ane daǥaxa mele me jaoǥa ? Domige midapaǥa jiiǥaticogi me jaoǥa ane beyagi , me jaoǥatibige me ikee Aneotedoǥoji me daǥaxa meletedoǥodomi ?

Jineǥenitece notaǥa ane napioi , jinaǥawii ǥadatematiko ane nini codaa me napioi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa otaǥani me liciagi niǥina oko yetoliwaǥa , igaataǥa agotaǥa iǥenaǥa loiigi Aneotedoǥoji diǥidaaǥee me notaǥanaǥa . Pida leeditibige midioka limedi maniotagodeetalo Aneotedoǥoji , leeǥodi me najigotedoǥowa niǥida gela ǥodewiǥa .

Naǥa inoletibige , odaa ja jinadi apolicaǥanaǥa baayo . Niǥijo apolicaǥanaǥademigi liboonaǥadi “ Némaǥa ” , ijaaǥijo ijo lokaaǥedi diotibeci lowidi liboonaǥadi “ Aneiticoace émaǥaǥa , noledi ane daǥa ipe ” . Odaa joǥodibatege loniciwaǥa monigodi oko , oniniteci niǥicoa cwaatolo liwailidi niǥina iiǥo . Odaa joǥonigodi oko , oyatita me nidelaǥa , nigigi , neelotika , codaa me niǥinoa eijedi anetiǥodeligo .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji meote ligegitediogi niǥina anonakato me daǥa ixomaǥatice niǥina Aneotedoǥoji ane ligegi . Aneotedoǥoji eote niǥida ligegi me yajigotediogi noǥeedi inatawece anida aneetege licoǥegi Abraão leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji idioka limedi meletedoǥodomi . Aneotedoǥoji aǥinoka yajigote noǥeedi niǥina anoyotete liiǥenatakaneǥeco Moisés , pida aaǥaǥa yajigote inatawece niǥina anonakato digo mijotaǥa Abraão me nakato . Odaa Abraão ja ǥodiodi okotawece ane jinakatonaǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Odaa ijo lacilodi romaanotedi joǥoiwi ica anodigotiwa , odaa ja domoǥoyemaa metidikatice , igaataǥa moyakadi me diǥicata yoenatagi ane beyagi aneo me leeǥodi modiiǥenatakatiwa metideloadi .
Aneotedoǥoji iolatedice oko aleeǥodi niǥina oko miniaa yemaa , oteǥexaaǥaǥa leeǥodi ane loenataka . Pida Aneotedoǥoji iolatedice oko leeǥodi me iwikode .
Odaa jinaǥa ǥadoomatewa ane daǥa ǥadodawa , anee niǥijo noiigi . Odaa leeǥodi niǥica anee , vinte-três miili oko nigo ijokijo noko .

Pida jeemiteta noniciwaǥa ilaligi , ane idei catiwedi yaaleǥena . Niǥida noniciwaǥa micataǥa daǥa ideleǥe liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji ane jemaa . Niǥida noniciwaǥa idiiǥe me jao ane beyagi , odaa aǥica emaǥa yoniciwaǥa daǥa jika me jao ane beyagi .

Enice joleeǥatibige midapaǥa jiiǥaticogi odoe me idiniiǥaxinaǥa . Jikanaǥa me jiiǥaxinaǥanaǥatece niǥijoa odoejedi niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ane daǥa dakaketeda anoditece Cristo . Odaa ele me idiniiǥaxinaǥatece niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ane dakake , amaleeǥaǥa ili ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi . Jinaǥalee idiniiǥaxinaǥatacece me leeditibige me idinilaanaǥatece ǥobeyaceǥeco anowo oko midioka limedi me yeleo , codaa jinaǥalee idiniiǥaxinaǥatece me leeditibige me jinakatonaǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Ajemaa diǥica ane daǥa niwita ǥonioxoa Timóteo . Pida nige noditice ǥadiwigotigitiwaji , axawani mele me diniwiaje codaa mele menotiwa . Igaataǥa ee inaa ǥonioxoadipi inibeoonaǥatege menotoǥowa .

Inioxoadipi , nigica anokexaa ligegitibece me nakato Aneotedoǥoji , pida aǥeo ane iǥenaǥa me ikee mewi mida eliwaǥatakaneǥegi , aǥica jaoǥa niǥijo ligegitibece . Codaa Aneotedoǥoji aǥeote me yewiǥatace niǥini oko diǥidoka leeǥodi mee mida eliwaǥatakaneǥegi .
Onica ica niǥeladimigipitigi nigotaǥa Jerusalém , anodi , “ Niǥidoa jiǥidaaǥidoa niǥicoa ǥoneleegiwa anodoletibige moyeloadi .
Igaanaǥa nigotedini me notaǥaneǥetediniwace , odaa ja nawetediniwace , codaa meetediogi , “ Abaategetiwaji Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo .
Aǥoyowooǥodi niǥica anigote Aneotedoǥoji niǥina oko meote me iǥenaǥa . Odoletibige mowo epaa lakatigi , odaa joǥodowocetege niǥijo anigote Aneotedoǥoji oko me iǥenaǥadi .

Aneotedoǥoji eetetece Lionigi catiwedi laaleǥena niǥina oko aneyiwaǥadi Lionigi . Pida niǥina oko ane deǥeyiwaǥadi ligegi Aneotedoǥoji , joaniǥiniaaǥeo micataǥa Aneotedoǥoji daǥa awitakegi , leeǥodi aǥeyiwaǥadi niǥica Aneotedoǥoji ane yalaǥate Lionigi .
Natigide atacolitecetiwaji niǥida igegi . Niǥina ane idadiwaǥadi icota meote niǥinoa ane jaote , codaa icota meote loenataka ane daǥaxa me eloodoli , igaataǥa ja jopitalo Eiodi .

Anajoinitiniwace niǥina niotagipi moyiwaǥadi niotagodepodi , codaa modoletibige mowo me ninitibigiwaji niotagododi leeǥodi mele mowo libaketedi . Leeditibige me doǥodinotigimadetege niǥinoa niotagododi modiojotece .

Adinowetitiwaji me diǥica oko ane daǥadiaa yemaa Aneotedoǥoji meote aneletema . Codaa adinoweti adiǥicoa ane liciagi naǥana nawodigije ane bayodi , ane ili , oditaǥa jeǥeo eliodi oko me neelotikanaǥa leeǥodi niweneeno . Oditaǥa niǥidi oko joǥowo eliodi oko mowo libeyaceǥegi .

Niǥina moixipetice ǥoneleegiwa me iiǥe loiigi Ǥoniotagodi , leeditibige moixipetice niǥina ǥoneleegiwa anodeemitetibige niǥina oko ane doǥonakatoteda Ǥoniotagodi , amanagawini niǥini ǥoneleegiwa aǥica liboliǥa , codaa diaabo eloona ayakadi daǥa dibata .
Pida niǥida moko oninitecibeci Cristo najigotedoǥowa ane ǥodixaketedi , ane daǥa diniciamico . Ilaagaǥaditedoǥoloco ǥodixaketedi ane daǥa diniciamico , anepaa yemaa me najigotedoǥowa .

Odaa ijo eledi aanjo ja yadotice niǥijo aaǥaǥa nibaxiawaanigi nadotinigi akiidi-eliodi . Odaa niǥina ninyoǥodi ja liciagi ǥodawodi micoataǥa lawilota émeǥegi , odaa ja nigo inoatawece eijedi ane newiǥatinigi akiidi-eliodi .

Jiniǥinoka awii anoiiǥetaǥawa niǥina metiǥadiwini , jinaǥawii liciagi niǥina ane doletibige midokida me docaǥatiogi oko . Pida idioka limedi me iwaǥatakani , icaaǥica nige diǥica ane iǥoaditaǥawa , anee niǥinoa liotaka Cristo , me dinoniciwaǥaditibigiwaji mowote ane yemaa Aneotedoǥoji .

Niǥina nigagiti , adiniwikodenitibece , codaa eemiteetibige Aneotedoǥoji . Oleetibige me diǥica ǥadoenatagi aneo madinilaanitibece , amanagawini niǥina oko nige etiǥadameni , codaa me beyagi modotaǥatibige niǥinoa ǥadoenataka anele anawiite leeǥodi me iwitece Cristo , niǥidi oko icota me niboliǥatibigiwaji leeǥodi niǥinoa epaa lotaǥa .

Joaniǥidaa ane yemaa , Niǥijoa ane idimonya . Yemaatedibige minatawece niǥina anonadi Lionigi Aneotedoǥoji , odaa oyiwaǥadi , modibatege lewiǥa miniwataǥa ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo , codaa me jaotace me newiǥa nigicota owidijegi noko ” .

Aǥica daǥa leegi niaanjo Ǥoniotagodi jeǥeote anigota Herodes , odaa icoa nigojokodi joǥoyeliotigi le , odaa Herodes ja yeleo , leeǥodi me daǥa iweniǥideteda Aneotedoǥoji . Pida yemaatibige niǥijo noiigi miniaaǥini odoǥeteta .
Jemaanaǥa me joǥeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji , ane Eliodi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo . Jiǥiniaaǥiniwa Ǥodiodi aneliodi me ǥodiwikode , codaa idioka limedi me ǥodaxawa niǥina me jawikodeeǥa .
Onateciǥijo oko eyamaǥaticoace , oika eliwaǥatakaneǥegi anewi , inokaanaǥa odotaǥatigi niǥinoa notaǥa ane diǥica jaoǥate .

Aidiboliǥatece nibodicetedi anele anoditece Cristo ane icoǥotedigi miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji , igaataǥa niǥinoa nibodicetedi anele loniciwaǥa Aneotedoǥoji meote lewiǥa inatawece oko anoyiwaǥadi Jesus , odoejedipi judeutedi moyeloǥoditiogi , niǥidiaaǥidi niǥina ane daǥa judeutedi .
Odaa aǥica ini eledi ane yakadi me yojogotini eledi lipodaǥaladi , pida ijokijo niǥijo lipodaǥaladi aneote Aneotedoǥoji , ane Jesus Cristo .
Pida ejitacaǥawatiwaji . Inoatawece ǥoneleegiwadi leeditibige moyemaa lodawa digo anee mepaa dinemaa . Codaa inatawece iwaalepodi leeditibige me deemitetibige lodawa .

Niǥijo jotigide akaami émaǥaǥa lodoe Aneotedoǥoji leeǥotedi ǥabeyaceǥeco , codaa leeǥodi me diǥicata anenitege loiigi Aneotedoǥoji , anidiwa liiǥenatakaneǥeco miditaǥa . Pida Aneotedoǥoji eote Cristo me yewiǥatace , codaa makaamitiwaji . Codaa ixomaǥateetedice niǥijoa ǥabeyaceǥeco .

Jinaǥa domiǥikani niǥijo ǥadixakedi ane yajigotedaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo noǥoipeketaǥaloco libaaǥatedi niǥijo laxokodipi lacilodi anoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi , odaa joǥoyeloǥoditaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji lowooko .
Odaa ja jinadi gela ditibigimedi codaa me gela iiǥo . Leeǥodi niǥijo odoejegi ditibigimedi , ijaaǥijo odoejegi iiǥo aǥaleeǥicoa , codaa me akiidi-eliodi eledi aǥaleeǥica .
Oleetibige midioka limedi maniniitibecetiwaji .
Odaa niǥidiwa ciinco epenaitedi niǥina oko domoǥodoletibige me nigo , pida aǥaleeǥica némaǥa . Domoǥoyemaa daǥa nigo , pida aǥalee nigo .

Niǥida moko ejiwaǥataǥa Jesus me yeleo , odaa niǥidiaaǥidi ja yewiǥatace . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi mejiwaǥataǥa Aneotedoǥoji meote me lixigaǥawepodi nige dopitacedijo Jesus niǥijo anoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi baanaǥa nigo .
Niǥina oko anee Jesus Cristo me Lionigi Aneotedoǥoji , iniwa Aneotedoǥoji minitaǥa , codaa yexogotege Aneotedoǥoji .
Enice ikanitiwaji niǥijo jotigide aneni me ǥadewiki , niǥijo aneni ǥadaaǥatitiwaji leeǥotedi ǥalidaǥatakaneǥeco ane beyagi .

Niǥida me Ee iciagi epoagi . Niǥina ane niotiwece meetaǥa , jiǥida lewiǥa ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji . Yakadi me nakatio , codaa me noditice ane yemaa me diiticogi , codaa yakadi ane yeligo .

Iditecibece onigidatiniwace , idiaaǥeledi oyociwigi natecoǥotedi , iditecibece odineetiogi oyatitiogi nawikodico , idiaaǥeledi onigodi oyatitiogi nodaajo-ocaǥataǥa . Idiaanaǥadiite , odinixotinigi lamodi waxacoco , codaa me waxigida . Madewetedipi , codaa oiatetibeci , oyametibigo .

Owooǥotitiwaji Cristo me iǥenaǥa . Odaa ajawienatakanaǥa maǥaǥowooǥoti minatawece niǥina oko anidioka limedi mowo ane iǥenaǥa , Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeo me micataǥa daǥa gela menitaciniwace niǥidi oko .

Igaataǥa Ǥoniotagodi ǥodimonya , codaa meetedoǥowa , ‘ Ee ǥadixomitio makaami macataǥa lokokena miditaǥa noiigi ane daǥa judeutedi jao me jakadi me ǥadibakeni amaleeǥaǥa ikeenitiogi inatawece ane noiigitigi niǥina iiǥo anodaaǥejigotiogi oko me jao me newiǥatace . ’ ”

Ja jikanaǥa , codaa aǥalee jaoǥa okanicodaaǥica aneo me ǥodiboliǥa , niǥina anoyaǥaditini mowo niǥina oko . Codaa aininaalenaǥatiniwace oko daǥa jiigaǥa lotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji . Pida jikeenaǥa Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa mewi . Aneotedoǥoji yowooǥodi niǥina oko moyakadi monadi anejinaǥa me ǥodewiǥa , odaa jaǥaǥa onakato niǥinoa ǥodotaǥa .

Odaa Aneotedoǥoji ja yadeegi Jesus me ideite liwai libaaǥadi , miditaǥa nimedi ǥoneǥegi . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeote micota niǥijo ane ligegite Jesus , odaa Aneotedoǥoji yajigote Jesus me yakadi me iiǥe Liwigo . Odaa Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji enagi me dakatioǥoji . Natigide jaǥanatitiwaji , codaa majipaatibece anodaaǥeeta loenatagi Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo .
Niǥida makaamitiwaji jiǥida gela aneni Aneotedoǥoji ane yajigotedaǥawa , anidioka limedi me ili , eote micota me ǥadiciagi , digo miniwataǥa , codaa eote mepaanaǥa owooǥoti Aneotedoǥoji .

Jesus eliodi me yemaa Marta , ajo nioxoa , ijaa Lázaro . Niǥijo naǥa dibodicetedigi Lázaro me deelotika , odaa jeǥee , “ Niǥida neelotagi aǥeo Lázaro diǥidioka limedi me yeleo . Pida niǥida anee Lázaro onidaaǥida meo niǥina oko modoǥetetibigimece Aneotedoǥoji . Jiǥidaa leeǥodi nige odoǥetetiwa , ane Ee Lionigi Aneotedoǥoji ” .

Igaataǥa niǥinoa nibodicetedi anele oikee Aneotedoǥoji meote niǥina oko me iǥenaǥatibigiwaji niǥina meniwaǥatakanaǥa , codaa niǥina me doǥoika meniwaǥatakanaǥa . Joaniǥidaaǥeeta Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa , “ Niǥina oko ane yakadi Aneotedoǥoji me iǥenaǥatibigiwaji leeǥodi meniwaǥatakanaǥa , joaniǥidiaaǥida lewiǥa ane diǥica liniogo . ”

Odaa ja noditedice Jesus , epaa yoyaǥaditedijo ajo licenaǥanaǥate . Odaa jiǥigotibeci minitaǥa lojotaǥadi ane liboonaǥadi “ Lojotaǥadi ǥodacilo-libitagi ” . ( Nioladi judeutedi niǥini liboonaǥadi “ Gólgota ” ) .

Joaniǥidaa me daǥa diniciamico ǥodixaketedi ane najigotedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji me jibakenaǥa . Nigida ǥodixakedi mejinaǥatiogi niǥina anonakato Ǥoniotagodi niǥica ane yemaa Aneotedoǥoji me ligegitediogi , jaoǥa niǥida ǥobakedi me jinakatonaǥa Aneotedoǥoji .

Niǥini odoejegi ewikegi liciagi ica liaon , ica eledi ewikegi baǥa latopiwa alolanaǥa , ica eledi ewikegi latobi baǥa liciagi latobi ǥoneleegiwa , ica owidijegi ewikegi liciagi ica nitaanigo ane wayo .
Enice adowetiteloco anodaaǥeni me ǥadewiki . Jinaǥa ǥadiciagi niǥina oko ane diǥicata lixakedi , pida abakeni ǥadixakedi Aneotedoǥoji ane yajigotedaǥawa me ǥadewikitema .

Igaataǥa lodoe Aneotedoǥoji inatawece oko diniciamico , ina ane judeutedi , inaaǥina ane daǥa judeutedi . Igaataǥa iniaaǥiniwa Ǥoniotagodi , Niotagodi inatawece oko . Codaa eliodi me ibinie inatawece anodipokotalo me yaxawa .

Igaataǥa Cristo eotedibige me daǥadiaa leeditibige niǥina oko me yotete liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji oditaǥa ja iǥenaǥa . Pida niǥina oko leeditibige midokida me nakato Cristo , odaa Aneotedoǥoji ja dibatetege .
Jiniǥica gaantokaaǥini ane ǥadigecaǥaleǥeni ! Pida niǥina motaǥaneǥenitedibece Aneotedoǥoji , ipokitalo niǥica anopootibige . Idioka limedi maniotagodeetalo catiwedi ǥadaaleǥena , niǥina mipokitalo .
Ijoatawece ninyaco ǥodaamipi owotibige metiǥodajacaǥadi , me daǥa jemaanaǥa me jaoǥa ane beyagi baanoǥowote niǥidi noiigi .
Naǥa yomoke niǥijo elagigi , odaa ja noditedice owidi ǥocilaǥadi . Odaa aligeǥe codaa minatawece ditibigimedi ja nexocaǥa leeǥodi niǥijoa ǥocilaǥadi ane noditedicogi niǥijo elagigi .

Aneotedoǥoji ayemaa diǥica aneo ane beyagitema nioxoa oditaǥa ibeyacaǥadi ladoneǥegi . Igaataǥa jiǥijo mejinaǥataǥawatiwaji codaa me ǥadiladeeneǥegitece Ǥoniotagodi me iloikatidi inatawece oko ane ibeyacaǥadi ladoneǥegi nioxoa .
Niǥina oko naǥa yexogotege Cristo , odaa Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeote me gela oko , micataǥa daǥa gela laaleǥena . Niǥijo oxiiǥodi anee me yewiǥa ja ixomaǥatijo , ja ma . Ja gela anee me yewiǥa .
Igaataǥa Eliodi yemaa Lionigi , ikeeteta inoatawece niǥinoa aneote . Codaa icota me ikee eletidi loenataka ane daǥaxatace me libinienaǥa caticedi niǥinoa eletidi loenataka , anopootiwaji .
Niǥijo anijo moliceǥegi , jinaǥaleeǥolice , pida abakeni ǥabaaǥatedi mabaa manigaanyetece dinyeelo ane yapidi . Odaa jaǥakati maxawani niǥina aninoa laǥalanaǥa .
Pida eledi ane jipokotaǥawa . Awii iomaǥatitice imedi minitaǥa ǥadiǥeladi , igaataǥa inibeotege Aneotedoǥoji meote anipokitalo , odaa etidikatice , odaa jakadi mejigo makaamitaǥa .

Enice jinaǥa domiǥikani inoa eletidi niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco iomaǥaǥa deǥetiǥadadeegiticogi wetice niǥijo naigi anewi , niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anodakapetege ǥodiiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco . Ele niǥina ǥodiwigo me yeligo niǥicoa anele Aneotedoǥoji anidioka limedi me ǥodediatetece , idiǥida ayeligo niǥicoa niiǥenatakaneǥeco anoditece niweenaǥa . Igaataǥa niǥinoa niiǥenatakaneǥeco anoditece niweenaǥa aǥoyaxawa oko anodoletibige moyotete niiǥenatakaneǥeco anowo me ili eliwaǥatakaneǥegi .

Ǥonioxoadipi . Jipokaǥataǥawatiwaji me eemiteetibige niǥidi anele modibataǥadomi , niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi liomaǥataka Ǥoniotagodi me ǥadaciloditiwaji , codaa metiǥadiiǥaxinitece anodaaǥeni me ǥadewiki .

Owote niǥida ligegi niǥijo eliododipi leeǥodi odoitiogi niǥijoa lacilodi judeutedi . Igaataǥa niǥijoa lacilodi jiǥijo modinotaǥaneǥetigi me daǥadiaa oikatio midiwa niiakanaǥaxiidi okanicodaaǥica oko anee Jesus me niǥijaaǥijoa Niǥicoa ane niiǥe Aneotedoǥoji meote ǥodewiǥa .

Igaataǥa niǥida moko beǥewi moko Aneotedoǥoji loiigi . Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo ǥodaxawa me joǥeeǥatibigimece Aneotedoǥoji , ǥodinitibece leeǥodi mida anejinaǥatege Cristo . Niǥida moko ajinakatonaǥa ane lakatigi daǥa idinakagitaǥa .
Joaniǥidaa liiǥenatakaneǥegi , me leeditibige mejiwaǥataǥa Liboonaǥadi Lionigi , ane Jesus Cristo , codaa me idinemaanaǥatiwage , anaǥaǥa niiǥetedoǥowa ijaaǥijoa Cristo me jaoǥa .
Odaa ja jinadi eledi eijeeǥagi ane doide icoǥotinece catinedi iiǥo . Idoa itoataale libiwedi liciaco micoataǥa niǥinoa waxacoco libiwedi . Pida layaagaǥawa niǥina Ǥowidi me daale , diximoǥo .
Inioxoadipi , jinoǥowookoni micataǥa nigaanigi . Pida oleetibige me ǥadiciagi nigaanigawaanigi me deǥeo ane beyagi , codaa mowookoni oleetibige me ǥadiciagi niǥina baanoǥoko .
Nigica oko ǥadiwigotigitiwaji ane dawikode , ipokitalo Aneotedoǥoji me yaxawa . Nigica aneliodi me ninitibece , ele me digaanaǥatibigimece Aneotedoǥoji .

Enice awii mabo ǥadaaleǥena , codaa jinaǥadinopootiwaji leeǥotedi niǥinoa ǥadawikodico , micataǥa niǥina oko me dinigaaxe , ane dinigaaxe libaaǥatedi , codaa me naǥamalaǥa lokotidi . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee maxawani niǥina oko ane deǥeliodi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi . Niǥidi oko liciagi niǥina oko alejaado . Pida nigodiotaǥadicitiwaji me iwitece naigi ane iǥenaǥa , Odaa aǥalee wayoditibigiwaji , pida jeǥele mewaligitibigiwaji .

Niǥina motaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji , enitalo , “ Eiodi ” . Niǥina me iwi anigotediogi inatawece oko , idokida anigotediogi , odaa yedia oninitecibeci leeǥodi niǥicoa epaa loenataka . Odaa ele midioka limedi me eemiteetigi Aneotedoǥoji maleeǥinaaǥonitelocotiwaji niǥina iiǥo micataǥa niǥina oko iomiǥigipi .
Adinatiitalo mawii ǥadawikodico Aneotedoǥoji ane yemaa , odaa nigidiaaǥidi akati mabaatege niǥijo ane ligegitedaǥawa me yajigotedaǥawa .

Igamodaaǥee ica mewi mejiwaǥataǥa Ǥoniotagodi ? Niǥina mejiwaǥataǥa , ajawienatakanaǥa me jibaǥatege niǥica ǥonaǥajegi ane ligegitedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji . Niǥina mejiwaǥatakanaǥa , jowooǥotaǥa mewi minoa niǥicoa analee daǥa jakataǥa me jinataǥa .

Enice , leeǥodi me ǥodexogotege Ǥoniotagodi ane idiiǥe , ejitaǥawatiwaji , codaa ǥadibodicaxini . Jinaǥalee domiǥikani aneni me ǥadewiki daǥa liciagi anodaaǥee lewiǥa niǥijo oko ane doǥoyowooǥoditeda Aneotedoǥoji . Niǥinoa lowooko niǥidi oko aǥica jaoǥate .

Enice jinaǥa domaǥa atacolitece niǥina anodi minoa eletidi ǥoniiǥenatakaneǥeco ane leeditibige mejiwaǥatece . Owote niiǥenatakaneǥeco midi ica ane daǥakati melici , macipeta , codaa minoa nokododi ane limedi nalokeco , codaa epenai gela , codaa modi minoa nokododi me inipenaǥatini .

Odaa joaniǥidaa leeǥodi midi lodoe nibaanco Aneotedoǥoji . Odaa noko codaa menoale idi me nibaaǥa mini liǥeladi Aneotedoǥoji . Aneotedoǥoji ane nicotedeloco nibaanco doweditedeloco niǥidi oko igaataǥa iniwa miditaǥa .
Odaa Paulo ja dinikatini , naǥa dakagiteloco niǥijo lioneeǥa , odaa ja ibedotece . Niǥidiaaǥidi jeǥee , “ Jinaǥa aǥowikomataatiwaji , igaataǥa eyewiǥatace ! ”

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me idinatitalo inoatawece yawikodico leeǥodi niǥina oko Aneotedoǥoji ane iomaǥaditedicoace me nepilidi amaleeǥaǥa oyakadi moyexogotege Ǥoniotagodi , odaa jiǥida lewiǥa miniwataǥa Jesus Cristo , codaa moyakadi moiweniǥide midioka limedi modinawanaǥaditege , anigida noko nigototalo .
Niǥina madinicenitiwaji , adinibedoni me ikeenitiwaji mewi memaanitiwaji eledi ǥanioxoadipi . Jemaa Aneotedoǥoji meote mele ǥadaaleǥenali , akaamitawece anida anenitege Cristo .
Ele midioka limedi me eemiteetibige eledi oko leeǥodi me eemiteetigi Cristo .

Yokaaǥetedipi yemaanigipi , akamaǥakaami joǥowooǥotitiwaji micota mina niiǥaxinaǥanadi awitakaǥaǥa . Odaa adinoweti me daǥa iwitece liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco niǥinoa ǥoneleegiwadi abeyacaǥaǥa ane doǥoyiwaǥaditeda liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji . Nige iwitece niǥinoa liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco niǥinoa ǥoneleegiwadi , odaa jaǥamiǥiticoace naigi anele , codaa ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi aǥalee yoniciwadi .
Akaamitiwaji , iwaalepodi , iwaǥati ǥadodawadi , igaataǥa jiǥidaa leeditibige me eni leeǥodi me ǥadexocitege Ǥoniotagodi .
Eliite moxoki lodoe loiigi Ǥoniotagodi niǥina ane daǥa yemaa me ika meotibiga libeyaceǥeco , amaleeǥaǥa niǥina eledi ǥonioxoadipi odoita mowo ane beyagi .
Enice jikanaǥa me idinalomeǥenaǥa . Leeditibige mowoo me daǥadiaaǥawii ǥanioxoa meyamaǥatice eliwaǥatakaneǥegi , migetaǥa ika me diotece Ǥoniotagodi .
Pida niǥina oko anowo anele , Aneotedoǥoji nelecaǥatee , codaa iweniǥide miniwataǥa , codaa meote mele laaleǥena . Odoejedipi judeutedi , nigidiaaǥidi niǥina ane daǥa judeutedi .

Ideite liwigotigi noledi , pida anabidaǥa , iwoko me nigodi nodaajo-ocaǥataǥa . Idiaaǥidi ijo me aǥamalaǥaǥa , pida niǥidiaaǥidi jeǥeote me loniciweǥenaǥa . Niǥina me nidelaǥa ida loniciwaǥa , odaa joǥoiǥeke inoa iodaǥawadi iomaǥaǥa .
Niǥina natigide aǥaleeǥica ane idigiwogo , igaataǥa inoa inepitaǥajetedi nolee yolaadi leeǥodi niǥijoa yawikodico ane ikee me ee nebi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus .

Odaa ijo aanjo loniciweǥenigi ja dibata ajo wetiǥa nelegi , ane iwaaǥadi , odaa ja yokoletinigi akiidi-eliodi , odaa aǥaleeǥaca me yeloǥo . Odaa jeǥee , “ Jiǥidaaǥee nigotaǥa eloodo Babilônia icota monawelaǥadi beyagi anodigota monoǥatice , odaa aǥaleeǥaca , codaa aǥaleeǥica ane nadi .

Pida , akaami yokaaǥetedi yemaanigipi , idioka limedi maxawani oninitecibeci me yowooǥodi codaa moyiwaǥadi niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi Aneotedoǥoji ane yajigotedaǥawatiwaji . Codaa ikanitiwaji Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji miniaa iiǥe ǥadowooko niǥina motaǥaneǥeni Ǥoniotagodi .

Jinaǥa domaǥa iwitece lakataǥa okotigi niǥina iiǥo anodakapetege Aneotedoǥoji . Pida ikani Aneotedoǥoji me iigi ǥadaaleǥenali , amaleeǥaǥa owooǥotitiwaji ane yemaa Aneotedoǥoji . Ane yemaa Aneotedoǥoji eletaǥadomi , aǥicaadaǥa beyagitaǥadomi , codaa me ninikatidi Aneotedoǥoji , codaa me iǥenaǥataǥadomi .

Igaataǥa eemoda niǥina ane diǥica ane jaoǥa liwigotigi idiwatawece liiǥexedi Aneotedoǥoji . Ajibootatege niǥina moditiwa me ee “ liiǥexegi Aneotedoǥoji ” , leeǥodi ijo me jiatetibece loiigi Aneotedoǥoji .

Jinaǥalideetalotiwaji lakataǥa niǥina oko anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo , codaa jinaǥa daǥaxa memaani niǥinoa aninoa niǥina iiǥo . Niǥina oko ane yemaa lakataǥa niǥina oko anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo ayemaa Aneotedoǥoji Ǥodiodi .

Natigide , akaami ǥodokaaǥedi , ane eni eledi oko mepaǥa abeyaceǥegi . Niǥida makaamitiwaji aǥakati makamaǥa anapitaǥati ǥadoenataka , aicoǥota ganigakaami . Igaataǥa niǥina me ǥadiǥoatita eledi oko , pida awii liciagi niǥinoa anowote , jiǥikeeni Aneotedoǥoji maǥaǥa ǥadiloikatiti leeǥodi ǥabeyaceǥeco .

Tiago , Pedro ijaa João , anododigota niǥina eledi oko micataǥa daǥa ǥodacilodi , niǥidi iniwatadiǥini noǥoyowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me najigotediwa niǥida ibakedi ǥoneǥegi , odaa joǥodibatoǥogi ee ijaa Barnabé moikee moniwoditoǥodomi . Okotawece ǥodiwoditema mele me ǥobakadi liwigotigi noiigi ane daǥa judeutedi , idiǥidi baǥa libakadi miditaǥa judeutedi .

Igaanaǥa oigodi Jesus moyototedeloco nicenaǥanaǥate niǥijoa iodaǥawadi , odaa joǥodibatalo lowoodi , odaa joǥodinilaagaǥaditigilo onaditecibige niǥijoa cwaatolo iodaǥawadi . Odaa yeyaǥatice onajoteci naǥajo nitoonicogo , anadatawece me lipegeteǥe adinapeegi .
Enice akaamitiwaji ane iiǥaxini eledi oko , igaamee ina mecoǥotace akamaǥakaami adiniiǥaxini ? Eloǥotitibece deǥeleta me jolicaǥa , pida akamaǥakaami olicetiwaji .
Analakitibigetiwaji ǥadoolatedi me micataǥa diimigi ane diǥeladetigi Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo ? Aneotedoǥoji niwakatee Liwigo me diǥeladetiwaǥajitiwaji . Odaa aǥakamaǥa adiniiǥenitiwaji .
Leeǥodi Cristo me ǥodemaa , odaa jikanaǥa mepaa ǥodiiǥe . Igaataǥa jiǥidaaǥee ane ǥodowoogo . Onijoatece ǥoneleegiwa Cristo yeleotetema inatawece oko , odaa micataǥa daǥa nigo inatawece oko .

Inioxoadipi , Aneotedoǥoji ǥadiolaatedicoace makaami nepilidi , codaa eniditedaǥawa midioka limedi me ideoni miniwataǥa , odaa ina boǥowoo Jesus , Niǥijoa liiǥexegi Aneotedoǥoji , jiǥiniaa ǥonisacerdoti ane daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi , okotawece ane jinakatonaǥa .

Niǥijo me jao okanicodaaǥica nibakedi , jikeetaǥawatiwaji niǥina me jibaaǥa jiǥidaa ǥonimaweneǥegi me jakataǥa me jaxawanaǥa niǥijo aninoa lemaǥamatico . Analakitibigetiwaji niǥijoa lotaǥa Ǥoniotagodi Jesus neǥee , ‘ Niǥina ane yedia eledi oko , joaniǥiniaaǥini anida linikegi caticedi niǥina ane dibatege noǥeedita eledi oko . ’ ”

Idatawece leeditibige me jeemiteeǥatibige niǥina oko ane wadonadipi . Niǥinoa ǥoneleegiwadi , iwaalepodi wadonadi , leeditibige me loomatewa inokina ane lodawa . Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji iwi anigoteta codaa me iloikatidi niǥina oko ane loomatewa ane daǥa lodawa .
Igaanaǥa dakagitini niǥijo anodoejegi micotio , iwitiwece niǥijo anoyatice lolaadi Jesus , odaa ja nadi niǥijoa lipataǥaxiidi Jesus , pida adakatio .

Odaa jeǥeote nalebepakatedi , naxacoǥonakatedi , eliodi niximaǥaǥa , codaa inoa niǥicoa layaageǥeco , codaa me datalale iiǥo . Aǥica liciagi niǥica natalalaǥa niǥijo maleekokina niǥina oko digoina iiǥo . Daǥaxa me doide , aǥica liciagi .

Odaa ja idakagitini lodoe niǥijo aanjo me domaǥa joǥeteta , pida meetiwa , “ Jinoǥoǥeetiwa ! Igaataǥa akaami iciagi ee liotagi Aneotedoǥoji , codaa iciagepodi ǥanioxoadipi anoyotete niiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi anewi aneetece Jesus . Oǥeetetalo Aneotedoǥoji ! Igaataǥa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi aneetece Jesus , latematigo aneo Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji me notaǥanaǥa niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko . ”
Pida Aneotedoǥoji ja nikeetedoǥowa niǥinoa ane libinienaǥa , Liwigo jiǥiniaa nikeetoǥowa . Igaataǥa Liwigo iwitece inoatawece , codaa yowooǥodi icoatawece lowooko Aneotedoǥoji .
Odaa jemaa mele mabaatege Epafrodito , igaataǥa eledi nebi Ǥoniotagodi , codaa jemaa maniniitibecitiwaji . Codaa eemiteetibige inatawece oko ane liciagi Epafrodito .
Akaamitiwaji anakaami nionigipi , oleetibige midioka limedi me iwaǥati ǥadiododipi , igaataǥa Ǥoniotagodi jiǥidaa yemaa me eni , akaamitiwaji ane iwaǥati Ǥoniotagodi .

Digawini ane leeǥodi me idinanenaǥatibece . Niǥina ane jeemiteeǥatece catiwedi ǥodaaleǥena aneo me jowooǥotaǥa me jaoǥa niǥina ane beyagi , oǥoa domige niǥina anele , aaǥaǥa nikeetoǥowa anejinaǥa me ǥodewiǥa ǥadodoetiwaji midioka limedi mele . Niǥijo me jaoǥa ǥobakedi ǥadiwigotigi me ǥadaxawaneǥegitiwaji , jibaaǥatema iniokiniwateda Aneotedoǥoji , odaa Aneotedoǥoji ǥodaxawa midioka limedi me jowooǥa inokina ane iǥenaǥa . Ajibakenaǥa lixakedi niǥina okotigi niǥina iiǥo . Pida Aneotedoǥoji eliodi meletedoǥodomi , codaa najigotedoǥowa ǥodoniciwaǥa me jaoǥa ǥobakeditema ǥadiwigotigitiwaji .
Niǥina ane dibatege codaa meyiwaǥadi iiǥenatakaneǥeco , joaniǥiniaa idemaa . Odaa Eiodi aaǥaǥa yemaa niǥina ane idemaa . Codaa Ee aaǥaǥa jemaa , codaa me idinikeeta ane Ee . ”

Ewi niǥinoa nakataǥa me latopiwatigi daǥa ǥoneǥaǥa , igaataǥa odiiǥenataka anodaaǥee me joǥeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji , pida odoǥetetiogi aanjotedi , codaa odiiǥaxinaǥatece anodaaǥee me idiniwikodenaǥatibece , pida onowo me diniwikodetibigiwaji , codaa ǥoniiǥetoǥowa me jiloikatitaǥa niǥinoa ǥodoolatedi . Pida niǥidiwa nakataǥa aǥetiǥodaxawa me jakataǥa me jajacaǥataǥa naǥani ǥodaaleǥena anabeyaceǥe ane yemaatibece meo ane beyagi .

Niǥijo ǥonioxoadipi anonotiwa etiǥadatematii anodaaǥeni miditaǥa lapo anonakato Ǥoniotagodi digoina , niǥica anodaaǥeni memaani eletidi ǥonioxoadipi . Jemaa maxawanitece okanicodaaǥica anoyopotibige me wiajeeǥa , awii ane yemaa Aneotedoǥoji .
Pida oxaxini adaǥadinotigimadenitege niǥina oko ane dinotigimadetiwage leeǥodi niǥinoa notaǥa ane deǥeleteda , ane diǥica jaoǥa , igaataǥa joǥowooǥoti niǥina oko dinotigimade nigepaa nidelaǥa .

Odaa okotawece aǥica ane yapoǥoditini ǥodatobi macataǥa naǥajo lipegeteǥe Moisés aneo latopije . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee ǥodatobi yakadi me ikee anodaaǥeeteda Aneotedoǥoji me datale , macataǥa noleeǥaxi . Odaa Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji idokee me iigi anejinaǥa me ǥodewiǥa , codaa eo me ǥodiciagi Ǥoniotagodi , odaa jiǥidaaǥee latalaǥa Aneotedoǥoji me dinikee catiwedi ǥodewiǥa , codaa idapaǥa diiticogi me dinikee .

Pida lawodi Cristo daǥaxa meliodi loniciwaǥa . Cristo aǥica libeyacaǥajegi codaa aǥica libatiigi . Codaa Liwigo , ane daǥa yeleo , yaxawa me dinibooteta Aneotedoǥoji . Lawodi iwilegitema ǥodaaleǥena niǥinoa ǥodoenataka ane beyagi , niǥinoa anowote me ǥodeleo . Ǥodiwilegi eotedibige me jakataǥa me jaoǥa ǥobakeditema Aneotedoǥoji , ane ewikegi .

Aneotedoǥoji yajigotediogi noǥeedi liciagi niǥijo ǥonoǥeedi ane najigotedoǥowa niǥijo niǥijaaniǥijotigi naǥa jinakatonaǥa Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo . Odaa ajakadi daǥa jakapetege niǥica aneote Aneotedoǥoji . ”

Codaa jinaǥawii Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji me agecaǥalo . Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji yajigotedaǥawa Liwigo eotedibige me ikee me ǥadiomaǥatitedicoace makaami epoka nepiliditeda , codaa me ikee me ǥadoteteni nigepaaǥicota noko meote me ǥadiwokoni ǥabeyaceǥeco nigepaa ganigicatibige .

Enice analakitibige anodaaǥeni maleekoka ajipaatalo yotaǥa codaa anodaageni mabaategetiwaji , odaa anoliitini anabaatege , codaa adinilaanitece ǥabeyaceǥeco . Nige daǥadinenyaǥati , janagi makaamitaǥatiwaji micataǥa oliceǥegi , odaa aǥowooǥoti naǥaca lakata nige janagi makaamitaǥatiwaji .
Ionigipi yemaanigipi . Jiniǥikani diǥica ane ǥadinaalenitiwaji . Niǥina oko aneo ane iǥenaǥa , iniaaǥini iǥenaǥa , digo mijoataǥa Cristo me iǥenaǥa .

Yokaaǥetedipi yemaanigipi . Jinaǥa domaǥa iwaǥati inoatawece niwicidi anowo niǥina oko me notaǥanaǥa . Pida awinitece lotaǥa niǥinoa niwicidi , amanagawini owooǥoti nigewi me icoǥotedigi miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji . Igaataǥa jeǥeliodi oko ilaagiteloco niǥina iiǥo anodi moyeloǥoditedibece lowooko Aneotedoǥoji , pida niwitakaǥa .

Inioxoadipi , jemaa makaamitawecetiwaji owooǥoti , codaa ajemaa daǥawienatakani , me jatematiiǥataǥawa Aneotedoǥoji me yakadi me ixomaǥateetedice ǥabeyaceǥeco leeǥodi niǥijo Jesus aneote . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji yakadi me iǥenaǥa niǥina oko ane nakato . Igaataǥa niǥijoa lajoinaǥaneǥeco Moisés baadiǥica loniciwaǥa mowo me iǥenaǥa niǥina oko .

Inioxoadipi , digawini owidijedi yotaǥa . Aniniitibeci leeǥoditiwaji mida anenitege Ǥoniotagodi . Daǥa jiditace niǥijoa baanaǥa jidi , aidigecaǥaleǥe , pida ǥadaxawanitiwaji matiteteloco ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi .

Codaa nigica ane nigicile niǥina akaamitiwaji , leeditibige maniodi digoida liǥeladi , odaa aǥenagi liǥeladi Aneotedoǥoji midokida maniodi , odaa aǥica ane iloikatidi Aneotedoǥoji niǥina me ateciǥitiwaji . Nige jakadi mejigo idalitaǥawatiwaji , odaa jemaa ǥadajacaǥatitece niǥinoa eletidi ganicinoa ane agikanitecetiwaji .

Odaa jeǥeetiogi Pilatos , “ Enice adeegitetiwaji , akamaǥa awini niǥica anemiitalo , iwitece ane ǥanajoinaǥaneǥeco ” . Odaa niǥijoa lacilodi judeutedi modi , “ Aǥica ǥonaǥatetigi daǥa jeloataǥa oko , akamokakaami mida ǥanaǥatetigi ” .
Odaa oleetibige niǥica ane daǥaxa mele ǥadixakedi me yajigotaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo . Odaa ee baǥa jikeetaǥawatiwaji naigi ane daǥaxa mele .

Enice Jesus jiǥijaaǥijoa niǥica sacerdoti ǥoneǥegi ane jopooǥatibige . Ijaaǥijoa liciagi Aneotedoǥoji , aǥica deǥeote ane beyagi , aǥica nibeyaceǥegi catiwedi laaleǥena . Aneotedoǥoji iomaǥaditedice Jesus liwigotigi niǥina oko abeyacaǥaǥa , odaa Aneotedoǥoji ja yadeegi me ideite miniwataǥa mepaa iiǥe inoatawece .
Jakadi me idinatitalo inoatawece niǥinoa ganicinoa , leeǥodi Cristo najigotediwa yoniciwaǥa me jakadi me idinatitalo .
Niǥijoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco oikee Aneotedoǥoji ane yemaa me awiitetiwaji . Yemaa matamitege inoatawece ane beyagi , codaa me daǥa ǥadoomatewatiwaji ane daǥa ǥadodawa .

Oleetibige midioka limedi motaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji , jiniǥikani motaǥaneǥeni . Atacolitiwaji niǥina motaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji amaleeǥaǥa owooǥoti nige yajigotedaǥawa anipokitalo , odaa aniotagodeetalo .

Niǥijo Moisés naǥa wajipatalo niǥijoa notaǥa , odaa jiǥiale , noditicogi Egito , odaa jiǥigo midiwa niiǥotedi Midiã idiaaǥi iomiǥigitigi miditaǥa niǥica noiigi . Jiǥidiaaǥi niǥijoa itoataale lionaǥa .

Niǥina ǥoneleegiwa baadaǥa leeditibige me yapoǥoditi lacilo , igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji yoe ǥoneleegiwa me liciaceekawa , codaa yajigote naǥatetigi ane datika me doǥetetalo Aneotedoǥoji . Pida iwaalo baǥa ikee naǥatetigi ǥoneleegiwa , codaa me doǥeteta .

Jemaa Aneotedoǥoji midioka limedi meote mele ǥadaaleǥenali , amanagawini owooǥotitiwaji mawii niǥica anewi . Igaataǥa ǥadixipenitedicoace eote makaami lapo oko ane ilaǥatiwage , codaa eotedibige mele ǥadaaleǥenali . Codaa midioka limedi maniotagodeetalo .

Aneotedoǥoji eote inoatawece aninoa codaa doweditedeloco inoatawece , codaa inoatawece nepilidi . Aneotedoǥoji nadeegite miniwataǥa eliodi oko meote me lionigipi , codaa me iweniǥide . Enice joaniǥidaa mewi , niǥijo meote lewiǥa oko , ika Jesus , me dawikode , odaa joaniǥidaa naǥa igodi libakedi . Jesus jiǥijaaǥeote ǥodewiǥa , joaniǥidaa ane libakedi .
Amiina aneotiwaji makaami dinaxakawamigi , codaa madinideleǥeni ? Adinideleǥenitiwaji leeǥotedi niǥinoa lemaanaǥa ǥadaaleǥenali ane beyagi , joaniǥinaaǥowote memaani midele .
Digawinitiwaji ! Inatecibece oko modi mini oko ǥadiwigotigitiwaji ane doǥolaǥataka ane daǥaxa me beyagi caticedi anowo niǥina ane diǥica aneetege Aneotedoǥoji . Nigopeloǥotege laninoǥodo .

Niǥina mawikodeetiwaji , ǥadawikodico liciaco lawikodico eledi oko . Pida Aneotedoǥoji idioka limedi meote ane ligegi , codaa aǥadikanitetiwaji daǥawikodee caticedi ǥadoniciwaǥa . Niǥina me ǥadikanitetiwaji mawikodee yajigotedaǥawa ǥadoniciwaǥatiwaji mabootege ǥadawikodico , odaa akati me ǥadiwokoni me amiǥitice .
Jowooǥodi nigidiaaǥidi nige ǥadalatitiwaji , niǥina oko ane liciagi diwilecoǥoni ane diojo icota monota ǥadiwigotigitiwaji . Odaa aǥetiǥadiwikodeni anakaamitiwaji micataǥa niǥina lapo waxacocoli .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi mokomaǥa idiniweniǥidenaǥa akaami leeǥoditiwaji niǥijo me idaliiǥatiogi eletidi lapoli loiigi Ǥoniotagodi midiwataǥa eletidi nigotadi . Niǥida moko idinanenaǥatibece leeǥodi midioka limedi manakatoni Ǥoniotagodi , codaa madinatiitalo niǥinoa anodigotoǥowa metiǥodiatetibeci codaa me niǥinoa eletidi ane dakaketoǥodomi .
Aniǥica ane nadi Aneotedoǥoji . Pida nige idinemaanaǥatiwage , odaa Aneotedoǥoji iniwa mokotaǥa , codaa jemaanaǥa eledi oko catiwedi ǥodaaleǥena digo anigotedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji me ǥodemaa .

Ee , Paulo , jidi naǥadi iwakate notaǥanaǥaxi . Ee liiǥexegi Jesus Cristo , codaa me Aneotedoǥoji Ǥodiodi , aneote Jesus me yewiǥatace niǥijo me yeleo . Aǥoko anetidiolatice , codaa aǥoko anetidiiǥe me jibatema Aneotedoǥoji .

Amina beǥele mowoo . Ijaaǥijoa Ǥoniotagodi , eliodi me dawikode codaa dinatite ijoatawece ane beyagi anowotema niǥijoa abeyacaǥaǥa . Joaniǥidaaǥee nigowootibige Ǥoniotagodi , odaa aǥanigaaxetiwaji migetaǥa adinibadaani .
Nige micataǥa daǥa ǥodemaǥawa Cristo , nigidiaaǥidi ǥodewikaǥawa , odaa ja gela anejinaǥa , digo mijoataǥa Cristo me yewiǥatace .
Eledi mee Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa , “ Akaamitiwaji ane daǥakaami judeutedi , aniniitibecitiwaji , awanitege niǥijo noiigi Aneotedoǥoji ane iomaǥaditedice ! ”

Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo yenikamaǥa me neloǥoditoǥowa nigicotalo niǥicoa owidijedi nokododi , odaa eliodi oko oika modioteci ǥoniiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi aneetece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi . Odaa niǥidi oko odioteci niwicidi awitakaǥaǥa , codaa odioteci niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ane icoǥotedigi minitaǥa diaabo .

Tito , awii niǥina oko monalaǥatibige me leeditibige moyiwaǥadi niǥinoa lacilodi idiaa niǥijo anida naǥatetigiteloco digoina iiǥo . Leeditibige me eniwaǥatakanaǥa , codaa me nigomaǥa mowote inoatawece anele .

Niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi domoǥoyemaa moyaagiditibige niǥijo jotigide Aneotedoǥoji mokexaa ligegiteda , odaa jiǥidaaǥee naǥa iliidaǥadi ditibigimedi codaa me iiǥo . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji ibake ninyoǥodi meote niǥina iiǥo . Odaa naǥa iomaǥadi ninyoǥodi , odaa ja dinikee iiǥo liwigotinigi ninyoǥodi .

Igaataǥa ijaaǥijoa Cristo dawikode , codaa yeleo leeǥodi niǥinoa ǥobeyaceǥeco . Onijoteci me yeleo , mijoa iǥenaǥa odaa ja yeleotema niǥina ane daǥa iǥenaǥatibigiwaji eotibige me yakadi me ǥodadeegite Aneotedoǥoji . Oyeloadi lolaadi Cristo , pida Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji eo me yewiǥatace .

Niǥina oko meyamaǥaticoace meniwaǥatakanaǥa , domaǥa daǥaxa meletema niǥidi oko daaditiǥica moyowooǥodi naigi ane iǥenaǥa , odaa aǥele niǥina naǥa domoǥoyowoogodi naigi ane iǥenaǥa , odaa jeǥeyamaǥaticoace odaa aǥaleeǥodiotece Aneotedoǥoji liiǥenatakaneǥegi anijo modibatege .

Ǥonioxoadipi , jibakenaǥa naǥatetigi Liboonaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo me ǥadiiǥeneǥegi motoniticoace niǥidi ǥonioxoadipi ane nigojigipi , codaa niǥidi aǥoyemaa modioteci niǥijoa ǥodiiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco baanaǥa jiiǥaxinaǥatece .

Niǥina noiigi digoina iiǥo owo ane beyagi leeǥodi onijoteci ǥoneleegiwa ane liboonaǥadi Adão . Odaa leeǥodi nibeyacaǥa , jiǥida némaǥa . Odaa inatawece oko aǥica ini ane daǥa yeleo leeǥodi inatawece inoa libeyaceǥeco .

Leeǥodi monakato Aneotedoǥoji , oideleǥe eletidi noiika , pida idokee moiǥeke . Niǥijo naǥa niiǥenatakanaǥa owote niǥica ane iǥenaǥa , odaa Aneotedoǥoji ja yajigotediogi niǥijo ane ligegitediogi meote . Leeǥodi monakato , Aneotedoǥoji noxoco liaontedi niolatedi niǥina midatibece ane doide .
Niǥina oko etiǥodiatetibece , pida Aneotedoǥoji aǥica daǥa ǥodikatedice . Micataǥa deǥeliodi me inigaaxaǥa , pida aǥodaa ǥodeleo .

Niǥida makaamitiwaji ǥadiciagi niǥina ane noǥolaǥatakanaǥa , igaataǥa jiǥijo makaami nepilidi Aneotedoǥoji , pida natigide jiǥikani me iwitece . Joǥowooǥotitiwaji niǥina oko ane doletibige niǥinoa ane lemaanaǥa niǥina okotigi niǥina iiǥo , niǥini oko jeǥeo me laxakawa Aneotedoǥoji . Niǥina oko ane doletibige me lokaaǥetedipi niǥina oko ane doǥoyiwaǥaditeda Aneotedoǥoji , niǥini oko jeǥeo me laxakawa Aneotedoǥoji .
Paulo ijaaǥijoa lokaaǥetedi ja diiǥetitacicoace nipodigi Frígia aneite niiǥotedi Galácia . Pida Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji aika me natematikanaǥa digoida nipodigi Ásia .

Pida niǥina meetece Moisés niǥina oko ane iǥenaǥa leeǥodi me nakato Aneotedoǥoji , mee , “ Jinaǥakamaǥa adinigee , deǥeni , ‘ Amiijo ica ane yakadi migo digoida ditibigimedi ? ’ ” Niǥida ǥagikaneǥegi ikee memaani manadeegi Cristo micoǥoteenitedibigimece ditibigimedi , menagi eote me ǥodeǥenaǥa .

Odaa niǥijo odoejegi aanjo ja yadotice niǥijo nibaxiawaanigi nadotinigi digoina iiǥo . Odaa ja nodi liwexegadi nelecoli anoilee niǥidi oko anadi nibikotaxete niǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide , codaa modoǥeteta niǥijo niwigo anepaa liwilanigi niǥidi oko .

Naǥa dibate naǥajo notaǥanaǥaxi , niǥijoa cwaatolo ewikaǥa , ijaaǥijoa 24 lacilodi dakagitiniwace lodoe niǥijoa Waxacoco . Oninitecibeci niǥidiwa lacilodi ada noǥoxiǥa-liwenaǥa , codaa idoa nibaxiatedawaanaǥa oolo , nolee edokojegi , ane ikee lipoketedi noiigi ane nepilidi Aneotedoǥoji niǥina moyotaǥaneǥe .

Inatawece oko anoyiwaǥadi Jesus niǥijaaǥijoa niǥicoa Cristo , ane niiǥe Aneotedoǥoji meote ǥodewiǥa , niǥina oko anetiwaǥataka joaniǥiniaa lionigi Aneotedoǥoji . Nalaǥatibigiji niǥina oko ane yemaa eliodi , aaǥaǥa yemaa eledi lionigipi niǥini eliodi , ane nioxoadipi .
Odaa aidinanenaǥatibece , oteǥexaaǥaǥa jiweenigenatakanaǥa , oteǥexaaǥaǥa ǥodelokojogo eledi oko .
Jinaǥawiceni motaǥaneǥeni nigoxoki niǥina ǥoneleegiwa oxiiǥodi , pida oxoki ademii micataǥa daǥa ǥadiodi . Codaa oxoki niǥinoa lionekadi ademiita micataǥa daǥa ǥanioxoadipi .

Leeditibige mele aneni me ǥadewiki maleeǥawaanitege niǥina oko ane doǥoyowooǥoditeda Aneotedoǥoji , icaaǥica nige beyagi modotaǥatibigaǥaji . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee nigonadi niǥinoa ǥadoenataka anele , odaa joǥoiweniǥide Aneotedoǥoji niǥica noko nigicota me iwi anigotediogi niǥina oko leeǥodi niǥinoa loenataka anowote .

Niǥijo jotigide idioka limedi me joletibige niǥica ane domaǥa yemaa Aneotedoǥoji , odaa ja jiatetibece Cristo loiigi ( jiletibige daantiǥidaaǥida ica ane yemaa Aneotedoǥoji ) . Jiǥijo me jotete lajoinaǥaneǥeco Moisés . Odaa joaniǥidaa niǥina ane yoiigi modiletibige daǥa ideǥenaǥa niǥijo aneji .
Odaa ja digikatece naǥaca lakata naǥa icí lionigi . Noǥoniniǥodi , modita , “ Jotigi-noko , seete lakata menoale naǥa ika dapicoǥo-lolaadi ” .

Niǥijo noko judeutedi joǥodinoetege nalokegi , odaa niǥijoa lacilodi judeutedi aǥoyemaa diǥidiaaǥite niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi midoataǥa licenaǥanaǥatedi deǥepaa eledi noko , leeǥodi me saabado , noko daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi modipokota Pilatos me diiǥenatakatiogi moninoketedini litili niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi anoyototelogo nicenaǥanaǥatedi ( owotibige me age me nigo ) , odaa joǥonikatiniwace nicenaǥanaǥatedi .

Naǥa wajipatalo niǥijoa lotaǥa Jesus , odaa Pilatos ja doletibige niǥica nimaweneǥegitece Jesus me ikatedice . Pida niǥijoa lacilodi judeutedi idokee me napaawaǥateloco , modi , “ Nige ikanitedice niǥidoa ǥoneleegiwa , amakaami lokaaǥedi César , anokotawece ǥodiiǥe . Igaataǥa niǥina ane dinanatigi me inionigi-eliodi , lakapetegi César ” .
Odaa jeǥeetediogi Jesus , “ Jinaǥakaami agecaǥalodipi , codaa jinaǥa aǥowikomataatiwaji . Pida anakatoni Aneotedoǥoji . Ee eledi adinakatoni .

Icota me jowooǥoditiwaji me daǥadoiita okanicodaaǥicata anowotaǥadomi ǥadaxakawepodi , pida idokee mabo ǥadaaleǥenalitiwaji . Niǥina mabo ǥadaaleǥenalitiwaji me aatege ǥadaxakawepodi jiǥikeenitiogi Aneotedoǥoji micota me yaaǥadi , pida akamaǥakaami jaǥaǥekenitibigiwaji , leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji eote manigaanyetiwaji .

Anaǥakamaǥa adiolaaticetiwaji , pida Ee ǥadiolaatice , odaa ja ǥadiomaǥatiticoace jaotibige memii , codaa me áwe , odaa niǥinoa ǥatá abeyagi . Joaniǥidaaǥee , Eiodi yajigotedaǥawatiwaji inoatawece ane ipokitibige , niǥina me abakeni Iboonaǥadi .

Niǥijo jotigide , Abel naǥa yadeegi eijeeǥagi me ibootalo Aneotedoǥoji , niǥijo ane yadeegi daǥaxa mele caticedi niǥijo liboonigi Caim anaǥaǥa yadeegitalo Aneotedoǥoji leeǥodi Abel me nakato Aneotedoǥoji . Odaa leeǥodi Abel me nakato Aneotedoǥoji , odaa Aneotedoǥoji ikee me yakadi Abel me iǥenaǥa niǥijo naǥa dibatetege niǥijo Abel liboonigitalo . Eleditace , leeǥodi Abel me nakato Aneotedoǥoji , odaa micataǥa daǥalee ǥodotaǥaneǥe , idaaǥidata naǥa jotigide me yeleo .
Leeditibige me ǥodowooǥegi moko liotagipi Cristo , ane najigotedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco analee diǥicoa moyowooǥodi .
Yotetitedi enitedinigi iiǥo , micoataǥa niǥinoa niale-ela baanaǥa beyagi ane niwadetedini niǥina me igike niocodi .
Joaniǥidaaǥee , akaami yokaaǥetedipi yemaanigipi , jiniǥica anenitege niwicidi .
Jiniǥikani ane beyagi daǥa dinigaanyetaǥadici . Pida aǥekeni ane beyagi mawii anele .

Awii niǥina anonakato Ǥoniotagodi monalaǥatibige niǥijoa iiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco . Ajoini Ǥoniotagodi lodoe me daǥadiaa nidelaǥa leeǥodi niǥinoa notaǥa ane doǥoyowooǥodi ane diitigilo , igaataǥa niǥina me dinotigimade ayaxawa oko anowajipatiogi , pida beǥeo me daǥadiaa eniwaǥatakanaǥa .

Ipecitege Aneotedoǥoji , odaa nebi jaǥaǥa ipegitedaǥagitiwaji . Ikani mawii ane beyagi , akaamitiwaji anakaami abeyacaǥaǥa , micataǥa niǥina oko me iwilegi libaaǥatedi ane napioi . Jinaǥaleeǥoteteni nowooko ane beyagi catiwedi ǥadaaleǥenali , akaamitiwaji anoleetibige memaani Aneotedoǥoji , pida aǥikani moleetibige memaani niǥinoa anicinoa aninoa niǥina iiǥo .
Pida nigawii ǥademaanigi oko , jaǥawii ane beyagi , codaa niiǥenatakaneǥegi ikee makaami oko ane daǥa yoteteteda liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji .
Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji aǥeniditedoǥowa daǥa ǥodoomatewa ane daǥa ǥododawa , pida eniditedoǥowa me jatamaǥajoǥotege inoatawece ane beyagi , codaa yemaa miniokiniwateda me ǥodewiǥatema .

Aneotedoǥoji ane ideite ditibigimedi ikee lélaǥa leeǥodi inoatawece ane libeyaceǥeco oko , leeǥodi me doǥoyiwaǥaditeda Aneotedoǥoji , codaa leeǥodi inoatawece ane beyagi anowote modakapetege eledi oko . Leeǥodi niǥinoa libeyaceǥeco anowote , odaa aǥoika eledi oko moyowooǥodi niǥica anewi anodaaǥeeteda Aneotedoǥoji .

Ǥodokaaǥetedipi ǥodemaanigipi . Ele me idinemaanaǥatiwage , igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji jiǥiniaaǥeote me jemaanaǥa eledi oko . Niǥina oko ane yemaa eledi , joaniǥiniaa lionigi Aneotedoǥoji , codaa yowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji .
Nigini oko anee me idei manitaǥa lokokena , pida yelatema nioxoa , odaa niǥini oko idokee me idei nexocaǥa .
Yakadi maniniitibecetiwaji niǥina nige etiǥadameni leeǥodi me iwitece Cristo , igaataǥa Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji ini makaamitaǥatiwaji , niǥini Niwigo ǥodaxawa me jiweniǥidenaǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Odaa Paulo naǥa nicetiniwace , odaa ja yatematitiogi ijoatawece loenataka Aneotedoǥoji miditaǥa niǥijo ane daǥa judeutedi niǥijo naǥa imonyatedicogi Paulo midiaa libakadi .
Aǥica niǥina akaamitiwaji ane yakadi me nikeetiwa mida ibeyaceǥegi . Nigejitece anewi , igame leeǥodi me daǥa iwaǥatitedatiwaji yotaǥa ?
Niǥidiaaǥidi mee , “ Aǥalee jemaa daǥa nalaǥatibigiji niǥicoa libeyaceǥeco , oteǥexaaǥaǥa niǥijo me deǥetidadiwaǥadi . ”
Yajigotedaǥawatiwaji owidi anele ane icoǥotigi miniwataǥa , igaataǥa eote ǥanimaweneǥegi me enitece codaa mowooǥoti , icoatawece niǥicoa ane leeditibige mowooǥoti codaa ane leeditibige me enitece .

Inioxoadipi , jao ipoketegi leeǥodi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo , codaa leeǥodi Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji meote me idinemaanaǥatiwage . Jipokotaǥawatiwaji ina baǥa otaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji , digo aneji me jotaǥaneǥe amaleeǥaǥa idaxawa Aneotedoǥoji .
Noǥoniniǥodi niǥidi oko-nelegi , moditalo , “ Niǥida makaami ejime dakatiwaǥaji niwigo abeyaceǥegi . Igaataǥa aǥica ane doletibige me ǥadeloati ” .

Aneotedoǥoji niiǥe Jesus Cristo me nadooǥodi lawodi me yeleotetema libeyaceǥeco oko . Jesus yeleo eotedibige me daǥalee yelatedoǥodomi Aneotedoǥoji , codaa me daǥadiaa ǥodiloikatidi leeǥodi niǥinoa ǥobeyaceǥeco , nige jinakatonaǥa Jesus . Aneotedoǥoji dinatitedoǥowa , joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me daǥa ikateda oko diǥidioka limedi me nigo leeǥotedi niǥinoa libeyaceǥeco , niǥijo oko ane newiǥa maleediǥicoateda Jesus . Aneotedoǥoji niiǥe Jesus maǥaǥa yeleotetema libeyaceǥeco niǥidi oko me ikee me iǥenaǥa .

Niǥijoa niotaka ijaaǥijoa nowienoǥododi Aneotedoǥoji liǥeladi owo noledi nelegi aninoa ligoli , leeǥodi me diwete niǥijo enoale . Odaa jiǥidiaa dabidite me dinitotibigiwaji . Pedro eledi ida mawatiogi aaǥaǥa dilowate .

Abaatege icatawece niǥica ane najigotedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji ane ǥodotetetema diaabo ane ǥodaxakawa . Niǥina me jibakenaǥa Aneotedoǥoji ane najigotedoǥowa me jotetaǥatini , odaa jakataǥa me jatitaǥatini niǥina diaabo me ibake nimaweneǥeco micaaniǥigotoǥowa .
Naǥa igetace Pedro , meetalo , “ Iniotagodi . Igaamee ica daǥa jakadi mejigo jiotaǥadici ina natigide ? Ja idigo me ideleotaǥadomi ” .

Odaa amanagawini , Aneotedoǥoji eote ǥadaaleǥenali mele , codaa yotete ǥadowooko leeǥodi me ǥadexocitege Jesus Cristo . Ajakataǥa me jowooǥotaǥa niǥica anodaaǥee me yotete ǥodaaleǥena , codaa me ǥodowooko .
Yakadi me jibakenaǥa ǥonioladi me joǥeeǥatalo Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji ane Ǥodiodi . Pida eledi jibakenaǥa ǥonioladi me beyagi me jotaǥanaǥatibige eledi oko Aneotedoǥoji loenataka ane latopiwadi .

Pida aǥejitaǥawatiwaji mawalacetege oko anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo , ane loomatewa ane daǥa lodawa , adodigomadaǥa , olicaǥaǥa , inaaǥinoa niwicomaǥa . Joaniǥidaa mejitaǥawatiwaji me daǥa awalacetege oko anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo , leeǥodi mawalacetege domaǥa leeditibige manotiticogi niǥina iiǥo .
Emeǥeeta jiletibige deǥele me jaote inoatawece ane jakadi me jaote me jakapetege Liboonaǥadi Jesus anelatedibige nigotaǥa Nazaré .

Oiwita niǥina iwaalepodi , odaa ja lowoogo doǥodaa noomatewadi , codaa idioka limedi mowo ane beyagi . Oninaaletiniwace niǥina oko ane daǥa datiteteloco eliwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa oyowooǥodi modinigaanyetece niǥinoa ane nepilidi eledi oko , leeǥodi agiloǥonadi mowote niǥijoa loenataka ane beyagi . Pida Aneotedoǥoji ja nixootediniwace .

Niǥina nimeedi , ane daǥa libakedi me nowienaǥanaǥa , codaa ane daǥa nepiliditeda waxacocoli . Niǥina daǥa naditege diwilecoǥoni , niǥini yaladi waxacocoli , elodi . Odaa diwilecoǥoni ja dibatalo waxacocoli , codaa ilaagaǥaditiwaji .
Enice , analakitibige inioxoadipi yemaanigipi ! Inatawece oko leeditibige me nigomaǥa me najipaaǥa , odaa jineǥepece agitatakani codaa jineǥepece eliǥidee .
Jiǥidaaǥee Ǥoniotagodi me iiǥe niǥina ane yatemati natematigo anele anoyalaǥatalo Ǥoniotagodi , niǥidi leeditibige modibatege anoyopotibige miditaǥa oko anoniiǥaxitiniwace .
Janagi niǥina iiǥo me Ee lokokena , jaotibige minatawece anetidadiwaǥadi aǥideiticoace nexocaǥa .

Niǥidiaaǥidi Jesus jiǥicote niǥijo ǥoneleegiwa catiwedi Aneotedoǥoji liǥeladi . Odaa jeǥeeteta , “ Digawini , niǥida makaami ja ǥadicili . Odaa jinaǥa domaǥaleeǥawii ǥadoenatagi ane beyagi , adiǥicatace ǥaninyaagi caticedi niǥijo aneni ” .
Awii inoatawece aneni me ikee memaani eledi oko .
Nigademaanitiwaji , enice iwaǥati niǥinoa iiǥenatakaneǥeco .

Enice adinowetitiwaji me doǥowocetege majipaata Niǥijo ane ǥadotaǥaneǥeni digoida ditibigimedi . Niǥijo jotigide , niǥijo anodowocetege mowajipata latematigo Aneotedoǥoji ane yeloǥodi digoina iiǥo , aǥoiwokotibigiwaji , pida Aneotedoǥoji iloikatidi . Nige doǥoiwoko niǥijo oko , oko eledi aǥica ǥonimaweneǥegi daǥa ǥodiwoko nige daǥa jibaǥatege Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa ane icoǥotedibigimece ditibigimedi .
Niǥijo jotigide aǥicoa mowooǥotitetiwaji Aneotedoǥoji . Codaa akaamitiwaji liotaka niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa .
Aneotedoǥoji ixipetedice Jesus me Liotagi , jaǥakamaǥakaamitiwaji odoejedipi me imonyatedaǥawa eotedibige mikani niǥinoa ǥanaicoli ane beyagi , odaa jiǥidaa me ǥadibinienitetiwaji . ”

Niǥida moko oko nakataǥanadi leeǥodi jinataǥa ijoatawece Jesus ane loenataka digoida nigotaǥa Jerusalém , codaa me niǥinoa eletidi niiǥotedi judeutedi . Odaa idiaaǥidi judeutedi joǥoyototedeloco nicenaǥanaǥate moyeloadi .

Inioxoadipi , ǥadibodicaxinitiwaji leeǥodi Liboonaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo maniwotitema ane ǥadotaǥatiwaji , odaa jinaǥawalacetiwage . Opilitelocotiwaji idokida ǥadowoogo , codaa niǥica ane akatitiwaji me iǥenaǥa me ǥadoenatagi .
Niǥijo jotigide akamaǥakaamitiwaji leegitalo Aneotedoǥoji motonitedice . Codaa akaami lakapetedipi leeǥotedi niǥijoa ǥadowooko ane beyagi , codaa me niǥijoa ǥadoenataka ane beyagi anawiite .

Enice oxaxini niǥinoa lidekeco ǥodolaadi ane beyagi lionekadi anidioka limedi moyemaa mowote . Pida adinoniciwaǥati madineǥenaǥati , codaa oleetibige midioka limedi manakatoni Ǥoniotagodi , codaa memaani eledi ǥonioxoadipi , codaa me ǥadilakiitege eledi oko . Jiǥidaa nige ǥadiciagi niǥijo ane yapidi laaleǥenali anodipokotalo Ǥoniotagodi me yaxawatediogi .

Leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me yewikatiditace Cristo , odaa jiǥidaaǥee micataǥa Aneotedoǥoji daǥa ǥadewikatititacetiwaji ǥadawanaǥatitetege Cristo . Odaa ele midioka limedi moleetibigetiwaji niǥica ane idei ditibigimedi , aneite Cristo moiweniǥide , nicote liwai libaaǥadi Eliodi .

Igaanaǥa datenaǥa niǥijo odoejegi aanjo , odaa ja jinadi noledi , inaa ǥalatili-eloodoli awatege ǥodawodi , onokoletedinicogi digoina iiǥo . Odaa ja yabidi oniniteci niǥidiwa iniwatadiǥini liwailidi niǥina iiǥo , yabidi nialeli , codaa me inatawece nipodigi ane dione .

Odaa modi , “ Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji aneliodi ǥanimaweneǥegi , ane iiǥeni inoatawece , anakaami ewikegi , anakaaǥakaami , codaa anicota managi , iniotagodeeǥataǥawa leeǥodi mabakeni ǥanimaweneǥegi nelegi , codaa joǥowicenaǥani me iiǥeni inatawece oko .

Naǥa niniǥodi Jesus meeteta , “ Doǥowooǥotawaanigi niǥica ane yajigo Aneotedoǥoji , codaa doǥowooǥoti ane Ee , ane jipokotaǥawa ninyoǥodi me jacipe . Doǥowooǥoti , daǥanagawini anipokitiwa odaa ja jajigotaǥawa ninyoǥodi aneo lewiǥa oko ” .
Leeǥodi Cristo naǥa yewiǥatace , odaa nige dinikeetace , oko eledi , Aneotedoǥoji eote me ǥodeloǥo codaa ǥodiweniǥide ǥodawanaǥaditetege Cristo .

Pida niǥinoa notaǥa diniditedini amaleeǥaǥa iwaǥatakanitiwaji Jesus me niǥijaaǥijoa ane niiǥe Aneotedoǥoji meote ǥodewiǥa , codaa me Lionigi Aneotedoǥoji , codaa amanagawini nige iwaǥatakanitiwaji , odaa idiokaanaǥa limedi me ǥadewikitema leeǥodi naǥatetigi Jesus .

Pida boǥoko nepilidi Aneotedoǥoji . Codaa niǥina oko ane yowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji najipatoǥowa , codaa watacotoǥodici . Pida niǥina oko ane daǥa yowooǥoditeda Aneotedoǥoji baadaǥa najipatoǥowa . Joaniǥidaa jowooǥotaǥatece oko nigewi mini minitaǥa Niwigo anewi , oǥoa , domige ini minitaǥa niwigo awitakegi .

Niǥina mateciǥitiwaji maniodi mikeeni madinemaani , odaa niǥina midi niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi me ǥagiiwepoditiwaji , aniboliǥatibigiwaji . Codaa adinajacaǥaditibigiwaji , pida niodaǥa , codaa daǥaxa me nacipaǥa aǥonalaǥatibige niǥidi eledi oko . Micataǥa niǥina lapioyaǥajegi jayogo ane yapidi . Odaa niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi awitakaǥaǥa liciagi niǥinoa loolatedi ane nadeegi niocodi , pida aǥica ebici , codaa liciagi niǥinoa nialeli ane daǥaca ela niǥina me domaǥa limedi metaye , niǥidiwa nialeli yadilo leeǥodi idiwatawece litodi yadilo monapoce .

Niǥijo noǥonadi loniciwaǥa niǥijoa liiǥexedi Aneotedoǥoji , odaa niǥica oko joǥoyadeegi inoa neelotaginadi midiwataǥa icoa ladicotiidi . Odaaǥidiaaǥoyate minoataǥa inoa limetiidi codaa midiwataǥa icoa liǥelatedi lipegeteǥe . Owotibige liwa Pedro me yakadi me ixomaǥateloco niǥina me ixomaǥatijo , minaaǥigotece miditaǥa .

Codaa ele midioka limedi mabakeni ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi me ǥadotetenitema okanicodaaǥica anigotaǥawa ǥodaxakawa me dineetaǥawa . Ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi micataǥa daǥa niǥina loligojegi iodaǥawa , ane yolitege nopitenali ane ǥodalegi .

Niǥina mawiitiwaji okanicodaaǥica nibakedi , adinoniciwaǥati mawii nibakedi anele , micataǥa daǥa Ǥoniotagodi iiǥetedaǥawa mawii niǥida nibakedi , jiniǥidoka ixomitiwece ǥadacilo meledi ǥoneleegiwa ǥadiiǥeni mawii .

Codaa adinowetitiwaji adiǥicoa ane loomatewa ane daǥa lodawateda , oditaǥa aǥalee deemitetibige Aneotedoǥoji ane yemaa , mijotaǥa Esaú aneo niǥijo jotigide . Esaú iikoetege onidateci ǥinogo niweenigi niǥijoa ane domaǥa dibatege , leeǥodi modoejegi nionigi me domaǥa dibatege , niǥicoa ane nepilidi eliodi , diǥicota me yeleo eliodi .

Odaa iditawece ja napaawaǥataceloco modi , “ Baadeǥele daǥa ikanitedice . Biǥida ikanitice Barrabás ! ” Barrabás one niǥina ǥoneleegiwa ane doide , ǥonematagodi . ( Codaa joniǥica me ideleǥe niodaǥawadi ninionigi-eliodi romaanotedi . )
Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji meote Cristo me daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi naǥaxatedeloco inoatawece , eledi yajigote Liboonaǥadi ane daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi caticedi okanicodaaǥica eledi boonaǥadi .
Ajiwitakaǥa niǥina me jatematiiǥataǥawatiwaji anodaaǥee Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo meliodi notoetiigi niǥijo neǥenagi . Igaataǥa okomoǥoko jinataǥa niǥijo Aneotedoǥoji naǥa nelecaǥatee .

Odaa inoatawece niǥinoa liwakatedi ane iditedi yalaǥata niǥica noko Aneotedoǥoji , codaa anodaa leeditibige mejinaǥa me ǥodewiǥa . Iditedini niǥinoa notaǥa ane ǥalaǥa me jowooǥotaǥa ane diitigi . Odaa niǥina oko ane deǥeliodi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa niǥina oko ane doǥoyemaa moyowooǥodi niǥica anewi , odaa niǥidi oko aiǥenaǥa moyeloǥodi lotaǥa Paulo , odaa idaaǥodigotalo moyatemati eletidi liwailidi Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi . Odaa jiǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji micota me iloikatidi codaa me yaaǥadi niǥidi oko .

Odaa Barnabé ijaa Paulo niǥijoa liiǥexedi Ǥoniotagodi noǥowajipata niǥica ane domoǥowote niǥidi noiigi , odaa joǥoyaaǥadi inoa lowoodi moikee me agecaǥalodipi , odaa ja waleditiobece miditaǥa ica noiigi-nelegi , odaa jona napaawaǥa , modi ,

Ejitaǥawatiwaji joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Cristo me dinajigo me liotagi judeutedi , eotedibige me ikee Aneotedoǥoji me daǥa ixomaǥateetedice ane ligegi , pida eote ane ligegitediogi niǥijo jotigide laamipi judeutedi .
Niǥina oko nige diletibige daǥa diotece Aneotedoǥoji , pida ayajacaǥadi nioladi , odaa aǥica jaoǥate eliwaǥatakaneǥegi . Odaa niǥini oko epaa dininaale .

Analakitibige niǥijo mejitaǥawatiwaji , niǥina nimeedi anaǥaxateloco niotagodi . Odaa niǥina oko anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo nigetidiatetibeci , odaa akaami aaǥaǥa etiǥadiatenitibece . Doǥoyotete yotaǥa , odaa taǥaǥa oyotete ǥadotaǥatiwaji .
Odaa jeǥeetediogi Jesus niǥijoa judeutedi anoyiwaǥadi , “ Nigidioka limeditatiwaji me iwaǥati yotaǥa , odaa jaǥakaami niǥina anewi moniotici .
Niǥidiaaǥidi jiǥicota ica nigigi nelegi digoida niiǥo Egito codaa me nipodigi Canaã . Odaa niǥica oko eliodi me nawikodeeǥa . Codaa me jotigide ǥodaamipi aǥaleeǥica gaantokaaǥidi anoyeligo .
Eliodi me idinitibece niǥijo naǥa jibodice midi ǥadionigipi anodiotece niiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi anewi , ane niiǥetedoǥowa Ǥodiodi me jaoǥa .

Pida nigica oko ane daǥa dowediteloco litaagi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa eliododipi ane noiigiwepodi , ane daǥaxa mida ane jaoǥa , odaa iniaaǥini niǥini oko ja ika me diotece niiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa ja beyagi anee caticedi niǥina oko ane deǥeyiwaǥaditeda Ǥoniotagodi .

Enice iniǥa jipecaǥatege Aneotedoǥoji , jinaǥa jikanaǥa ǥodaaleǥena daǥa ǥodinaale , pida ejiwaǥataǥa ajawienaǥa . Lawodi Jesus noǥa moko nilaagedi , odaa ǥodapiditema inoatawece ǥobeyaceǥeco , micataǥa niǥina ninyoǥodi ane yapidi me yapitaǥadi ǥodolaadi .

Niǥidi noiigi idokida mowajipa moditibece , “ Niǥijo anijo me ǥodiatetibece , natigide jona yatematitedibece nibodicetedi anele anoditece Cristo . Jotigide geme domaǥa yemaa me yaaǥadi niǥinoa nibodicetedi anele . ”

Natigide , jipokotaǥawa manioditiwaji . Igaataǥa leeditibige manioditiwaji amaleeǥaǥa ǥadoniciwati , amanagawini aǥica ane yeleo . Igaataǥa akaamitawecetiwaji otiǥinitece ananiaditema otiǥidatece lamodi . ”
Jiǥixomaǥateenitedijotiwaji ǥadawikodico , codaa meliodi mawikodee Ee leeǥodi , pida aǥica daǥakaami agecaǥalodipi .

Iiǥaxini niǥinoa ǥoneleegiwadi laxokodipi me daǥa nacipaǥa , codaa niǥina eledi oko leeditibige modeemitetibige anee me newiǥa , codaa ele moibake lixakedi niǥina me nowookonaǥa , codaa leeditibige midioka limedi modioteci niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa leeditibige midioka limedi moyemaa eledi ǥonioxoadipi , codaa leeditibige modinatitalo niǥinoa ane dakaketema .
Aneotedoǥoji aiwi anigoteta niǥijo oko niǥijo jotigide niǥijo me doǥoyowooǥodi mida libatiigi . Pida natigide iiǥe inatawece niǥina oko digoina iiǥo , minatawece odinilaatece libeyaceǥeco .
Ada mipegitege naǥajo licenaǥanaǥate Jesus naǥajo eliodo , ajo nioxoa , ajaaǥajo Maria lodawa Clopas , ajaa Maria Madalena eledi ada miditaǥa .
Ajo nicaapa igotigi ǥodawodi . Codaa eledi liboonaǥadi me “ Aneotedoǥoji Lotaǥa . ”
Enice anidakitatiwaji adaǥawii menitini ǥanioxoa analeedaǥa yowooǥodi niǥica anele , leeǥodi mepaǥa owooǥoti makati melici niǥidi libole .

Aneotedoǥoji eote Jesus me yewiǥatace , codaa lolaadi aǥica daǥa neladi . Joaniǥidaa aneeteta Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo jotigide , mee , ‘ Jaotaǥadomi ane daǥaxa mele ane emokee me jakadi me jao . Joaniǥidaa ane igegita Davi anijo mejita me jao . ’
Nigicota noko nige idewiǥatace , odaa joǥowooǥotitiwaji me emoka Ee me idexogotege Eiodi , codaa akamokakaamitatiwaji me ǥadexocitigi , codaa me emoka Eeta me idexogotaǥagitiwaji .
Nigejiwaǥataǥa liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji , odaa aǥica daǥa jawienatakanaǥa me jowooǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi mejitaǥawatiwaji malee ǥademaǥawadi ǥabeyaceǥeco . Nige daǥa iwaǥatitatiwaji ane Ee , odaa nige ǥadelewitiwaji ǥademaǥawadi ǥabeyaceǥeco ” .
Odaa ja jinadi naǥajo iwaalo yemáǥa , yemakatidi me wacipetalo lawodi loiigi Aneotedoǥoji , codaa me lawodi niǥijo ane nigo leeǥodi modiotibece Jesus . Niǥijo naǥa jinadi , eliodi me idawela .

Owooǥotitiwaji me domaǥa yemaa diǥidiaaǥidi daǥa dibatege mijotaǥa eliodi niǥicoa ane nepilidi mijo modoejegi me nionigi . Pida ayakadi igaataǥa aǥica nimaweneǥegi daǥa iigi niǥica baanaǥa igo , idaaǥee me domaǥa doletibige ica nimaweneǥegi , codaa anoetibece .

Ica lapo-nelegi miditaǥa niǥijo nalokegi , eliodi oko oxatiniwace niǥina me notaǥanaǥa oyalaǥatalo Jesus . Idi oko anodi , “ Niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwa doane mele ” . Odaa idiaaǥeledi modi , “ Amitiǥica ica mele , mina ninaaletediniwace oko ” .
Odaa Ǥoniotagodi ja yajigotediogi loniciwaǥa , odaa eliodi oko joǥoyiwaǥadi lotaǥa , codaa monakato Ǥoniotagodi .

Pida idioka limedi me jeloǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji ane yemaa , me jocaǥanaǥatalo , Niǥijoa ane naditediwe ǥodaaleǥenali . Ajoleeǥatibige me jocaǥanaǥatiogi ǥoneleegiwadi niǥijo me jeloǥotaǥatedibece ǥobodicetedi anele , leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji ǥodiomaǥaditedice codaa jeǥepaa najigotedoǥowa niǥinoa ǥobodicetedi anele .
Pida iniotagodeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji , aneote me inigaanyaǥatece ǥobeyacaǥa inaa némaǥa leeǥodi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo aneotedoǥodomi .
Naǥana wajekalo ane diǥica ane dowediteloco , nibeotege Aneotedoǥoji me yaxawa , codaa idioka limedi me yotaǥaneǥe Aneotedoǥoji , enoale , codaa me noko , dipokotibigimece me yaxawa .
Codaa natigide aniǥica daǥa atikani Iboonaǥadi me ipokitalo Eiodi . Ipokitalotiwaji Eiodi , odaa jaǥabaatege ane ǥadipoketegi , eotedibige meliodi maniniitibecitiwaji .
Nigakaami niotagi neǥeniditedaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji ? Enice jinaǥa adinigecaǥaleǥeni ! Pida nigoyemaa metiǥadikanitice makaami niotagi , abaatege .
Niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi owo mawalacetiwage . Niǥinoa epaa lidaǥataka iiǥe lewiǥa niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi , odaa aǥica Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji mijotaǥa .

Ǥadopootiwaji niǥica me age mikanitedice Aneotedoǥoji aneniditedaǥawa . Leeǥodi Cristo eliodi meletedaǥadomitiwaji , odaa Aneotedoǥoji eniditedaǥawa makaami nepilidi . Pida jiǥiwaǥatitiwaji eledi natematigo anodi niǥina oko me icoǥotigi miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji .

Oleetibige me ǥadewiki me daǥakapetege migetaǥa adinotigimadenitege eledi oko , codaa adinoniciwaǥatitiwaji me atamitege inoatawece ane beyagi , odaa ǥadewikitema iniokiniwateda Aneotedoǥoji . Niǥina oko ane daǥa dinatamaǥateetege ane beyagi ayakadi me nadi Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji .

Odaa jeǥeetediogi , “ Okoleniticogi ǥadeladitiwaji eledi ǥawai , ane diǥeticogi ǥobaaǥadi , odaa baǥabaatalotiwaji noǥojedi ” . Odaa joǥoyokoletace leladi . Aǥica daǥa leegi , aǥalee domoǥoyakadi niǥijo leladi moixigitinigi catinedi liwatece , leeǥodi owidi noǥojedi anodibatalo .
Igaataǥa aibeyacaǥadi ǥoneleegiwa nige yakagidi lolaadi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa niǥina me daǥa yakagidi lolaadi . Pida ane daǥaxa mele meyiwaǥadi liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji .

Nige najigotedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji ǥodixakedi me jaoǥa loniciwaǥa eledi oko modiotece Cristo , dice jaoǥo loniciwaǥa . Nige najigotedoǥowa ǥonimaweneǥegi me jedianaǥatece oko anigidi ane yopotibige , dice jedianaǥa , mele ǥodaaleǥena . Nige najigotedoǥowa ǥodixakedi me jiiǥenatakanaǥa , dice jibakenaǥa minitawece ǥodoniciwaǥa me jiiǥenatakanaǥa . Nige najigotedoǥowa ǥodixakedi me jiwikodenaǥa eledi oko , dice ǥodinitibece me jiwikodenaǥa .

Odaa Paulo ja nigetiniwace , meetiogi , “ Aneotedoǥoji naǥa nikatedaǥalocotiwaji Liwigo me diǥeladetiwaǥaji ica naǥa anakatoni Ǥoniotagodi ? ” Odaa joǥoigidi , modita , “ Niǥida moko aǥica daǥa jajipaaǥata moyalaǥata ica Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji . ”
