Nigica ane deǥeyiwaǥadi naǥadi ǥodidie , odaa awini anigini niǥica oko , odaa otonitice , amanagawini niboliǥa .

Inioxoadipi , jemaa mejitaǥawatiwaji niǥina ǥodolaadi maleeǥejonaǥateloco niǥina iiǥo , ane ǥobole , ǥodawodi ayakadi daǥa dakatiwece ditibigimedi aneite Aneotedoǥoji me diiǥenataka . Igaataǥa niǥina ane yeleo inaaǥina niǥina ane daa , ayakadi daǥa dakatio miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji , oditaǥa idioka limedi me yewiǥa .

Jiniǥinoka adineloati mabaa makati ǥaweenigi anepaǥa ma . Pida adinoniciwaǥatitiwaji makati ǥaweenigi anepaǥa daǥa dinelio , aneo ǥadewiǥa miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo . Ee , Ǥoneleegiwa ane jicoǥotibigimece ditibigimedi , jeǥemaǥa jajigotaǥawatiwaji niǥida niweenigi , igaataǥa Eiodi , Aneotedoǥoji , ja ikee me najigotediwa inaǥatetigi . ”
Niǥina mipokitalotiwaji Aneotedoǥoji , odaa aǥabaatege ane ǥadipoketegi , leeǥodi beyagi ǥadowooko mipoki . Igaataǥa inokemaanitibige Aneotedoǥoji me yajigotedaǥawa ganigidi ǥadolaadi ane yemaa meo .
Idioka limedi maniotagodeetalo Aneotedoǥoji ane Ǥodiodi leeǥodi inoatawece ane yoetedoǥodomi . Niǥina maniotagodeetalo , abakeni naǥatetigi Liboonaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo .
Lotaǥanaǥaxi Aneotedoǥoji yalaǥata ǥonelokodi Abraão , niǥijo mee , “ Abraão nakato Aneotedoǥoji , joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me dibatetege Abraão micataǥa oko ane iǥenaǥa . ”
Naǥani nigotaǥa ayopotibige aligeǥe oteǥexaaǥaǥa epenai me naloteloco , leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji aneliodi me datale , nalotedeloco , codaa natalaǥa ane icoǥotigi minitaǥa Waxacoco yatalaǥadi nigotaǥa .

Odaa akaamitiwaji ane diǥiwaǥati niǥinoa anepaa yemaa ǥadaaleǥenali , pida naǥa iwaǥati Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo , jiǥikeeni mewi me diǥeladetiwaǥaji Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo . Nige diǥicata Cristo Liwigo minitaǥa niǥini oko , niǥini oko anebi Cristo .
Odaa niǥijoa judeutedi , nigodopitalo Aneotedoǥoji monakatotace , odaa ja yawanaǥaditacetege loiigi , igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji yakadi meote modopitacalo .
Aǥica daǥa niwitakaǥa , odaa aǥica lapioyaǥajegi me idei lodoe nibaanco ǥoneǥe , Aneotedoǥoji .

Odaa natigide jatematitaǥawa mewi me jiotece niǥinoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco Naigi ane iǥenaǥa , niǥijoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anodita niǥijoa judeutedi me deǥewiteda . Odaa jiǥidaa me joǥetetalo Aneotedoǥoji , Noenoǥodi jotigide ǥodaamipi . Ejiwaǥadi inoatawece ane diniditelogo lotaǥanaǥaxi Aneotedoǥoji anoditece ǥonajoinaǥaneǥeco , codaa ejiwaǥadi ijoatawece niǥijoa anoiditedini niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece lowooko Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo jotigide .

Jiniǥikani diǥidioka limedi midiwa ǥanaalewe . Pida leeditibige midioka limedi memaani eledi oko . Igaataǥa niǥina ane yemaa eledi oko , jeǥeote icoatawece niǥicoa liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji anetiǥodiiǥeta me jaoǥa .

Odaa niǥica nelegi lapicaǥaǥa ja nalegitiniwace niǥina oko , odaa ja beyagi modotaǥatibigimece Aneotedoǥoji anida nimaweneǥegitetece niǥinoa nawikodico . Pida idokee doǥodinilaatece libeyaceǥeco , codaa aǥodoǥetetalo Aneotedoǥoji aneliodi loniciwaǥa .

Idi niwilanigi ane niotaa naǥani nigotaǥa , leegitibigimece codaa me nelegi . Idoa dooze lapoaco , idiaa dooze aanjotedi oyowie niǥidoa epoaco . Odaa niǥidoa epoaco diniditeloco liboonaǥatedi niǥijoa dooze lionigipi Israel .

Oko nilaagetedipi leeǥodi me daǥa jakataǥa me jotetenaǥa ijoatawece lajoinaǥaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji ane iditedini Moisés . Pida Cristo ja noǥa moko nilaagetedipi niǥijo me dawikode me domeǥetiǥodiloikatidi , niǥijo noǥoyototedeloco nicenaǥanaǥate , odaa ja yeleotedoǥodomi . Igaataǥa mee Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi , “ Niǥica oko anoyototi midataǥa iwoǥo , Aneotedoǥoji laagedi . ”

Niǥida makaamitiwaji jaǥajipaatibece ane yoenataka niǥijo malee jioteci lakatigi judeutedi . Eliodi me jiatetibeci Aneotedoǥoji loiigi , codaa aǥica daǥa jiwikode . Inoatawece jaote me domaǥa jaaǥadi niǥidi noiigi .
Odaa ja dibata niǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide , niǥijo lakeedi oxiiǥodi , niǥijo Ǥowidi iniaaǥini diaabo , Satanás . Odaa niǥijo aanjo ja niwilo icoatigilo onaniteci miili nicaaǥape .

Icoa nokododi onini ica ǥoneleegiwa ane liboonaǥadi Simão one akaaǥini me oxikoneǥegi , odaa iditawece niǥica niǥeladimigipitigi naǥani nigotaǥa Samaria oyopo . Simão dinabaketibece , mee ica me ǥoneǥegi .

Niǥina natigide jemaa miniokiniwateda me jowooǥodi Cristo , codaa jemaa me najigotediwa niǥijo nimaweneǥegi aneo me yewiǥatace , amaleeǥaǥa jakadi me jibotege yawikodico digo anee me abotetege lawikodico . Niǥinoa yawikodico inoa leeǥodi mida anejitege Cristo . Eledi jemaa me najigotediwa nimaweneǥegi amaleeǥaǥa jakadi me daǥa idoitege némaǥa nige limedi me ideleo , digo mijoataǥa me daǥa doitetege lemeǥegi .

Jinaǥa ǥadajolitaki me ipekeniteloco ǥabaaǥatedi lacilo okanicodaaǥica oko ane diniomaǥaditema libakedi Ǥoniotagodi . Adaǥawanitege libatiigi eledi oko . Pida akamaǥakaami oteteni ǥadaaleǥena me yapidi .

Iiǥaxini niǥina iwaalepodi laxokodipi me leeditibige anee me newiǥa me ikee minioka oyewiǥatema Aneotedoǥoji . Leeditibige me daǥa beyagi modotaǥatibige eledi oko , codaa me daǥa nacipaǥa . Codaa leeditibige modiiǥaxinaǥatece anele .
Pida idaaǥee , niǥina lioneeǥa ane lodawa lokaaǥete eo anele . Pida niǥina lioneeǥa ane daǥa wado leeǥodi me yakadi me dinajacaǥadi , daǥaxa mele niǥida lowoogo .
Pida awiitiwaji ane liiǥenatakaneǥeco lotaǥanaǥaxi Aneotedoǥoji . Igaataǥa akamaǥa adininaaleni niǥina mokajipaata , pida aǥawii ane ligegi Aneotedoǥoji .
Niǥidiaaǥidi Jesus igotedeloco nipodigi Galiléia . Aǥidiaaǥite nipodigi Judéia , leeǥodi niǥijoa lacilodi judeutedi digoida Judéia odoletibige moyeloadi .

Pida Aneotedoǥoji eote me ǥadexocitege Jesus Cristo . Niǥijo Jesus loenatagi ikee Aneotedoǥoji mida lixakedi , odaa Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeote moko oko ane iǥenaǥa leeǥodi Jesus me iǥenaǥa . Codaa Aneotedoǥoji ǥodiolatedice moko loiigi , codaa eote me ǥodewiǥatace leeǥodi niǥijo me yeleotedoǥodomi Jesus .
Niǥidiaaǥidi ja yadotedinigi ninyoǥodi ica baxia . Odaa ja niwilegitedini loǥonaka niǥijo anodiotibece , eote ane libakedi niǥina niotagi . Igaanaǥa igodi me iwilegi , odaa ja yatite naǥajo toaaya .
Ee ijo me jiatetibece niǥijo anodiotece liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco Jesus . Iniwilotiniwace ǥoneleegiwadi codaa me iwaalepodi , odaa ja jokoletiwece niwiloǥonaǥaxi .
Odaa niǥijo noiigi-nelegi ja dawalacetiwage leeǥodi Jesus .

Enice eliodi me jipokotaǥawatiwaji , akaami anakaami laxokodipi ane iiǥenatakani , madowetiteloco lapo loiigi Aneotedoǥoji , ane yajigotedaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji me ǥadowienigipi , micataǥa niǥina nowienoǥodi waxacocoli anele me doweditelogo codaa mele me niodeǥe lapo niwaxacocoli . Jinaǥadowetiteloco daǥa leeǥodi me leeditibige madowetiteloco , pida leeǥodi memaani madowetiteloco , anodaaǥee Aneotedoǥoji me yemaa mawiitiwaji . Jinaǥadowetiteloco doǥoleetibige manigaanyetece dinyeelo , pida leeǥodi mewi memaani madowetiteloco catiwedi ǥadaaleǥena .
Ǥobeyaceǥegi joaniǥinaa ane yajigota némaǥa loniciwaǥa me datika nibite , codaa ǥobeyacaǥa ida loniciwaǥatoǥoloco leeǥodi liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji .
Digawinitiwaji ! Jaǥaninaalenitiniwace codaa aǥediani ǥadiimetedipi ane nibaaǥateloco ǥadixoǥotagi . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji aneliodi loniciwaǥa ja wajipatediogi me dinalomeǥe .
Enice ikani mawii inoatawece ane beyagi , jinaǥalee awitaka , codaa jinoǥokaawii makaami ele doǥoleetibige minaaleni oko , codaa jinaǥa anoceetema eledi , codaa jiniǥilikoni .

Naǥani iwaalo wadonaǥa ayakadi me doletibige eledi ǥoneleegiwa niǥina malee yewiǥa lodawa . Pida nige yeleo lodawa , odaa baanaǥa yakadi me lodawa eledi ǥoneleegiwa ane yemaa , pida leeditibige me doletibige niǥina ǥoneleegiwa anaǥaǥa nakato Ǥoniotagodi .

Niǥijoa itoataale ǥoneleegiwadi oika niǥijoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anewi , codaa me naigi Ǥoniotagodi joǥoika anepeǥewi , odaa joǥodiiǥaxinaǥatece Aneotedoǥoji naǥa ixomaǥatice me yewikatiditace oko , odaa aǥaleeǥeote me ǥodewiǥatace . Joaniǥidaa midi oko anoyaaǥadi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi .

Leeǥodi niǥina me ǥodexogotege Jesus Cristo , aibeyacaǥadi domige jakagitaǥa ǥodolaadi ane lakatigi judeutedi , oǥoa domige ajakagitaǥa . Pida ida aneneǥegi jaoǥa niǥina me idinemaanaǥatiwage leeǥodi me jinakatonaǥa Cristo .
Niǥijo Jesus naǥa ixomaǥateetedijo ijoatawece ane leeditibige me lawikodico , odaa jeǥeote me Ǥonewikatitoǥodi . Odaa ja yakadi meote midioka limedi me newiǥa inatawece oko anoyiwaǥadi .
Niǥina natigide , ejitece ǥaboonaǥatiwaji aniwakateenitigi loiigi Cristo ane idei nipodigi Judéia . Awii liciagi ane jiiǥetiogi niǥijo lapo loiigi Cristo digoida nipodigi Galácia .
Akaami iwaalepodi , iwaǥati ǥadodawadi , digo anemiitalo Ǥoniotagodi me iwaǥati .

Odaa Jesus jeǥeetacediogi , “ Niǥida mee Ee iciagi macataǥa naǥana lokokena ane naloteloco inatawece oko digoina iiǥo . Niǥina oko ane niotici ani nilokokena aneo me yewiǥa oko , aliciagi niǥina oko anigotigi nexocaǥa ” .

Yokaaǥetedipi yemaanigipi , akamaǥakaamitiwaji jaǥanalakitibige niǥijoa lotaǥa niǥijoa liiǥexedi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo , niǥijo noǥoyalaǥata niǥica anicota , niǥijo noǥoditece niǥicoa owidijedi nokododi nige dinikee ǥoneleegiwadi anetiǥadamenitiwaji . Owote ane beyagitema Aneotedoǥoji niǥina anepaa yemaa lolaadi meo .
Iniaaǥiniwa ayopotedibige niǥina oko doǥowo noenatagitema anigetiǥidi , leeǥodi Jiǥiniaaǥeote niǥina oko me newiǥa , me naalaǥa , codaa yajigotediogi niǥina oko inoatawece anoyopotibige me newiǥa .

Ejiwaǥataǥa niǥina oko moyalaǥata anonadi . Odaa leeditibige me jibaǥatege Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa aneetece Lionigi , igaataǥa daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi niǥina aneeteta Aneotedoǥoji , aliciagi niǥinoa lotaǥa oko .

Biǥida leeditibige me ǥadigomi mawii inokina anele , igaataǥa Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo yajigotedaǥawa loniciwaǥa mawii anele . Jinaǥa domoǥowoo mawii ane beyagi , anokomaǥa jilidaǥataǥatibige me jaoǥa .
Leeǥodi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi niǥijo noiigi Israel , niǥijo naǥa onawiile nibaloote nelegi nigotaǥa Jericó niǥijoatigilo seete nokododi , odaa niǥijo baloote jeǥenitini .
Aneotedoǥoji ibake Paulo meote loenataka ane joxicaǥatema aneo niǥijo noiigi moyopo .
Odaa jeǥeetediogi Jesus , “ Ewi mejitaǥawatiwaji , niǥina anidioka limedi meo ane beyagi , joaniǥiniaa liotagi nibeyacaǥa .
Yokaaǥetedi yemaanigipi . Ja jinataǥa Aneotedoǥoji anigotedoǥowa me ǥodemaa , odaa leeditibige maǥaǥa idinemaanaǥatiwage .
Jaǥakamaǥa awii me jowooǥodi naigi ane yadeegi oko midioka limedi me yewiǥa , codaa eliodi me idinitibeci leeǥodi makaami meetaǥa . ’ ”

Nigepaaǥejotaǥawa oleetibige mawii ǥadoniciwaǥa malomeǥenitelogo Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa niǥina me yatecoǥo niǥidi anoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi , eledi ele madinoniciwaǥati majacaǥati niǥina anoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi , codaa iiǥaxinaǥanitece anodaaǥee ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi .

Elioditibece minoa ane dakaketoǥodomi , pida idioka limedi me daǥa idejinaǥati . Elioditibece metiǥodalomeǥetice , codaa aǥalee jowooǥotaǥa niǥica anejinaǥa , pida aǥica daǥa jikanaǥa me jaliiǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji me ǥodaxawa .
Pida ica eledi baǥa namenaǥanaǥa , modi , “ Niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi ejime nemáǥa ! ”
Niǥidi niwilanigi oyatita aca wetiǥa ane diniwaloe moyoe , ane liboonaǥadi “ Jaspe ” , aniaa nigotaǥa moyoe oyatita oolo ane igeditice macataǥa galaapa .

Odaa niǥijoa seete aanjotedi anonadeegi niǥijoa nawikodico ja noditicoaci oicoǥotiwece liǥeladi Aneotedoǥoji . Odinixotinigilo nowoodi nigitikonaǥadi ane yapacaǥa , codaa datale , codaa ijoa nigoenaǥatedi oolo ane yakaoǥotigi natecoǥotedi .
Ipokitalo Aneotedoǥoji me ibinie niǥina ane igaalatibigaǥaji . Ipokitalo me ibinie , pida jiniǥipokitalo deǥeote ane beyagitema .
Loǥonaka liciagi aca “ bronze ” anoyalegi moyaago , odaa joǥoigixidi moyatalaǥadi . Lotaǥaneǥegi igedi micataǥa niǥina layaageǥegi niǥina ninyoǥodi ane daxoǥoke .
Ja jao metiǥadowooǥoti , codaa eǥidaa diitigi me ǥadikeenitiogi , jaotibige me dinemaatiwage digo anemiitiwa mademaani , codaa maǥaǥa idejotice miditaǥa ” .
Aneotedoǥoji ayoli Lionigi , pida yajigo me yeleotedoǥodomi . Jinataǥa Aneotedoǥoji me yajigo epaa Lionigi , odaa jowooǥotaǥa me najigotedoǥowa me ǥonoǥetedi inoatawece niǥinoa ane jopooǥatibige .

Aǥele diǥikaniticoace , daaditaǥadiaaǥica mawiite ijoa judeutedi ane liciaco libiwedi oliveira ane dinoke . Ayakadi daǥadinaǥaxakenitibecetiwaji , igaataǥa niǥida makaami ǥadiciagi micoataǥa libiwedi niale . Naǥana libiwe niale adowediteloco litodi , pida litodi yajigota liweenigi niǥinoa libiwedi .

Igaataǥa ajemaa daǥa ideloǥo daǥa jao liciagi niǥina oko ane domoǥoyemaa metiǥadiiǥenitatiwaji niǥica ane leeditibige me iwaǥati , igaataǥa niǥida makaamitiwaji jaǥatiteteloco ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi . Pida boǥoko ǥabakawepodi , jaoǥatibige maniniitibecetiwaji .

Ica ǥoneleegiwa ane liboonaǥadi Lázaro liǥeladi manitaǥa aca nigotakawaana anodita Betânia . Niwaalepodi , Maria ajaa Marta ane noiigiwepodi . Maria jaǥaniaaǥani naǥajo ane yatitalo loǥonaka Ǥoniotagodi ladokojegi , odaa niǥidiaaǥidi , ja yati lamodi me yadilonatidi . Odaa ica noko Lázaro ja deelotika .
Nigica oko ane daǥa niwoditema ǥodiiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco , odaa aǥoneleegiwa ane doǥodibatege , pida Aneotedoǥoji ane doǥodibatege , Niǥijoa ane najigotedoǥowa Liwigo ane yapidi .

Joaniǥidaa owooǥotitecetiwaji Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo nige niǥiniaaǥini iiǥe niǥina oko me dotaǥa . Niǥina oko ane yeloǥoditibece Jesus Cristo menagi niǥina iiǥo mewi me ǥoneleegiwa , joaniǥiniaaǥini ini minitaǥa Niwigo , ane niwakatee Aneotedoǥoji .

Niǥijoa niiǥaxinaǥanadi awitakaǥaǥa owo ane beyagi liciagi niǥijo niǥeladimigipitigi Sodoma ajaa Gomorra . Onadi micataǥa daǥa ligeedi niǥinoa loenataka ane beyagi . Odaa noomatewa okanicodaaǥica oko , odaa jiǥidaaǥee mowo ane beyagitema epaa lolaadi . Odaa aǥodibatege Ǥoniotagodi me iiǥe lewiǥa , codaa beyagi modotaǥatibige niaanjotedi Aneotedoǥoji .

Codaa leeditibige manojicetema niǥina ane beyagi , odaa ele meo anele . Leeditibige me yaxawa niǥina oko me daǥa dinotigimade , codaa ele midioka limedi me dinoniciwaǥadi me iletibigo me daǥa dinideleǥe .

Pida leeditibigetiwaji me idapaǥa diiticogi me iwaǥati liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco niǥinoa nibodicetedi anele ane icoǥotigi miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji , codaa matitetitiwaji me daǥa amiǥiticoace , codaa me daǥa ikanitiwaji manibeoonitege niǥicoa Aneotedoǥoji aneetedoǥowa niǥijo naǥa niwakatee niǥinoa nibodicetedi anele anajipaatalotiwaji . Emeǥee Paulo , ja jao me ee niotagi me jatematitedibece nibodicetedi anele , baanaǥa oilaagaǥaditedeloco moyatematitedibece inatawece iiǥo .
Odaa niǥijoa judeutedi joǥodibatalo wetiadi me domaǥa oyokoletelogo , pida Jesus ja dinaǥaditedi . Igotedigi liwigotigi niǥijo noiigi-nelegi ane dilapode , odaa ja noditedice Aneotedoǥoji liǥeladi .

Micataǥa niǥina oko me dinixotinigilo geladi lowoodi , akaamitiwaji adinixomitinigi gela aneni me ǥadewiki . Aneotedoǥoji eote niǥida gela aneni me ǥadewiki digo mijoataǥa . Odaa niǥina madinixomitinigi niǥida gela aneni me ǥadewiki , jiǥikeenitiwaji gela aneni me ǥadewiki leeǥodi midioka limedi mawii ane iǥenaǥa , odaa ewi me ǥadewikitema iniokiniwateda Aneotedoǥoji .

Leeditibige niǥidi noiigi ane iomaǥaditedice Aneotedoǥoji me nepilidi modiitege ane dakaketema codaa moyotete liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji , codaa moyiwaǥadi lotaǥa Jesus , amanagawini aǥica aneyamaǥatice . ”
Pida niǥidiaaǥidi Aneotedoǥoji ja yewikatiditace .
Ee nowienaǥanaǥa anele . Niǥina nowienaǥanaǥa anele yeleotema niwaxacocoli . ( Inatawece anonakato Ǥoniotagodi liciagi niǥinoa waxacocoli . )
Ajawienataka naǥajipaatibecetiwaji Aneotedoǥoji me najigotediwa ibakedi me ǥadaxawani akaamitawece ane daǥakaami judeutedi , leeǥodi meliodi meletedaǥadomi .
Niǥina oko anidioka limedi me doletibige me dinotigimadetege eledi oko , leeditibige mitoataale mawii leemidi . Nige daǥa yemaa me wajipataǥawa , odaa jinaǥaleeǥica mawii .
Odaa niǥijoa judeutedi ja dawalacetacicoace leeǥodi niǥijoa lotaǥa Jesus .
Niǥina oko ane dibatege lotaǥa ikee mewi niǥinoa Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa .

Enice , yokaaǥetedipi yemaanigipi , maleeǥanibeoonitege niǥica gela ditibigimedi icaaǥica gela iiǥo , adinoniciwaǥatitiwaji me daǥadiaaǥica ǥabatiigi , codaa oleetibigetiwaji ǥadaaleǥena me yapidi lodoe Aneotedoǥoji amaleeǥaǥa eote ǥadaaleǥenali mele .

Ǥonioxoadipi , jiditedini owidijedi yotaǥa . Jipokotaǥawatiwaji mipokitoǥoloco niǥina motaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji amaleeǥaǥa age milaagitedice nibodicetedi anoyalaǥatalo Ǥoniotagodi , codaa amaleeǥaǥa niǥina oko ele modibatege nibodicetedi , digo aneni mabaategetiwaji .

Leeǥodi jowooǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji ane yewikatiditace Ǥoniotagodi Jesus , odaa oko aaǥaǥa icota meote me ǥodewiǥatace leeǥodi me yewikatiditace Jesus . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji ǥodawanaǥaditediwage me ǥodadeegite lodoe .

Nigica ane deelotika , odaa aniditiogi lacilodi anoiiǥe loiigi Aneotedoǥoji moyatecoǥoteloco , odaa odipokoteloco me yaxawa Aneotedoǥoji . Codaa leeditibige moyatita najidi lacilo , oibake Liboonaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi modipokotalo .
Igaanaǥa iwida Moisés me cwareenta nicaaǥape , odaa ja lowoogo migo dalitiogi loiigi , israelitatedi .
Judeutedi odibata niǥini ǥoneleegiwa domoǥoyemaa moyeloadi . Odaa naǥa jajipatibece mida aneetege ǥodoiigi romaanotedi , odaa ja jadeegi iodaǥawadi me inoǥatice me idei libaaǥadi niǥidi noiigi .

Odaa ja dibatotiogi oko anitawece nigotaǥa . Codaa joǥodibata Gaio ijaa Aristarco , niǥijo itoataale elatibige Macedônia , lixigaǥawepodi Paulo me diniwiaje . Odaa iditawece odinaxawatigi moixigitijo niǥijo itoataale miditaǥa boolaǥadi-nelegi naǥani nigotaǥa .

Pida niǥida makaamitiwaji aǥemaani Niǥijoa anele , ane yewiǥatetema iniokiniwateda Aneotedoǥoji , Niǥijoa ane iǥenaǥa . Pida jiǥipokita Pilatos me ikatice niǥijo ǥonematagodi , ijaaǥijoa aǥemaani moikatedice .
Aneotedoǥoji idaaǥigotediogi digo anigotedoǥowa . Yapitaǥadi laaleǥenali niǥijo noǥonakato .
Enice maleedoǥoyeligo paon oǥoa domige owacipeteloco goopa viinyo , oninitecibeci leeditibige mecoǥotace diniwi , iwitece lowooko .

Enice , inioxoadipi yemaanigipi , oleetibige midioka limedi matitetiniwace , jinaǥa amiǥiticetiwaji ! Idioka limedi madinoniciwaǥati mawii ane libakedi Ǥoniotagodi . Igaataǥa owooǥotitiwaji minoatawece nibaketedi ane oenitema Ǥoniotagodi ida niwaló .
Enice jipokotaǥawatiwaji me anowiikita anodaaǥeji me idewiǥa , codaa oenitiwaji ane jao .

Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji aneliodi lixakedi , aika niǥina oko moyakadi moyowooǥodi anodaaǥeeteda , leeǥodi oibake epaa lixaketedi okotigi niǥina iiǥo . Pida Aneotedoǥoji yakadi mele meotace me newiǥa niǥina oko anoyiwaǥadi niǥida natematigo anoyakadi eledi oko me netoleǥegi .

Digo anodaaǥee niǥinoa niotaka moyiwaǥadi niǥinoa necalaixedi , odaa jiǥidaǥaǥa leeditibige me eni akaami iwaalepodi anakaami wadonadipi , iwaǥati ǥadodawadi . Odaa niǥina nigani iwaalo anini lodawa analeedaǥa eyiwaǥaditeda Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa , niǥini ǥoneleegiwa icota me nakato Ǥoniotagodi nige nadi anodaaǥee lewiǥa lodawa meo inokina ane iǥenaǥa , odaa naǥani iwaalo aleeditibige deǥeo ligegita niǥini lodawa .

Odaa Aneotedoǥoji ǥodiiǥe me jaxotaǥa Cristo limedi , codaa najigotedoǥowa ǥonaǥatetigi . Niǥina me ǥadotaǥaneǥenitiwaji , odaa micataǥa daǥa Aneotedoǥoji ǥadotaǥaneǥenitetiwaji . Jibakenaǥa Liboonaǥadi Cristo me jipokaǥataǥawatiwaji anakaami laxakawepodi Aneotedoǥoji , jipokaǥataǥawatiwaji mikani Aneotedoǥoji meote makaami lokaaǥetedipi .
Pida Aneotedoǥoji yewikatiditace Jesus . Noǥatedice me dawikodetetema némaǥa , leeǥodi némaǥa aǥica loniciwaǥatelogo Jesus .
Codaa jiǥinaaǥinoa niǥinoa liicotedi ane beyagi modotaǥatibige Jesus Liboonaǥadi anele . Aneotedoǥoji yajigotedaǥawatiwaji Liboonaǥadi Jesus niǥijo neǥeniditedaǥawa makaami nepilidi .

Leeditibige me diǥiniǥina acipeǥegi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa loidenigi . Pida leeditibige me niǥina ǥoneleegiwa okaaǥegi , ane diǥica meo nideleǥegi , codaa leeditibige me diǥiniǥina ane daǥaxa me yemaa dinyeelo .

Pida nigica ane wacipeta niǥida ninyoǥodi ane jedianaǥatece , aǥaleeǥica daǥa yeloadi ecibi . Igaataǥa niǥida ninyoǥodi ane jedianaǥatece liciagi niǥina lacilotibige ninyoǥodi ane diǥica me ipe , ideite catiwedi oko laaleǥena , aneo lewiǥa oko ane daǥadiaaǥica liniogo miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji ” .
Pida niǥina oko aneyiwaǥadi Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa , ikee mewi me yemaa Aneotedoǥoji manitawece laaleǥena . Codaa jiǥidaa jowooǥotaǥatece mewi me ǥodexogotege Aneotedoǥoji .

Odaa ja jinadi ijoa itoatadiǥida niwicidi anowote niǥinoa loenataka ane napioi . Niǥidiwa niwicidi liciagi nabiaotedi-nelecoli noditedicogi nioladi niǥijo lakeedi-oxiiǥodi “ Ǥowidi ” , ijaaǥijo odoejegi eijeeǥagi ane doide , ijaaǥijo awitakegi anee minaaǥina ane yeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko .

Lotaǥanaǥaxi Aneotedoǥoji nikeetoǥowa liiǥenatakaneǥegi niǥijo ane Ninionigi inoatawece , niiǥenatakaneǥegi anee , “ Leeditibige memaani eledi oko aneni makamaǥa adinemaani . ” Nigoteteni niǥida niiǥenatakaneǥegi , ele aneni .

Igaataǥa ǥodatematigo aǥokomokoko me yalaǥatoǥowa , pida aaǥaǥa yalaǥatalo Jesus Cristo , miniaaǥiniwa Ǥoniotagodi ane iiǥe inoatawece , codaa yalaǥata moko ǥaotagipitiwaji leeǥodi oko liotagipi Jesus .
Jinaǥa adininaalenitiwaji ! Igaataǥa moditibece , “ Niǥina ǥodokaaǥetedi me beyagi oibeyacaǥadi ǥodakataǥa anele . ”

Aneotedoǥoji Jiǥiniaaǥiniwa aneote ǥodaaleǥena mele . Eote Ǥoniotagodi Jesus me yewiǥatace leeǥodi me nadooǥodi lawodi , odaa jiǥidaaǥee neǥeote gela anigote me dinilakidetetege Aneotedoǥoji inaa oko . Jesus liciagi niǥina nelegi nowienoǥodi waxacocoli ( leeǥodi me doweditedeloco loiigi ) .

Joaniǥidaaǥida niǥica anida jaoǥa , aneni me ǥadewiki leeditibige me itege ǥobodicetedi anele aneetece Cristo me nikeetoǥowa niǥica anejinaǥa me ǥodewiǥa . Joaniǥidaa nigica me jakadi mejigo ǥadiwinitiwaji , oǥoa , migetaǥa jajipatibece anodaaǥenitatiwaji , odaa ja jowooǥodi makaamitawecetiwaji idokida ǥadowoogo , codaa me jowooǥodi midioka limedi matitetitiwaji me iwaǥatakani , codaa adinoniciwaǥatitiwaji moteteni liiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi ane icoǥotigi minoataǥa ǥobodicetedi anele , aneetece Cristo .
Aneotedoǥoji eote Ǥoniotagodi me yewiǥatace , odaa jeǥeote me ǥodewiǥatace leeǥodi loniciwaǥa Ǥoniotagodi .

Leeǥodi midioka limedi manakatoni Ǥoniotagodi , jemaa manalakitibige mabakeni ǥadixakedi ane yajigotedaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo naǥa jipeketaǥaloco ibaaǥatedi me ǥadiomaǥatitema Aneotedoǥoji libakedi .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Cristo maǥaǥa igo yatematitediogi nibodicetedi anele midiwataǥa liwicidi émaǥaǥa ane nigo niǥijo maleedaǥa yeleoteda Cristo . Aneotedoǥoji akaa iwi anigotediogi niǥijo oko maleedaǥa nigo , odaa ja yaaǥadi loolatedi niǥijo oko , anodaaǥee me yaaǥadi lolaadi inatawece oko leeǥodi libeyaceǥeco . Pida Cristo yatematitedibece nibodicetedi anele midiwataǥa niǥijoa émaǥaǥa eotedibige niǥijoa niwicidi moyakadi midioka limedi me newiǥa miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji , digo anodaaǥeeteda Aneotedoǥoji midioka limedi me yewiǥa .
Aneotedoǥoji dakake ǥodoojedi me dinoojetetedoǥowa , enice jinaǥadinikanitece daǥakaami liotagipi ǥoneleegiwadi !
Enice jinaǥa adinalomeǥenitiwaji , digo anee onateciǥijo niǥijo noiigi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji naǥa iiǥetediogi niǥijo aanjo ane ǥodaaǥadi me nigodi .

Niǥida moko aǥodiciagi eliodi oko anodigota latematigo Aneotedoǥoji mododigo micataǥa okanicodaaǥica enaanigi . Pida ajeloǥotaǥatibece latematigo Aneotedoǥoji daǥa joleeǥatibige me inigaanyaǥatece dinyeelo , oǥoa domigetaǥa okanicodaaǥica ganigetiǥidi . Leeǥodi me Aneotedoǥoji ǥodimonya , codaa leeǥodi me ǥodexogotege Cristo . Odaa jakataǥa me jatematikanaǥa me yapidi ǥodaaleǥena lodoe Aneotedoǥoji , niǥina me jeloǥotaǥatibece anodaaǥeeteda Cristo .

Niǥida moko baanaǥa yoniciwadi ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi leeditibige me idinatiiǥatalo niǥinoa loenataka niǥina analee deǥeliodi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa idinatiiǥatalo niǥinoa lowooko , icaaǥica nige daǥa domaǥa ǥodiwoditema lowooko . Aǥele daǥa jaoǥa inokina anokomoka aneletoǥodomi .
Pida jinakato Ǥoniotagodi me daǥa leegi , odaa emeǥeeta jakadi mejigo makaamitaǥatiwaji .

Niǥidiaaǥidi naǥa inoletibige , odaa ja jinadi cwaatolo aanjotedi dabiditiniwace onidatecibeci idiwa cwaatolo liniocidi iiǥo . Onolitedini niǥicoa cwaatolo latopaco niocodi digoina iiǥo owotibige me diǥicata niocodi ane yawe niǥina iiǥo , oteǥexaaǥaǥa akiidi-eliodi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa nialeli .

Igaataǥa niǥijo jotigide inoatawece nokododi awiitiwaji liciagi lakataǥa niǥina ane doǥoyowooǥoditeda Aneotedoǥoji . Niǥijo jotigide ǥadoomatewa okanicodaaǥica oko , codaa iwitece niǥinoa lidaǥataka ǥadolaaditiwaji ane beyagi , codaa idioka limedi me ǥademakitiwaji , codaa aǥadinajacaǥati miditaǥa nalooǥo , codaa daǥaxa macipe mawanitege niǥijo ǥadokaaǥetedipi . Awiitetetiwaji niǥijoa nibeyaceǥeco niǥijo malee oǥeetetalo niwicidi noenataka .
Diǥicatibece aneo ane beyagitema , odaa noditicogi noledi niolatedi moyaaǥadi niǥinoa lidelaǥawadi . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee me nigo niǥina ane domeǥeo ane beyagitema niǥijo itoataale .

Naǥa niniǥodi Paulo , meetiogi , “ Inioxoadipi , ajowooǥodi niǥini ǥoneleegiwa me lacilo-sacerdotitedi . Igaataǥa jowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi me ǥodajoi , ‘ Jinaǥa beyagi motaǥanitibige lacilo ǥadoiigi . ’ ”

Pida ideiticoace wetice nigotaǥa , niǥinoa abeyacaǥaǥa ane daǥa nepiliditeda Aneotedoǥoji , inoa oxikonaǥaǥa , inoa ane noomatewa ane daǥa nodawa , inoa ǥonematagododi , codaa niǥina anodoǥeteta niwicidi , codaa niǥina anoninaaletiniwace eledi oko leeǥodi lotaǥa codaa ane loenataka .

Pida ida ane jileetaǥadomitiwaji , leeǥodi idi oko ǥadiwigotigi anodioteci liiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi Balaão , ane iiǥaxitece Balaque anigota me ibatakatidi loiigi Israel niǥijo jotigide . Diiǥaxinaǥatece moyakadi moyeligo niweenigi anoiboo moiweniǥide niwicidi , codaa eledi diiǥaxinaǥatece me yakadi me dinoomatewamigipi niǥina ane daǥa dinodawamigipi .

Ǥonioxoadipi . Leeditibige midioka limedi me iniotagodeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji , leeǥodi akaamitiwaji . Ele me iniotagodeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji , leeǥodi ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi idapaǥa diiticogi me ili , codaa jeǥepaanaǥa daǥaxa madinemaanitiwagetiwaji .
Owooǥotitiwaji niǥijo maleedaǥa anakatoni Ǥoniotagodi , niǥijoa niwicidi noenataka ane daǥa notaǥanaǥa etiǥadiiǥeni , codaa me iwaǥati .
Akaami ǥoneleegiwadi leeditibige memaani ǥadodawa , digo mijoataǥa Cristo me yemaa loiigi , codaa me dinajigo me yeleotedoǥodomi .
Nigica aneo ane beyagitaǥadomi , jinaǥawii ane beyagitema . Oleetibige mawii anoyakadi eledi oko mele .
Enice adiniwikodenitibecetiwaji lodoe Aneotedoǥoji aneliodi nimaweneǥegi . Odaa niǥica noko ane nibikota , odaa ja ǥadiweniǥidenitetiwaji .

Pida idioka limedi me ikee mewi miniwa , niǥina meote aneletema inatawece oko , niǥina me niwakateetedibigoǥoji ebici , odaa jeǥeote me inopilaǥataǥatedio ǥodawodigijedi niǥina micota limedi . Yajigotedaǥawatiwaji anelici , codaa meote me aniniitibecitiwaji . ”

Codaa lodawadi niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi anoiiǥe nibakedi , leeditibige me niǥina iwaalepodi anodeemitetibige niǥina eledi oko leeǥodi anodaaǥee lewiǥa , codaa me diǥiniǥina iwaalepodi alaǥanaǥaǥa . Leeditibige me dinajacaǥaditema niǥinoa lidekeco , codaa leeditibige niǥina eledi oko midioka limedi moyakadi monakatotibigiwaji .
Jajigota nimedi me dinilaatece libeyaceǥegi , pida ayemaa me ika me loomatewepodi oko ane daǥa lodawa .

Herodes , niǥijo ninionigi-eliodi judeutedi eliodi me yelatema niǥeladimigipitigi nigotaǥa Tiro codaa me Sidom . Odaa ica lapo niǥidi noiigi jiǥigotibeci oyotaǥaneǥe Herodes . Pida odoejegi oyakadi Blasto me nicaajo . Niǥica Blasto joniǥiniaa nowienoǥodi ica diimigi-nelegi Herodes liǥeladi . Odaa jiǥigotibeci minitaǥa Herodes , igotibeci modoletibige modinilakidetege domoǥoyemaa me nokaaǥedi , leeǥodi niǥidi noiigi idioka limedi modinoojeteta anoyeligo digoida niiǥotedi Herodes .
Naǥa niniǥodi Jesus , meetediogi , “ Aǥica niwigo abeyaceǥegi meetaǥa . Pida joǥetetalo Eiodi , pida akaamitiwaji baadaǥa eemiteetibigiji , leeǥodi otaǥanitibigiji .
Odaa joǥodakapetege ica niwocotaǥa , jeǥeote ebekadi nelecoli .
Igaataǥa niǥinoa ǥodawikodico digoina iiǥo , ejidaǥa yakadi daǥa jiboǥotaǥatege niǥica Aneotedoǥoji anicota me najigotedoǥowa , anicota me nikeetedoǥowa , nige limedi me doǥetetedibigoǥoji .
Ionigipi yemaanigipi . Jidikotibigaǥaji leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji aǥalee ǥadiloikatititetiwaji leeǥodi ǥabeyaceǥeco , leeǥodi Cristo ja yeleotedoǥodomi .

Aneotedoǥoji ǥodewikatiditace , codaa eniditedoǥowa ǥodiomaǥaditedice moko nepilidi . Aǥodewikatiditace daǥa leeǥodi minoa ǥodoenataka anele , pida ǥodewikatiditace leeǥodi epaa yemaa , codaa idioka limedi meletedoǥodomi . Aneotedoǥoji aniǥica daǥa yoe niǥina iiǥo naǥa lowoogo meletedoǥodomi leeǥodi niǥijo loenatagitedoǥodomi Jesus Cristo .

Niǥijo anoiiǥe sacerdotitedi ijaaǥijoa nowienoǥododi Aneotedoǥoji liǥeladi noǥonaditege Jesus , odaa ja napaawaǥateloco , modi , “ Otonitedeloco nicenaǥanaǥate ! Otonitedini ! ” Odaa jeǥeetiogi Pilatos , “ Adeegitetiwaji , akamaǥa otonitedeloco nicenaǥanaǥate . Igaataǥa jakadi me diǥica anigetiǥida ane leeǥodi daǥa jiiǥenatakatalo moyeloadi ” .

Niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece lowooko Aneotedoǥoji niǥijo jotigide domeǥeliodi modoletibige moyowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji anodaaǥigote meote niǥina oko me newiǥatace . Oyeloǥoditedibece niǥica Aneotedoǥoji me ikeetediogi anodaaǥigote me ǥadewikatititetiwaji , micataǥa niǥina oko naǥa dinigaanyetece noǥeedi .

Igaataǥa jeǥeliodi niǥina anoninaaletiniwace oko ilaagiteloco niǥina iiǥo , niǥina anodi Jesus Cristo me deǥenagiteda digoina iiǥo me liciagi ǥoneleegiwa . Niǥina oko anee niǥinoa notaǥa ninaaletiniwace oko , codaa laxakawa Cristo .

Jowooǥotaǥa niǥini ǥoneleegiwa me niǥina ǥoneleegiwa ane doide . Inoatawece nipodaǥa anigotece , eo lacilo niǥinoa judeutedi mowo ane deǥele , ibatooǥoditiogi , codaa lacilo niǥijo lapo ane liboonaǥadi ‘ nazareenotedi ’ .

Aǥica ane yakadi deǥee niǥinoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco me deǥewiteda anoikee anodaaǥee ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi me daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi . Digawini ane niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco : Ǥoniotagodi dinikee me liciagi ǥoneleegiwa . Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo ikee me iǥenaǥa Ǥoniotagodi , codaa me niaanjotedi onadi . Ǥobodigitigi Ǥoniotagodi ilaagiteloco inatawece ane noiika , odaa niǥina oko digoina iiǥo joǥoyiwaǥadi . Codaa Aneotedoǥoji nawacetedibigimece Ǥoniotagodi digoida ditibigimedi miditaǥa latalaǥa .

Codaa ǥalatili eniteloco oko icoǥotedibigimece ditibigimedi , licawadi wetiadi nelecoli ane iwida 40 ciilo liwaaǥatiigi . Odaa niǥina oko ja beyagi modotaǥatibige Aneotedoǥoji leeǥodi niǥinoa lawikodico aneote niǥijoa ǥalatili eloodoli , leeǥodi eliodi niǥica lawikodigi .
Pida baǥa inibeoonaǥatege Aneotedoǥoji ane ligegitedoǥowa meote . Eote gela ditibigimedi , codaa me gela iiǥo aneitice niǥina oko ane nepilidi Ǥoniotagodi mowo inokina ane iǥenaǥa .
Ditibigimedi aǥaleeǥica jinataǥa , ja ma , ja liciagi naǥana notaǥanaǥaxi lamodi anoilipadi . Codaa inoatawece ane wetiadi nelecoli , codaa me niǥinoa lidelocotedi digike , oyetecetice ane limedi .
Leeǥodi Jesus Cristo meote ane yemaa Aneotedoǥoji , odaa yajigo epaa lolaadi moyeloadi , odaa onijoteci me yeleo leeǥotedi libeyaceǥeco oko , ǥodawalacetetege ica ǥobeyaceǥegi eote moko nepilidi .
Idioka limedi me iniotagodeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji leeǥodi akaamitawecetiwaji , codaa jipokaǥatalotiwaji niǥina me jotaǥaneǥenaǥa Aneotedoǥoji .

Odaa ja noditice apolicaǥanaǥa lixagoteǥegi . Odaa joǥoyajigota niǥijo apolicaǥanaǥademigi loniciwaǥa meo niǥina oko me daǥadiaa ilaǥatiwage , pida diniwitideǥetiwage , dinigodi . Codaa dibatege lodaajo-ocaǥataǥa .
Inatawece ane niotagipi , leeditibige midioka limedi modeemitetibige niotagodepodi , amanagawini aǥica ane beyagi me dotaǥatigi Aneotedoǥoji Liboonaǥadi , codaa niǥinoa ǥodiiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco .
Codaa jinaǥadininaalenitiwaji , igaataǥa jiǥikani niǥijo jotigide aneni codaa jiǥikani niǥijoa ǥadakataǥa laxokodi .

Pida ida ane jileetaǥadomitiwaji , leeǥodi mikani ǥadiwigotigi lakataǥa naǥajo iwaalo Jezabel , anee me yeloǥodi ane ikeete Aneotedoǥoji , pida aǥewi . Ane diiǥaxinaǥa codaa inaaletiogi iotaka me noomatewa eledi oko ane daǥa lodawa , codaa moyeligo niweenigi anoyajigo moiweniǥide niwicidi .

Aniǥicatibige Aneotedoǥoji daǥa dibatetege niǥina ane daǥa judeutedi , neǥee Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi me dibatetege niǥina ane daǥa judeutedi leeǥodi monakato . Igaataǥa digo ane diniditeloco naǥadi notaǥanaǥaxi , Aneotedoǥoji yatematite Abraão nibodicetedi anele niǥijo jotigide , neǥeeteta , “ Ǥadibakeni me jibinie inatawece noiigi niǥina iiǥo . ”

Pida ǥadaagititece niǥijoa lotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji anowo ǥadoniciwaǥa , niǥijo neǥeetedaǥawatiwaji makaami lionigipi . Mee , “ Ionigi , atacolitece niǥina Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji me ǥadiloikatiti . Jinaǥa adinajicitini niǥina me diojotedaǥadici .

Iwaǥati niǥinoa ǥadacilodi codaa mawii niǥica ane liiǥenatakaneǥegi . Igaataǥa idioka limedi modoweditelogo ǥadiwicidi , codaa moilakidetedini naalewe miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji , niǥica ane libakedi . Nige iwaǥati , odaa ninitibigiwaji niǥina me nibaaǥa . Pida nige daǥa iwaǥati odaa agecaǥalodipi codaa libakedi aǥadaxawanitiwaji .
Odaa Aneotedoǥoji yaaǥadi seete noiika digoida niiǥotedi Canaã , nawalacetedigi niǥidi iiǥo , odaa ja yajigoteta loiigi me nebi niǥicoa iiǥotedi . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee moixomaǥateetedijo 450 nicaaǥape .

Nigicatibece ane diiǥaxinaǥatece eledi niiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi , ane daǥa niwoditema lotaǥa Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo , anepeǥewi niǥinoa lotaǥa , codaa nige daǥa niwoditema niiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi ,
Diǥicatibece oko anigo makaamitaǥatiwaji diiǥaxinaǥatece niǥijo Cristo ane daǥa diiǥaxinaǥatetece , jinaǥabaatege catiwedi ǥadiǥeladi , codaa jinaǥa ǥadecoatitece micataǥa daǥa ǥanioxoa .

Igaataǥa jawikodeeǥa digo mijoataǥa Cristo me dawikode leeǥodi me lakapetegi ane beyagi digoina iiǥo . Odaa anigote Aneotedoǥoji me yaxawa Cristo niǥijo me dawikode , jiǥidaaǥee Aneotedoǥoji me ǥodaxawa leeǥodi Cristo , niǥina me jawikodeeǥa leeǥodi mejiwaǥatece .

Nagoodi niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi ! Aneotedoǥoji iloikatidi leeǥodi modioteci naigi nibeyacaǥa digo mijotaǥa Caim ane yeloadi epaa nioxoa , codaa mowo liciagi Balaão libatiigi me doletibige me dinigaanyetece dinyeelo . Pida Aneotedoǥoji icota me yaaǥadi leeǥodi me lakapetedipi digo mijotaǥa Coré ane domaǥa yemaa migotiogi niǥijo loiigi Aneotedoǥoji me lakapetegipi , pida Aneotedoǥoji ja yeloadi Coré .

Pida niǥidiwa niiǥaxinaǥanadi oiwo niǥica ane diǥica moyowooǥodi . Codaa owote niǥinoa lolaadi lidaǥataka , micoataǥa niǥinoa eijedi ane doǥoyowooǥodi niǥica ane beyagi , odaa niǥinoa ane beyagi anowote icota me yaaǥadi niǥidi oko .

Leeǥodi Noé nakato Aneotedoǥoji , odaa wajipatalo niǥijo naǥa yajoitetece Aneotedoǥoji niǥinoa ane doide ane ixomaǥateetedijo , niǥinoa analee daǥa yakaditeda me nadi . Doitalo Aneotedoǥoji , odaa jeǥeo naǥajo etogo-nelegi , odaa jiǥidaa leeǥodi loiigiwepodi nebi naǥa iwoko niǥijo ninyoǥodi naǥa yapoǥoditini iiǥo . Joaniǥidaa me ikee minatawece oko nilaagetedipi niǥina iiǥo , odaa Aneotedoǥoji yakadi me iǥenaǥa Noé leeǥodi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi .

Niǥidiaaǥidi naǥa igo niǥicoa iniwataale letiidi niǥijo nopegedi , niǥijoa sacerdotitedi dakatiobece inoatawece nokododi catiwedi niǥijo odoejegi le niǥijo nopegedi . Dakatiobece mowote libakedi moyaxawa noiigi modoǥetetalo Aneotedoǥoji .

Estêvão eǥidaaǥee me dotaǥa , mee , “ Niǥida makaamitiwaji eliodi me dakake ǥadaaleǥenali , codaa oteǥexaaǥaǥa emaani mowooǥoti Aneotedoǥoji , oteǥexaaǥaǥa ajipaata ane domaǥa yemaa . Ǥadiciagitiwaji niǥijo jotigide ǥadaamipi igaataǥa idioka limedi maǥaǥa odakapetege Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji .

Codaa jowooǥotaǥa liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji aǥodakapetege niǥina oko ane iǥenaǥa , pida dakapetege niǥina oko abeyaceǥegi ; niǥina oko ane daǥa yoteteteda Aneotedoǥoji liiǥenatakaneǥeco , codaa ane deǥeyiwaǥaditeda , ina ane daǥa deemitetibige Aneotedoǥoji , inoa abeyacaǥaǥa , ina oko ane napioi laaleǥena , ina ane doǥoyemaateda Aneotedoǥoji ; niǥina anonigodi epaa eliododipi , codaa anonigodi eledi oko ; ina ane loomatewa ane daǥa lodawa , inaaǥinoa ǥoneleegiwadi anopitege inaaǥina ǥoneleegiwa , codaa niǥina iwaalepodi anopitege anaaǥana iwaalo ; ina anodolice oko moiotage ; ina oko anidioka limedi me diwitaka ; ina ane niwitakaǥa owotibige moibeyacaǥadi eledi oko ; codaa niǥina aneo okanicodaaǥica loenatagi me doletibige me dakapetege niiǥaxinaǥaneǥegi anele .
Jaǥajo jiditibigaǥajitiwaji eledi iwakate me ǥadiiǥeni me daǥa awanitege eledi oko ane loomatewa ane daǥa lodawa .
Pida Aneotedoǥoji idiomaǥaditedice me ee liiǥexegi malee idejote catiwedi le eiodo . Odaa leeǥodi meliodi me idiwikode , jeǥeniditediwa me jiotece .
Ajowooǥodi niǥica aneji . Igaataǥa ajao niǥina ane jemaa me jao , pida jao inokina ane daǥa domaǥa jemaa me joe .

Pida oleetibigetiwaji ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi midioka limedi me ili leeǥodi daǥaxa meletedoǥodomi Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo ane Ǥonewikatitoǥodi . Codaa adinoniciwaǥatitiwaji mepaanaǥa owooǥoti Ǥoniotagodi . Jemaanaǥa inatawece oko moiweniǥide Ǥoniotagodi niǥinoa nokododi , nigepaa ganigicatibige . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee . ( Amém ) .

Igaataǥa niǥida moko anoko liotagipi Cristo ǥodiciagi yetoledipi , pida akaamitiwaji baǥaleetibige daǥakaami niǥina aninoa lixaketedi leeǥodi mida anenitege Cristo . Okomodi aǥamaleǥegipi , pida akamaǥakaami baǥaleetibige daǥa ǥadoniciwatitiwaji . Niǥina oko anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo odeemitetibigaǥajitiwaji , pida okomoǥoko baadoǥowo ǥoniwaló .
Aatege ǥodaxakawa , codaa adinoniciwaǥatiteloco ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi . Igaataǥa owooǥotitiwaji ǥanioxoadipi ane ilaagiteloco niǥina iiǥo nawikodeeǥa anodaaǥenitiwaji mawikodee .

Akaamitiwaji anakaami niotagipi , ele midioka limedi me iwaǥati ane ǥaniotagodi digoina iiǥo . Odaa jinaǥa iwaǥati inokina niǥina mida me ǥadiwini doǥoleetibige mocaǥanita , ane lakatigi niǥina oko anida aneetege niǥina iiǥo . Pida oleetibige me iwaǥati ǥaniotagododipi inoatawece anoiiǥetedaǥawa , mele ǥadaaleǥena , leeǥodi me eemiteetigilo Aneotedoǥoji .

Niǥijoa deez libiwedi ananati — one niǥicoa deez inionaǥa-eloodoli analee daǥa niiǥenatakanaǥa , pida icota modibatege loniciwaǥa me niiǥenatakanaǥa odinaxawatege niǥijo eijeeǥagi ane doide , aleegi , onexaa onaniteci lakata me niiǥenatakanaǥa .

Jibaǥatege Niwigo ane icoǥoticogi miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji , aicoǥoticogi minataǥa oko digoina iiǥo . Aneotedoǥoji najigotedoǥowa Liwigo eotedibige me jakataǥa me jowooǥotaǥa niǥinoa ane najigotedoǥowa codaa aneotedoǥodomi .
Natigide , akaamitiwaji anakaami liicotedi , atacolitece niǥinoa yotaǥa ! Anoeni , codaa macaagetibecetiwaji leeǥotedi ǥadawikodico anenagi niǥina Aneotedoǥoji nige ǥadiloikatititetiwaji .

Jinaǥadoiitege ǥadawikodico anenagi . Digawini ! Diaabo eote liwilogojedi niǥina akaamitiwaji , ixotiwece niwiloǥonaǥaxi , etiǥadicinitiwaji . Odaa awikodeetiwaji deez nokododi . Pida jipokotaǥawa midioka limedi madinakatonitiwaji , icaaǥica deǥetiǥadeloatitiwaji ( leeǥodi maniwitici ) , odaa jao ǥanoǥeedi me ǥadewikitace , macataǥa naǥana lale niǥina oko nalokodeǥecajo , naǥa dinigaanye .

Pida akamaǥakaami anakaami Aneotedoǥoji liotagi , oxaxini niǥinoa ane beyagi anejitedaǥawa . Adinoniciwaǥati minoka awii ane iǥenaǥa , codaa mawii Aneotedoǥoji ane yemaa , codaa adinoniciwaǥati mepaanaǥa iwaǥati Ǥoniotagodi , memaani eledi oko , codaa midioka limedi matiteti icaaǥica nige awikodee , codaa adinoniciwaǥati mawii makaami okaaǥegi .

Niǥida makaamitiwaji inokoleetibige me ǥadilakiitiniwace , codaa makamaǥa adinocaǥaneǥeni me oniteloco niǥina iiǥo . Jiǥidaa naǥakaami ajakalodipi , odaa Aneotedoǥoji ja igo me ǥadaaǥatitetiwaji , liciagi monigodi wacali ajakalodi baanaǥa icota mele monigodi moyeligo .
Liniogotibece naǥani baanco idiwa eletidi 24 baancotedi , nibaanco niǥinoa ǥoneǥaǥa . Onicoteloco 24 lacilodi odinixotinigilo lapacoǥogoli , codaa lacilodi idiwa laleli oolo .

Ajicitatiwaji lawikodico , codaa me ligecaǥaloǥo ane liwokodi inoa niliicaǥajetecidi , inoa nepilidi libinienaǥa anepaa nimawenaǥajetedi . Leeǥodi mee me dowooko , ‘ Iteyo , idicotini micataǥa deǥeyo iniona-eloodo . Aǥeyo wajekalo , codaa ejidiǥica doǥo-oota meyo agecaǥalo . ’

Akaamitiwaji , ǥoneleegiwadi , anakaami wadonadi , jinaǥalataǥani , codaa analakitibige mepaǥa daǥaxa me ǥadoniciwati caticedi ǥadodawadi . Codaa eemiteetibige , igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji eote akaamito ǥadodawadi me ǥadewikitace . Nigidaaǥeni , odaa aǥica ane ǥadibeyacaǥati niǥina motaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji .
Eledi ajikatece iwaalo daǥa diiǥaxinaǥatece Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa , daǥa iiǥaxi ǥoneleegiwadi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa yakadi me iiǥe ǥoneleegiwadi . Pida leeditibige me notokotiniwace .
Jakataǥa me jinakatonaǥa Aneotedoǥoji midioka limedi me ǥodaxawa . Jiǥijaa ane eniditedaǥawatiwaji mawanitege Lionigi , ane Jesus Cristo , Ǥoniotagodi .

Niǥida makaamitiwaji , inioxoadipi , Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeniditedaǥawa me daǥa ǥadiciagi niotagipi anodioteci lajoinaǥaneǥeco Moisés . Pida jinaǥaleetibige daǥa leeǥodi me daǥa leeditibige moteteni lajoinaǥaneǥeco Moisés mocaǥanitalo Aneotedoǥoji , oditaǥa natigide jaǥakatitiwaji mawii okanicodaaǥica ane yemaa ǥadolaadi mawii . Pida adinaxawanitiwagetiwaji leeǥodi madinemaanitiwage .

Enice , inoatawece ane ǥadotaǥa , codaa inoatawece anawiite , awii liciagi anodaaǥee niǥina oko ane yowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me iloikatidi nige doǥoyoteteteda liiǥenatakaneǥeco . Niǥinoa niiǥenatakaneǥeco onikeetoǥowa anodaa ǥonimaweneǥegi me ǥodiwoko nibeyacaǥa .
Owidi latopaco nibaketedi , pida iniaaǥiniwateda Ǥoniotagodi ane jibaaǥatema .

Niǥidi noiigi ida aneetege licoǥegi jotigide ǥodaamipi , ǥoneleegiwadi ǥoneǥaǥa , ane dinikeetediogi Aneotedoǥoji . Cristo ida aneetetege licoǥegi miditaǥa , codaa inaaǥina niǥidi noiigi . Ijaaǥijoa Cristo Ǥonoenoǥodi , iiǥe inoatawece . Inatawece oko domaǥa leeditibige midioka limedi modoǥetetalo . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee . ( Amém . )

Niǥina me jawikodeeǥa , jawikodeeǥa me ǥadaxawaneǥegitiwaji , codaa me jikeenaǥataǥawa anodaaǥee Aneotedoǥoji me yewikatiditace oko . Odaa niǥina Aneotedoǥoji me ǥodaxawa , ǥodaxawa eotedibige me jakataǥa me ǥadaxawaneǥegi madinatiitalo inoa ǥadawikodico odaa aǥadinalomeǥeni , niǥina mawikodeetiwaji digo mokotaǥa me jawikodeeǥa .

Natigide , iniaaǥiniwa Aneotedoǥoji aneote akaamitiwaji matiteteloco ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi codaa moko , codaa meote me daǥajikanaǥa me jinakatonaǥa Cristo . Codaa jiǥijaaǥijoa ane najigotedoǥowa ǥonaǥatetigi me jibaaǥatema .
Odaa niǥijo ane dotaǥa jeǥeetaca Pedro , “ Jinaǥaleetibige daaditaǥa akati melici inoatawece aneete Aneotedoǥoji mele melici ! ”

Niǥicoa inionaǥa-eloodolitigi niǥina iiǥo ane loomatewepodi , ane diǥicata ananiaditibige modipegitege , joaniǥidiaa napaawaǥateloco codaa me noenaǥateloco nigonadi ǥocilaǥadi nige yabidi naǥani nigotaǥa .
Naǥa niniǥodi Jesus , meeteta , “ Niǥina ane idemaa eyiwaǥadi niǥinoa yotaǥa , codaa Eiodi yemaa niǥina ane idemaa . Ee iniaa Eiodi janagaǥa me ǥonoiigiwa .

Odaa joaniǥidaa me jowooǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji me yemaa inatawece oko . Anoǥokomoǥoko odoejegi me jemaanaǥa Aneotedoǥoji , pida Aneotedoǥoji odoejegi me ǥodemaa , codaa niiǥe Lionigi me yeleo leeǥotedi ǥobeyaceǥeco , odaa yeleo eotedibige Aneotedoǥoji me daǥadiaa yelatetema ǥobeyaceǥeco .

Pida nige idejonaǥa manitaǥa lokokena liciagi Aneotedoǥoji me ideite manitaǥa lokokena , odaa okotawece ǥodilaǥatiwage , codaa lawodi Jesus , Lionigi Aneotedoǥoji , napitaǥadi inoatawece ǥobeyaceǥeco .
Odaa leeǥodi Cristo aneote , aǥaleeǥakaami niotagipi , pida akaami nionigipi . Odaa leeǥodi makaami lionigipi , Aneotedoǥoji yajigotedaǥawa inoatawece anele ane yajigotediogi lionaǥa .
Pida niǥina Aneotedoǥoji naǥaǥa yalaǥate Lionigi , mee , “ Inoenoǥodi , idioka limedi makaami ane diiǥenataka . Niǥina me iiǥeni niǥina oko , awii ǥanimaweneǥegi ane iǥenaǥa me iiǥenatakani .

Noǥoniniǥodi , moditalo , “ Ajoleeǥatibige me jokolenaǥataǥaloco wetiǥa daǥa leeǥodi okanicodaaǥica ǥadoenatagi anele . Pida joleeǥatibige me jokolenaǥataǥaloco leeǥodi niǥijoa ǥadotaǥa ane beyagi motaǥanitibige Aneotedoǥoji . Igaataǥa akaami ǥoneleegiwa , pida adiniciaceekenitege Aneotedoǥoji ” .

Niǥidiwa ǥocilaǥadi aneo me nawikodeeǥa idioka limedi me yoniciwadi me noditedice , odaa niǥidi oko aǥica daǥa nipenaǥa noko codaa menoale . Pida idioka limedi me nawikodeeǥa , niǥidi anodoǥeteta eijeeǥagi ane diojo codaa me liwigo niwilanigi , codaa anadi me yadeegitibeci nibikotaxete liboonaǥadi niǥijo eijeeǥagi .
Aneotedoǥoji ǥodiwikode , odaa ja najigotedoǥowa niǥida ǥobakedi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi midioka limedi me jilidaǥata me jaoǥa ane ǥobakedi .

Odaa jakataǥa me daǥa jawienatakanaǥa , codaa mabo ǥodaaleǥena , mejinaǥa , “ Iniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji Jiǥiniaa ane idaxawa , codaa aǥica ane idoita , igaataǥa niǥina oko aǥica loniciwaǥatiloco deǥeo ane beyagitomi . ”

Niǥina ane yeligo okanicodaaǥica niweenigi , leeditibige me daǥa iǥoadita niǥina aninoka yeligo ane ǥotanigijedi . Odaa niǥina ane daǥa yeligo libole , leeditibige me deǥee me libatiigi niǥina eledi me yeligo okanicodaaǥica niweenigi . Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji ja dibatetege niǥini oko .

Aneotedoǥoji najigotedoǥowa ǥodoniciwaǥa me jakataǥa me idinatiiǥatalo ǥodawikodico , codaa meote mabo ǥodaaleǥena . Odaa jipokotalo Aneotedoǥoji me ǥadaxawanitetiwaji midokida ane ǥadowoogo , codaa midioka limedi me ǥadilakiitiwagetiwaji , digo anee Jesus Cristo me nikeetedoǥowa .

Jesus aliciagi niǥijoa eletidi sacerdotitedi ane leeditibige monigodi eijedi odaa joǥoyajigotalo Aneotedoǥoji inoatawece nokododi , leeǥotedi epaa libeyaceǥeco codaa me libeyaceǥeco eledi oko . Igaataǥa Jesus epaa diniboote Aneotedoǥoji leeǥotedi libeyaceǥeco oko . Odaa onijoteci meote , odaa aǥalee leeditibige deǥeotace , igaataǥa niǥijo aneote idioka limedi me diniwaloe .
Niǥina liico nige nadi nioxoa midi ganigidi ane yopotibige , odaa yakakaǥaditema laaleǥena , aǥica meo daǥa iwikode , niǥini liico ayakadi deǥee mewi me yemaa Aneotedoǥoji catiwedi laaleǥena .
Odaa eliodi mabo ǥodaaleǥena . Odaa eliodi me jemaanaǥa me age me jikanaǥa niǥina ǥodolaadi digoina iiǥo , miniǥa digoida miniwataǥa Ǥoniotagodi , codaa me ǥodewiǥa miniwataǥa , codaa jipecaǥatege .

Inioxoadipi yemaanigipi , niǥida makaamitiwaji ǥadiciagi niǥina iomiǥigipi codaa ǥadiciagi niǥina anokenagi dalita niǥina iiǥo . Odaa jipokotaǥawatiwaji me daǥawii ane beyagi ane lemaanigi meo niǥina ǥodolaadi , igaataǥa niǥinoa ǥolidaǥataka icaaniǥigota niǥica ǥodiwigo .

Eemiteetibige inatawece oko . Codaa leeditibige memaanitiwaji inatawece ǥonioxoadipi anonakato Ǥoniotagodi . Ele meneǥegi eemiteetibigetiwaji Aneotedoǥoji codaa madoiitalo . Odaa eemiteetibige inionigi-eliodi .
Moisés diletibige niǥijo noiigi israelitatedi doǥoyowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji me ibake Moisés me noǥaticoace me nawikodeeǥa , pida aǥoyowooǥodi .

Anidakitiogi niǥijo ane niiǥaxinaǥanaǥatece ane beyagi , niǥidi oko liciagi necexodi ( ane diǥica jaoǥa ) , idioka limedi moditibece me leeditibige me idinakagitaǥa ane lakatigi judeutedi moikee me loiigi Aneotedoǥoji .

Niǥidi oko modi moyowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji , pida niǥida anee lewiǥa ikee me doǥoyowooǥoditeda Aneotedoǥoji . Aneotedoǥoji leleǥetedipi niǥidi noiigi . Aǥoyiwaǥadi Aneotedoǥoji , codaa aǥica nimaweneǥegi doǥowo gaantokaaǥini loenatagi anele .
Igaataǥa jakadi meji meliodi moyemaa moyocaǥaneǥetibigo Aneotedoǥoji , pida aǥoyowooǥodi niǥica anigetaǥa nimaweneǥegi .
Ǥodaxawatetece inoatawece ane dakaketoǥodomi , eotedibige me jakataǥa me jaxawanaǥa niǥina eledi aninoa lawikodico , digo anigotedoǥowa Aneotedoǥoji me ǥodaxawa .
Adinoniciwaǥati madinikeeni lodoe Aneotedoǥoji micataǥa niǥica nibakecajo Aneotedoǥoji ane yakadi mele , ane daǥa niboliǥatece libakedi , ane iǥenaǥa me diiǥaxinaǥatece Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa anewi .

Niǥini ǥoneleegiwa dakapetege Aneotedoǥoji , codaa minoatawece anodoǥetetalo niǥina oko , codaa lakapetegi inoatawece niǥinoa anodiletibige niǥina oko daǥa noenoǥododi . Niǥini ǥoneleegiwa eo me daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi me naǥaxateloco inoatawece ǥoneleegiwadi , codaa me niǥinoa niwicidi . Codaa icota midiaaǥi minitaǥa liǥeladi Aneotedoǥoji digoida Jerusalém , odaa iniaaǥini ikatice nibodigi , mee , “ Jeǥemeǥee Aneotedoǥoji . ”

Akaamitiwaji anakaami eniododipi , jinaǥaliidaǥati ǥadionigipi mawiitibige me neliǥideeǥa . Pida niǥina maliidaǥati ǥadionigipi , leeditibige mele madowetiteloco , iiǥaxini , codaa maladeeni anodaaǥee Ǥoniotagodi me ǥodiiǥaxi .
Pida ja ǥodixomaǥatema inoatawece ane ǥoninyaco , odaa aǥaleeǥica ane ǥodakadi , leeǥodi Cristo me ǥodemaa .

Odaa okotawece janiiǥatinigi iiǥo , odaa ja jajipata ijo ane dotaǥa , dotaǥatigi ioladi hebraico , meetiwa , ‘ Saulo ! Saulo ! Igame leeǥodi ina madiatenitibece ? Niǥida makaami ja ǥadinanacilotiti micataǥa niǥina ǥodinaǥa ane nipoditege limigo nojocaǥanaǥadi . ’

Ejitaǥawatiwaji me jowooǥodi ane ǥadoenataka , codaa ane ǥadawikodigi , codaa jowooǥodi makaami madewetedi . ( Pida digoina meetaǥa idiwa ǥaniliicaǥajeteciditiwaji ) . Codaa jowooǥodi niǥinoa ǥanotaǥatiwaji liwitakeco niǥidi anodi me judeutedi , pida aǥewi me judeutedi . Pida ida aneetege liiakanaǥaxi Satanás .
Niǥina oko anida lemaanaǥaneǥegi , aninitibece niǥina eledi oko mowo ane beyagi , pida linikaǥawepodi niǥina anowo ane iǥenaǥa .

Enice , ikani mawiite inoatawece ane beyagi anepaa yemaa ǥadolaadi meo , codaa jinaǥaleeǥawii ane beyagi anidioka limeditibece mowoo mawii . Odaa adiniwikodenitibece lodoe Aneotedoǥoji , codaa iwitece lotaǥa ane ixotediwece ǥadaaleǥenali . Niǥidiwa lotaǥa micataǥa deǥelanigijedi catiwedi ǥadaaleǥena ane ili , codaa ida loniciwaǥa mowo me ǥadewikitacetiwaji .
Ǥodiciagi niǥinoa nawodaǥanadi . Ee beǥejanaǥa , Apolo baǥa ilege , pida Aneotedoǥoji baǥa niǥiniaa eote me ili ǥotanigijedi .

Ijo eledi aanjo dioteci niǥijo odoejegi , odaa mee , “ Ja daa , ja diopati nigotaǥa nelegi , anoyatigi me Babilônia . Yajigotiogi niviinyo inatawece noiigi , codaa iedeǥetinece mowacipe . Niǥida viinyo one niǥicoa lidaǥatakaneǥeco ane beyagi , me ilidaǥadi me loomatewa okanicodaaǥica oko . ”
Akaami yokaaǥetedipi nigawii niǥina ane jiiǥetaǥawa .
Yemaanigipi ionigipi , jinaǥa domiǥica mawiita niǥinoa niwicidi noenataka , igaataǥa aniǥinaaǥinoa anewi me ǥonoenoǥododi . Odaa jiǥidaaǥee . ( Amém ) .

Igaataǥa initibece niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi oninaaletiniwace oko owotibige moyakadi modakatiwece niǥinoa diimaǥa . Odaa joǥoyakadi moiiǥe lewiǥa niǥinoda iwaalepodi ane diǥica mele lowoogo , ane daǥa leegitibige mowo ane beyagi . Igaataǥa niǥidi iwaalepodi oyemaa modioteci niǥinoa lidaǥataka lolaadi ane beyagi .

Pida leeditibige me idinemaanaǥatiwage niǥina mejinaǥatece niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anewi anoditece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi . Liciagi anee me ili inatawece ǥodolaadi , ǥodili mejiwaǥatakanaǥa leeǥodi midioka limedi me ǥodexogotege Cristo ane Ǥodacilo .
Adinoniciwaǥatitiwaji me daǥadinotigimadenitiwage , oteǥexaaǥaǥa adinideleǥeni , pida oleetibige me ǥadilakiitiwage , digo anee Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo me ǥadilakidenitiwage .
Odaa Saulo ja ige , meeta , “ Iniotagodi , amakaami ? ” Odaa niǥijo ane dotaǥa jeǥee , “ Ee Jesus , jeǥemeǥee ane iatenitibece !

Pida oǥeetetalo Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji catiwedi ǥadaaleǥenali , codaa oleetibige midioka limedi me ǥadigomi maniniǥoti okanicodaaǥica oko ane dipokotaǥawa meloǥoti ane leeǥodi manakatoni Aneotedoǥoji .
Odaa Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji meeteta Moisés , ‘ Anoǥaa ǥawelatedi ikeeni me eemiteetibigiji , leeǥodi niǥina nipodigi anipoditeloco jiǥinaa jiomaǥaditomi .

Enice oteteni catiwedi ǥadaaleǥenali niǥinoa notaǥa anoditece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi anajipaatalo niǥijo noko maleekoka anakatoniteda Ǥoniotagodi . Noǥotetenitetiwaji catiwedi ǥadaaleǥenali niǥijoa notaǥa anajipaatalo niǥijo noko , odaa idioka limedi me ǥadexocitege Lionigi , codaa me Aneotedoǥoji ane Ǥodiodi .
Ewi mejitaǥawatiwaji , niǥina aneyiwaǥadi yotaǥa , aǥalee yeleo ” .
Odaa ja jinaditace naǥajo baanco ǥoneǥe , yapacaǥa . Odaa jinadi Niǥiniwa ane nicotedeloco . Iiǥo codaa me ditibigimedi ja ialetibigiwaji me idei lodoe , odaa aǥaleeǥicoa .

Inatecibece eledi oko modi , “ Niǥina ǥoweenigi mina leeǥodi ǥowokomaǥa , codaa ǥowokomaǥa mini lajo ǥoweenigi . ” Ewi niǥidaaǥee , pida Aneotedoǥoji icota me yaaǥadi idoatawece itoa . Aneotedoǥoji ayoe ǥodolaadi daǥa lajo me ǥodoomatewa okanicodaaǥica oko , pida yoe eotedibige me jakataǥa me jibaaǥatema Ǥoniotagodi . Odaa Ǥoniotagodi najigotedoǥowa inoatawece ane yopotibige ǥodolaadi .

Joaniǥidaaǥee akaami eleditetiwaji leeditibige madiniciaceekenitege oko baanaǥa nigo , ane daǥadiaa yakadi mowo ane beyagi . Pida adiniciaceekenitege niǥina oko ane newiǥa maweniǥidenitetiwaji Aneotedoǥoji , leeǥodi me ǥadexocitege Ǥoniotagodi Jesus Cristo .

Pida iniotagodeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji . Igaataǥa idioka limedi meote me inigaanyaǥa , oko ane ǥodexogotege Cristo . Aneotedoǥoji ǥodibake meote inatawece oko mowajipata latematigo ane yalaǥatalo Cristo . Niǥida natematigo liciagi lanigi ladokojegi ane ilaagiteloco inatawece oko .
Natematigo ane natematitedoǥowa Jesus , jatematiiǥataǥawatiwaji . Niǥida natematigo yalaǥata Aneotedoǥoji me liciagi lokokena , codaa aǥica nexocaǥa miniwataǥa .
Inatawece niǥina oko ane najigotediwa Eiodi , enagitibeci meetaǥa . Niǥina anenagitibeci meetaǥa , ajiticoiticoace .
Oleetibigetiwaji midioka limedi madinemaanitiwage , igaataǥa akaami dinioxomigipi .
Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi mida loniciwaǥa meote midioka limedi me newiǥa niǥina oko ane yadeegiteta Aneotedoǥoji , igaataǥa idioka limedi me yewiǥa me dipokotedibigeloco niǥidi oko miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji .

Pida idokee me napaawaǥateloco , modi , “ Eloati ! Otonitedeloco nicenaǥanaǥate meloati ! ” Odaa ja nigetiniwace Pilatos , meetiogi , “ Ewi memaanitiwaji me jiiǥenatakatalo moyototedeloco nicenaǥanaǥate idoa ǥaninionigi-eliodi ? ” Pida niǥijo anoiiǥe sacerdotitedi modita , “ Iniokini César me ǥoninionigi-eliodi . Aǥica eledi ǥoninionigi ” .
Odaa niǥina natigide idaaǥee . Yeyaǥaticoace onateciǥidi oko analee nepilidi Aneotedoǥoji , ane iomaǥaditedicoace leeǥodi meliodi meletetema .
Niǥinoa inionaǥa-eloodoli ja noomatewa naǥani iwaalo , codaa minoatawece ane noiika niǥina iiǥo nemáǥa mowacipeta niviinyo naǥa loomatewepodi . ”
Oleetibige meliodi memaani niǥina anonakato Ǥoniotagodi micataǥa daǥa ǥadoiigiwepodi . Oleetibige maweniǥideni eledi oko .
Igaataǥa inatawece niǥina oko ane iiǥe Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo , joaniǥidiaa lionigipi Aneotedoǥoji .

Odaa ja jinadi ijo eledi ane nodi digoida ditibigimedi , inaaǥina niǥina ane joxicaǥatema . Jinadi ijo Ǥowidi nelegi lixagoteǥegi . Idiwa seete lacilodi , idiaa deez libiwedi . Odaa niǥidiwa lacilodi inoa laleli ( anoikee me diiǥenataka ) .

Leeǥodi moko lionigipi Aneotedoǥoji , odaa ane nebi , oko aaǥaǥa ǥonebi . Niǥica Aneotedoǥoji laǥajegitetema Cristo , odaa oko ǥonedianaǥawa nige limedi me dibatetege niǥica naǥajegi . Igaataǥa nige jawikodeeǥa leeǥodi me jibaaǥatema Cristo , digo mijoataǥa me dawikode , odaa oko jawanaǥatege nigoiweniǥide .

Niǥina laxokodipi ane niiǥenatakanaǥa anele modowediteloco loiigi Ǥoniotagodi , niǥina ǥonioxoadipi leeditibige modeemitetibige codaa moyaxawatece laǥalanaǥa , eneǥegi ele moyaxawa niǥina baaneǥeliodi me nibaaǥa , moyatematitedibece ǥobodicetedi anele ane icoǥotedigi miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji , codaa moyeloǥodi niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco aneetece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi .

Pida aǥinatawece oko anoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi oyowooǥodi niwicidi noenataka me diǥica loniciwaǥa . Niǥina oko anidioka limedi moyiwaǥadi me newiǥa niwicidi noenataka . Codaa niǥina noko eǥoyeligo libole anoiboo eledi oko moiweniǥide niwigo , odiletibige niǥidi libole daǥa nebi niwigo . Odaa aǥaleeǥoyowooǥodi niǥica anele , codaa odeemitetece catiwedi laaleǥena me nibataaǥa niǥina midatecibece moyeligo niǥidi libole .
Nakagidi inoatawece libiwedi ane deǥetayeteda . Ibinie inoatawece libiwedi anepaǥa etaye , eotedibige mepaanaǥa dáwe .

Niǥina madowetiteloco niǥidi loiigi Aneotedoǥoji ane yajigotedaǥawa madowetiteloco , odaa jinaǥawii liciagi niǥina oko anoyemaa me yeloǥotibigiwaji niǥina me niiǥenatakanaǥa , pida awiitiwaji ǥadewiǥa me niwinigijegi amaleeǥaǥa oyakadi loiigi Aneotedoǥoji modioteci , micoataǥa niǥinoa waxacocoli modioteci niǥina nowienoǥodi .

Ǥonioxoadipi . Jemaanaǥa mowooǥoti anewi anodaaǥee niǥijo anoyiwaǥadi Ǥoniotagodi baanaǥa nigo , amaleeǥaǥa aǥakaamitiwaji agecaǥalodipi anee niǥina oko ane doǥonibeotege me newiǥatace . ( Igaataǥa niǥida moko anejiwaǥataǥa Ǥoniotagodi niǥina naǥa ǥodeleo liciagi niǥina me jiotaǥa . )

Leeǥodi monakato Aneotedoǥoji , loiigi Israel odigotinigi liwigotinigi akiidi-eliodi anodita me “ Lixagoteǥegi ” . Ica ninyoǥodi ja digoxaticoace , odaa joǥodigotinigi iiǥo ane yadilo . Pida niǥijoa niodaǥawadi Egito niǥijo naǥa domaǥa diǥetita , odaa ninyoǥodi ja yapoǥoditiniwace , odaa joǥoceǥaǥa .
Odaa niǥicoa nokododi jaǥaǥenitini Moisés . One nigaanigawaanigi libinienigi . Odaa joǥoiliidaǥadi catiwedi epaa liǥeladi neǥepaaǥicota meote iniwatadiǥini nepenaitedi .

Oyakadi moiwikode niǥijo oko niǥina mowote libatico ane doǥoyowooǥoditeda me beyagi , codaa niǥijo oko anoninaaletiniwace , odaa jeǥeyamaǥaticoace , igaataǥa iniaaǥini idatecibece me naǥamalaǥa , codaa me dibatá .

Liciagi niǥina enoale naǥa ixomaǥatice , odaa ja yeloǥotibige , Codaa leeditibige me jikanaǥa niǥinoa ane beyagi aneo niǥina oko anida aneetege nexocaǥa . Leeditibige me ǥodigotema me jaoǥate nibaketedi anele manitaǥa lokokena .

Akaamitiwaji anakaami otagodepodi , oenitibigo ǥaotagipi idokidata anemiitiogi , codaa jinaǥa adoienitibigo . Pida analakitibige miniwa Ǥaniotagodi makaamitaǥatiwaji , aniniaaǥiniwa Niotagodi niǥinoa ǥaotaka , ane ideite ditibigimedi . Ǥoniotagodi aǥica lilicotagi , inatawece oko idokida anigotediogi .
Oleetibige me ǥadinikaǥawa ane ninitibece . Codaa anoeni nigini ane anoe .

Pida dakake ǥadaaleǥena , odaa aǥemaani daǥa iigi aneni me ǥadewiki . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji meneǥegi yelatedaǥadomi nigicota niǥica noko nige ikee lélaǥa leeǥodi nibeyaceǥeco , codaa eote ane iǥenaǥa nige ǥadiloikatiti leeǥodi ǥabeyaceǥeco .

Pida jiǥijo onateciǥijoa judeutedi anicotiobece oicoǥoticogi nigotadi Antioquia aniaa Icônio . Odaa joǥoyakapaǥateetacege niǥijo noiigi Paulo ijaa Barnabé . Odaa joǥonigidatice Paulo , oyatita wetiadi , niǥidiaaǥidi joǥoixigitice neǥepaa we nigotaǥa , leeǥodi odiletibige daantaǥa yeleo .

Niǥidiaaǥidi naǥa nigotedi niǥijoa Jesus lotaǥa , odaa ja doǥowikomata , odaa yenikamaǥa meetediogi , “ Atacolitecetiwaji anejitaǥawa . Ini niǥina akaamitiwaji ane idajigo modibatiwa ineloǥododipi ” .

Pida lotaǥanaǥaxi Aneotedoǥoji ikee niǥinoa nibeyaceǥeco mida loniciwaǥateloco inatawece oko , micataǥa daǥa liwilogojedipi . Pida joaniǥidaa Aneotedoǥoji me yakadi me yajigotediogi inatawece oko anoyiwaǥadi niǥijo ane ligegi yajigotediogi leeǥodi monakato Jesus Cristo .

Igaanige oigodi niǥijoa itoataale liotaka Aneotedoǥoji moyeloǥoditedibece lowooko Aneotedoǥoji , odaa niǥijo eijeeǥagi nelegi ane doide ja noditibige icoǥotinece niǥijo elagigi ane diǥica liniogo . Odaa ja ideleǥe niǥijoa itoataale liotaka Aneotedoǥoji , odaa aǥodibotege , ja nigodi .
Igaataǥa oko lokaaǥetedipi Cristo nige idokee me jinakatonaǥa nigepaa ǥodiniogo , digo mijotaǥa me jinakatonaǥa maleekoka joleeǥatibige me jinakatonaǥa .
Pida Cristo nige itediwaǥajitiwaji , odaa icaaǥica nige ǥadelewi leeǥodi nibeyacaǥa , odaa Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo yajigotaǥawatiwaji gela ǥadewiǥa leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeote me ǥodeǥenaǥa .

Liwigotigi niǥijo anoyeloǥoditedibece Aneotedoǥoji lowooko aǥica ini ane daǥa oiatetibeci ǥadaamipi . Onigodi niǥijoa Aneotedoǥoji ane imonya migotibeci oyeloǥodi lotaǥa , niǥijo anoyatematitibece Aneotedoǥoji me niiǥe Liotagi anepaǥa iǥenaǥa . Pida jaǥajicitetiwaji mijotaǥa neloǥododipi , odaa jiǥidaaǥee neǥeloatitetiwaji .

Dinocetiwage , codaa ǥonematagododi . Acipaǥaǥa , codaa daǥaxa me lemaanigi nalokegi . Owote eletidi loenataka ane beyagi liciaco niǥinoa baanoǥowote . Jiǥijo mejitaǥawatiwaji , pida ejitacaǥawa Aneotedoǥoji me daǥa iiǥeteda laaleǥenali niǥina oko anidioka limedi mowo ane beyagi , codaa aǥoyakadi me idei miniwataǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Niǥina maleeǥani lokokena , iwaǥati lokokena ane Ee , amanagawini akatitiwaji makaami lionigipi Aneotedoǥoji ” .

Aneotedoǥoji iolatedice meote niǥida libakedi me ǥonisacerdoti ǥoneǥegi , odaa idioka limedi meote inoatawece Aneotedoǥoji ane iiǥete meote , digo mijotaǥa Moisés midioka limedi meo ijoatawece niǥijoa Aneotedoǥoji ane iiǥete meote me libaketedi liwigotigi Aneotedoǥoji loiigi .
Leeǥodi Aneotedoǥoji midioka limedi meote ane daǥaxa meletoǥodomi , niwakatee Liwigo me ǥodajacaǥadi . Niwakatee Liwigo leeǥodi niǥijo aneotedoǥodomi Jesus Cristo ane Ǥonewikatitoǥodi .

Onini ica ǥoneleegiwa ane liboonaǥadi José . Niǥijoa liiǥexedi Ǥoniotagodi owote me liboonaǥadi Barnabé amina anejinaǥata “ Niǥijo aneo mabo ǥodaaleǥena . ” Niǥijo ǥoneleegiwa one leviita icoǥoticogi ica lidelogo ane liboonaǥadi Chipre .
Enice jinaǥa inigaaxaǥa me jaoǥa anele . Igaataǥa nigicota limedi , odaa ja inopilaǥataǥatio anele leeǥodi niǥijo anejanaǥatini .

Odaa leeǥodi niǥidiwa niiǥenatakaneǥeco monikeetiwa me ee abeyaceǥegi , odaa micataǥa deǥetideloadi niǥidiwa niiǥenatakaneǥeco . Odaa aǥalee joletibige daǥa yakadi Aneotedoǥoji me ideǥenaǥa leeǥodi me jotete niiǥenatakaneǥeco , codaa aǥaleeǥetidiiǥe niǥidiwa niiǥenatakaneǥeco . Odaa joaniǥidaa me jakadi me idewiǥatema miniokiniwateda Aneotedoǥoji , codaa miniokiniwateda me idiiǥe .

Odaa joǥonajigotiwa ijo iwooǥo micataǥa niǥina meetilo . Odaa niǥijo aanjo naǥa dabiditi odaa jeǥeetiwa , “ Adabititi , abikotani ane lica Aneotedoǥoji liǥeladi , codaa me naǥadi nameeja oolo , codaa anilaǥati niǥidi anodoǥetetalo Aneotedoǥoji catiwedi liǥeladi .

Niǥidi jiǥidiaaǥidi niǥica oko ane dinoweditibigiwaji me yapiditibigiwaji , aniǥica daǥa noomatewa iwaalo . Codaa odioteci naigi anigotece niǥijoa Waxacoco . Jiǥidiaaǥidi odoejedi ane iolatedicoace Aneotedoǥoji me nepilidi , codaa me niǥiniwa Waxacoco maǥaǥa nepilidi .
Niǥijoa ǥonipititedi liciaco micoataǥa niǥinoa apolicaǥanadi baanaǥa igotelogo me witidi . Minitaǥa lacilo ani lale liciagi naǥana nale oolo . Inoa latopidi baǥa latopiwa oko latobi .

Ele me ǥadewiki micataǥa niǥina oko Cristo ane noǥatedicogi miditaǥa niǥidi nibeyaceǥegi ane igoetiniwace . Pida jinoǥopilitaceloco mawii niǥina ane dakapetege liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji leeǥodi aǥalee leeditibige moteteni liiǥenatakaneǥeco makati gela ǥadewiǥa . Pida idoka ǥadewikitema makaami liotagipi Aneotedoǥoji .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi meliodi me jibaaǥa , codaa me jawikodeeǥa leeǥodi niǥina oko anodotaǥatibigoǥoji , leeǥodi me jinakatonaǥa Aneotedoǥoji ewikegi . Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji yemaa me niǥiniaaǥiniwa Newikatitoǥodi inatawece niǥina oko , codaa ewi me yewikatidi niǥina anoyiwaǥadi .

Enice amiida ica anakatitiwaji ? Igamigote Aneotedoǥoji ina oko anododigotalo Lionigi Aneotedoǥoji micataǥa daǥa naagogo , codaa igamigigote Aneotedoǥoji niǥina oko ane daǥa deemitetigi lawodi Cristo , Aneotedoǥoji ane dibatetege , meote gela nimaweneǥegi me dinilakidetedoǥogi ? Niǥidiwa lawodi eo niǥina oko me yapidi , pida niǥina oko ane daǥa deemitetigi lawodi Cristo idigotalo micataǥa daǥa liciaco eijedi lawodi . Codaa niǥina oko beyagi me dotaǥatibige Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo anidioka limedi meliodi meletedoǥodomi . Aneotedoǥoji eliodi me iloikatidi niǥina oko liciagi .
Odaa jeǥeetacediogi Jesus , “ Jemaa mele ǥadaaleǥenalitiwaji ! Natigide ane igotediwa Eiodi me idimonya , jiǥidaaǥejigotaǥawatiwaji me ǥadimonyaa mawii ane jemaa . ”

Niǥijoa ǥoneleegiwadi idioka limedi me dinalomeǥetiwage , codaa odinotigimadetege niǥina eledi oko . Idioka limedi mowote niǥinoa lidaǥataka ane beyagi , codaa idioka limedi me diniweniǥide . Ele modotaǥatibige niǥina eledi oko inokina niǥina modoletibige anigida nigaanye .

Odaa niǥinoa inionaǥa-eloodoli digoina iiǥo , inoa lacilodi iodaǥawadi , inoa liicotedi , inoa anida nimaweneǥegi loniciweǥenaǥa , inoa niotaka , inoa ane daǥa niotaka , iditawece domaǥa dinaǥaditiniwace catiwedi niǥinoa lawimaǥajetedi-wetiadi liwigotigi wetiǥa eloodo minoataǥa niǥinoa wetiadi nelecoli .

Pida niǥina ane daǥaca laaleǥena me niotici , codaa niǥina ane diǥica me idinakato , codaa anowo ane napioi ane ǥodoǥolota , codaa ǥonematagododi , codaa niǥina ane loomatewa okanicodaaǥica oko , inoa oxikonaǥaǥa , inoa anodaaǥata niwicidi , inoa awitakaǥa , iditawece niǥidi idei niǥica ane leeditibige me iticoace midataǥa noledi libegi aninoa ǥocilaǥadi ane lanicaǥawa aligopenaǥaneǥe loǥocilaǥadi lanigi . Niǥica anei owidijegi némaǥa ane diǥica liniogo . ”
Odaa natigide , jinaǥaleeǥadinopaǥati . Onitibige , odaa adinilegeni ! Codaa ipokitalo Ǥoniotagodi me ǥadaxawani me ǥadiwilecitetema ǥabeyaceǥeco . ’
Inoa laamotiidi ocaǥatedi liciagi iwaalo lamodi , lowe liciaco nigediogo lowe .

Leeditibige niǥina liotagi Ǥoniotagodi me daǥa didele . Pida leeditibige mokaaǥegitema inatawece oko , codaa me yowooǥodi anigota me diiǥaxinaǥatece Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥa , codaa leeditibige me dinatitiogi niǥina oko anodoletibige modinotigimadetege .

Igaataǥa idaaǥida me leegitibigaǥajitiwaji , jeemitetece meite ee makaamitaǥatiwaji , eliodi me idinitibeci me jibodicetibigaǥaji me ǥadilakiitiwagetiwaji , idokidata aneni , codaa me atitetiniwace , idioka limedi manakatoni Cristo .

Igaataǥa Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji idioka limedi me niwite niǥina ane iǥenaǥatibigiwaji me doweditedeloco . Codaa idioka limedi me wajipatediogi niǥina moyotaǥaneǥe . Pida Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji biǥidioka limedi me lakapetedipi niǥina anowo ane beyagi . ”

Ǥonioxoadipi . Idioka limedi me leeditibige me iniotagodeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji leeǥodi akaamitiwaji , lemaanigipi Ǥoniotagodi . Igaataǥa aniǥicatibige daǥa yoe niǥina iiǥo , naǥa ǥadiomaǥatitedicoace Aneotedoǥoji meote me ǥadewikitace . Liwigo ibake loniciwaǥa me ǥadiomaǥatiticetiwaji miniokiniwateda me ǥadewikitema Aneotedoǥoji . Odaa leeǥodi me iwaǥatitiwaji niǥinoa notaǥa anewi , codaa me ǥadewikitema , odaa Aneotedoǥoji eote me ǥadewikitacetiwaji .

Niǥina oko ane beyagi , dioki epaaǥeo ane beyagi , niǥina aneo ane napioi , dioki epaaǥeo ane napioi . Niǥina oko anele , dioki epaaǥeo anele , codaa niǥina Aneotedoǥoji ane iomaǥaditedice mepoka nebiteda , dioki epaa diniomaǥaditice . ”

Odaa Pedro jeǥeetiogi , “ Akaamitawecetiwaji leeditibige madinilaanitece ǥabeyaceǥeco , codaa me leeditibige moibake Liboonaǥadi Jesus Cristo metiǥadinilegeni amaleeǥaǥa ixomaǥateetedice Aneotedoǥoji niǥinoa ǥabeyaceǥeco . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji ja yajigotedaǥawatiwaji Liwigo , anakaaǥida me ligegi me yajigotedaǥawa .
Adinowetitiwaji adiǥica ane doojete niǥina mowo ane beyagitema . Pida beǥele midioka limedi moleetibige inokina aneletema inatawece oko .
Ǥoneleegiwadi idaaǥee , aǥalee loomatewa iwaalo , odaa jeǥepaaǥopitiwage , owo ane ǥoboliǥa . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi me iloikatidi Aneotedoǥoji loolatedi niǥina oko leeǥodi epaaǥowotibige .
Odaa akaami eleditiwaji aniniitibeci , codaa makaami inikaǥawepodi .

Enice oleetibigetiwaji madinilaanitibece , opilitalo Aneotedoǥoji amaleeǥaǥa ǥadiwilecitetema ǥabeyaceǥeco , odaa Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji ja niwakatee Liwigo me iwetaǥadi ǥadiwiciditiwaji niǥicoa nokododi nigoleetibige , codaa icota me nimonyatace Jesus , Niǥijoa Aneotedoǥoji ane iomaǥaditedice meote me ǥodewiǥatacetiwaji .
Lapoaco naǥani nigotaǥa idioka limedi me domoke idatawece noko . Adinoxoco leeǥodi aǥaleeǥica enoale .
Pida niǥina ane yeligo yolaadi , codaa me wacipetalo yawodi , biǥidiokaanaǥa limedi me yewiǥa . Codaa jewikatidi nigicota owidijegi noko .

Naǥa niniǥodi Jesus , meeteta , “ Ida ǥanaǥatetigi leeǥodi Niǥijoa ane ideite ditibigimedi me yajigotedaǥawa ǥanimaweneǥegi . Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi niǥina ane idajigotaǥawa nelegi libatiigi caticedi ǥabatiigi . ”

Jiǥidaaǥee mejiwaǥatakanaǥa . Diǥidokida mejinaǥa me jinakatonaǥa Aneotedoǥoji , pida anejinaǥa me ǥodewiǥa aikee mewi me jinakatonaǥa , odaa ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi aǥica niwaló , pida liciagi niǥina émeǥegi .

Ajakataǥa daǥa jaaǥataǥa niǥina nibeyacaǥa ane idei catiwedi ǥodaaleǥena daǥa leeǥodi me jotetenaǥa liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji . Pida Aneotedoǥoji niiǥe epaa Lionigi aneote me ǥoneleegiwa digo mokotaǥa , pida baadiǥicata libeyaceǥegi . Niwakatee Lionigi me yaaǥadi ǥobeyacaǥa , eote lawikodigi Lionigi leeǥodi ǥobeyacaǥa .
Pida nige awikodee niǥina mawii ina ane iǥenaǥa , Aneotedoǥoji eote me aniniitibece . Odaa jinaǥadoiita niǥina anowo mawikodee , oteǥexaaǥaǥa adinigecaǥaloǥotiti .
Akaamitiwaji anakaami eniododipi , jinaǥawii ǥadionigipi me neliǥideeǥa leeǥodi anemiitiogi moxoki , adaǥawiitibige midioka limedi magecaǥalodipi .

Odaa ja dinigetaǥatee me dapaawe , mee , “ Ja daa , ja diopati ǥoneǥe Babilônia . Natigide onanaǥa liǥeladi niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa , inaaǥinoa niwicidi anowote loenataka ane napioi , codaa inoatawece ane latopaco ilaaǥaxodi ane beyagi , ane ǥodoǥolotalo .

Niǥina oko anee Jesus me daǥa Lionigiteda Aneotedoǥoji , codaa anee maleediǥiniaaǥiniwateda Niǥicoa ane niiǥe Aneotedoǥoji meote ǥodewiǥa , niǥini oko eliodi me diwitaka , codaa lakapetegi Cristo . Ligegitibece ica Aneotedoǥoji me daǥa Ǥodioditeda , codaa Jesus me daǥa Lionigiteda Aneotedoǥoji .

Joaniǥidaa leeǥodi oko ane yeligo nipaon Ǥoniotagodi oǥoa domige wacipeteloco nigoopa Ǥoniotagodi , pida lewiǥa nige daǥa ikee me deemitetibige Ǥoniotagodi , niǥini oko eo ane beyagitema lolaadi codaa me lawodi Ǥoniotagodi .
Nagoodi ida yetole ! Jikeetaǥawa niǥina oko midokida me ligegi me nakato Aneotedoǥoji , pida aǥeo ane liiǥenatakaneǥegi , odaa niǥica eliwaǥatakaneǥegi niǥini oko aǥica niwaló .

Odaa Judas jiǥigo niǥijo aneite Jesus , yadeegi ijoa iodaǥawadi romaanotedi ijaaǥijoa onateciǥijoa nowienoǥododi liǥeladi Aneotedoǥoji , liiǥexedi fariseutedi ijaaǥijoa lacilodi sacerdotitedi . Oyadeegi noledaǥaxiidi inaa laloǥonaǥatedi , codaa me likanaǥanaǥatedi .

Igaataǥa Ǥoniotagodi idioka limedi meote niǥina mida ligegi . Odaa yajigotedaǥawa ǥadoniciwaǥatiwaji me diǥikani me iwitece , codaa ǥadotetenitetema inoatawece ane beyagi niǥina me dineetaǥawa diaabo .
Igaanaǥa daǥadiaaǥoyakadi moyaǥaditini , odaa ja yakadi me leeditibige moyaladi , pida aca liona Faraó ja liodagi , odaa ja iliidaǥadi micataǥa deǥewi lionigi .

Odaa niǥijo aanjo naǥa dibata niǥijo baxiawaanigi , odaa ja yetigi noledi ane idei ditibigimedi nameeja . Odaa ja nokoletinicogi digoina iiǥo . Odaa jeǥeo me dayaagetiogi oko , codaa eliodi niximaǥaǥa , nalebepakatedi , codaa me datalale iiǥo .

Igaataǥa Babilônia yajigotiogi niviinyo inatawece noiigi , codaa iedeǥetinece mowacipeta niviinyo aneote me nalaǥatibigoǥoji niǥicoa epaa lidaǥataka ane beyagi me loomatewa okanicodaaǥica oko . Niǥinoa inionaǥa-eloodoli digoina iiǥo eledi noomatewa . Pida niǥinoa anoojetekaǥa jeǥepaanaǥa liicotedi leeǥodi niǥeladimigipitigi naǥani nigotaǥa odinoojete okanicodaaǥica leeǥodi lidaǥatakaneǥegi ane beyagi . ”
Odaa joaniǥidaa leeǥodi judeutedi noǥodibatiwa niǥijo midiaaǥejo minitaǥa Aneotedoǥoji liǥeladi , domeǥetideloadi .
Oika mowajipata niǥinoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anewi , pida owajipatalo latematiko niǥinoa laxokodi laamipi ane deǥewiteda .

Odaa idi niǥina akaamitiwaji aǥetidadiwaǥadi me idimonya Aneotedoǥoji ” . Meetediogi Jesus niǥida ligegi leeǥodi niǥijo maleekoka eniditediogi niǥijo analee odiotibece , akaa yowooǥodi ane doǥoyiwaǥaditeda , codaa akaa yowooǥodi niǥijo ane yajigo modibatalo niǥijo neloǥododi .

Naǥa niniǥodi Jesus , meeteta , “ Niǥini ane jajigota paon liwai ane itimi , joaniǥiniaa idajigo . ” Odaa Jesus ja dibate paon liwai , naǥa ititedinigi ica niweenigi liwagedi , odaa ja yajigote Judas , lionigi Simão Iscariotes .

Timóteo . Oleetibige mele moteteni niǥinoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco aneetece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi anoyajigotedaǥawa moteteni . Oxaxini niǥinoa notaǥa anowo Aneotedoǥoji me deliǥide , ane diǥica niwaló . Oxaxini niǥinoa notaǥa anodinotigimadetigi niǥina oko anodiletibige daantiǥidaaǥida ica ǥodixakedi , pida aniǥidaaǥida niǥica beǥewi me ǥodixakedi , leeǥodi dakapetege niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco aneetece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi .

Pida icoa judeutedi ja nocetibigiwaji , odaa joǥoyatecoǥotee ica lapo ǥoneleegiwadi agopeloaǥa anidiaaǥitibiga miditaǥa ane licooǥadi oko naǥani nigotaǥa . Odaa niǥini lapo jiǥigotibeci oibatooǥodi naǥani nigotaǥa . Odaa joǥonipoditice Jasão liǥeladi , odoletibige me dakatiobece , domiǥigotibeci odoletibige Paulo ijaa Silas , domoǥodoletibige moyadeegiticogi lodoe niǥijo noiigi .

Nigica manatitiwaji ǥanioxoa aneo ane beyagi ane deǥeo oko me yeleo diǥidioka limedi me leegitalo Aneotedoǥoji me yototedice , leeditibige mipokiteloco niǥini ǥanioxoa , odaa Aneotedoǥoji eote lewiǥa ane diǥica liniogo niǥini ǥanioxoa . Pida ida nibeyaceǥegi aneo oko me yeleo midioka limedi me yototedice Aneotedoǥoji . Odaa aǥejitaǥawatiwaji daǥa ipokiteloco lodoe Aneotedoǥoji niǥina aneo niǥida libeyaceǥegi .
Atacolitecetiwaji niǥida anejitaǥawa . Ane dibatege niǥina ane jiiǥe , aaǥaǥa dibatigi . Codaa ane dibatigi , aaǥaǥa dibatege Niǥijoa ane idimonyatedinigi niǥina iiǥo ” .

Enice , ja jinataǥa me jibaǥatege niǥica inioxigi ane diǥicata ane yakadi me igike , iniotagodeeǥatalo Aneotedoǥoji , codaa me joǥeeǥatalo niǥica anodaa yemaateda , codaa me jeemiteeǥatibige , codaa idoiiǥatalo niǥina me joǥeeǥatalo .

Onidiwa icoa judeutedi anidioka limedi me wiajeeǥateloco inoatawece nipodaǥa codaa moiticoiticoace niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa minataǥa niǥina oko . Niǥidiwa ǥoneleegiwadi domoǥonaketace moibake Liboonaǥadi Jesus moiiǥe me noditicoaci niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa , moditiogi , “ Ǥadiiǥeneǥegi manotitice minataǥa niǥina oko leeǥodi loniciwaǥa Jesus , Niǥijoa ane yatematitedibece Paulo ! ”
Pida Paulo ixipetice Silas me lixigaǥawa . Odaa niǥijo ǥonioxoadipi noǥodipokotalo Aneotedoǥoji me doweditedeloco , odaa Paulo ijaa Silas ja noditicoaci .
Adinowetitiwaji adaǥaniadi ǥobakedi , pida amaleeǥaǥa jibaǥatege loojedi ǥobakedi Aneotedoǥoji anicota me najigotedoǥowa .

Niǥidiwa liotaka Aneotedoǥoji ida nimaweneǥegi monoxoco ditibigimedi , owote me daǥa datiode niǥicoatigilo nokododi moyeloǥoditedibece lowooko Aneotedoǥoji . Codaa eledi ida nimaweneǥegi mowote niǥinoa ninyokotiidi me dinanatigi me ǥodawodi . Codaa ida nimaweneǥegi moniiǥe lawikodico niǥina oko digoina iiǥo , niǥina moyemaa mowote .
Niǥida makaami aǥica ane enitoǥogi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa akati mawii niǥida ǥobakeditema Aneotedoǥoji , leeǥodi ǥadaaleǥena ayapidi lodoe Aneotedoǥoji .
Inoatawece niǥinoa ane inepilidi , ǥanepilidi . Codaa inoatawece niǥinoa ane ǥanepilidi , Ee aaǥaǥa inepilidi . Leeǥodi moniotici , odaa niǥina oko joǥoilecateetibigimece Iboonaǥadi .
Inatawece oko eyamaǥaticoace , odaa aǥaleeǥica jaoǥa . Codaa aǥicoa iniwa aneote anele . Aǥicoa !

Jinaǥa domaǥa ica anawii daǥa leeǥodi memaanitiwaji akamokakaami manigaanye , oǥoa , migetaǥa idoka leeǥodi moleetibige me ǥadelokitiwaji . Pida adiniwikodenitibece lodoe niǥina eledi oko , ademiita niǥina eledi oko micataǥa daǥa daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi caticedi akaamitiwaji .

Liwigotigi niǥidiwa noledaǥaxiidi jinadi oko latopiwa niǥijoa Ǥoneleegiwa ane icoǥotibigimece ditibigimedi . Dinixotinigi nijayogo ocaǥataǥa anenotinece neǥepaa loǥonaka , idiaa nigoenaǥadi oolo yakaoǥotigi natecoǥodi .
Aǥica gaantokaaǥini ane beyagi catiwedi naǥani nigotaǥa . Leeǥodi nibaanco Aneotedoǥoji iniaa Waxacoco idei manitaǥa naǥani nigotaǥa . Odaa liotaka odoǥetetalo leeǥodi niǥinoa libaketedi anowotema .
Pida niǥica noko Aneotedoǥoji nige yaaǥadi niǥina iiǥo ja nipegi . Enice leeditibige majacaǥatitiwaji ǥadowooko codaa me niǥinoa ǥalidaǥataka , amaleeǥaǥa akati motaǥaneǥeni Aneotedoǥoji .

Jiǥidiaaǥi noǥodibata aca etogo-nelegi , odaa joǥopiticogi nigotaǥa Antioquia , aneiticoace niǥijo anonakato Ǥoniotagodi anoimonya Paulo ijaa Barnabé , codaa odipokotalo Aneotedoǥoji me doweditedeloco Paulo ijaa Barnabé , codaa me yaxawatetece mowote libaketedi Ǥoniotagodi analeeǥoigodi .

Pida nigadoni , aǥica ǥabatiigi . Codaa naǥana awicije me wado , aǥeo ane beyagi . Pida niǥina ane nadonaǥa owidi ane dakaketema digoina iiǥo . Odaa ee adomaǥa jemaa minoa niǥinoa ane dakaketaǥadomitiwaji .

Igaataǥa ajideleǥenaǥa oko anepaǥa jakataǥa me jinataǥa , aninoa libole codaa me lawodi . Pida jideleǥenaǥa lacilodi niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa , aninoa notoetico , codaa me niǥinoa lacilodi niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa anonadeegita nexocaǥa niǥina okotigi niǥina iiǥo . Jideleǥenaǥa inoatawece ane niwicidi abeyacaǥaǥa inoatawece ane nipodaǥa digoina natinedi iiǥoteloco .

Nigica oko ǥadiwigotigitiwaji ane diǥica lixakedi , odaa ele me dipokotalo Aneotedoǥoji , odaa ja yajigote lixakedi . Igaataǥa Aneotedoǥoji ja igo me yedia okanicodaaǥica oko , adaciiletetema , codaa adiojotetece .
Jinaǥa domaǥa abeyacaǥati libakedi Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo ane yemaa meo ǥadiwigotigitiwaji .

Odaa joǥodabiteǥetini niǥijo lopegedi anijoa iniwataale letiidi . Ica odoejegi le beǥeneǥegi niiǥeticogi we , one liboonaǥadi , “ Nopegedi-le anoiomaǥaditema Aneotedoǥoji ” . Niǥini lopegedi-le ada noledaǥaxi , acaaǥaca nameeja , icaaǥicoa paontedi anoibootalo Aneotedoǥoji .

Enice ǥadajoinitiwaji manoojeteeta inioolo anoiwilegi minitaǥa noledi amanagawini ewi makaamitiwaji liicotedi . Codaa anoojeteeta jayogoli lapacoǥogoli amaleeǥaǥa adinixomitiwaji , odaa aǥaleeǥokakaamitiniwacetiwaji oditaǥa aniboliki . Codaa anoojeteeta inipomaada lajo ǥagecooǥeli amaleeǥaǥa ewi matenitibece .

Jiditibigaǥaji naǥadi notaǥanaǥaxi akaamitiwaji ane iwaǥati Lionigi Aneotedoǥoji , amaleeǥaǥa owooǥotitiwaji mida ǥadewiǥa ane diǥica liniogo miniwataǥa , codaa amaleeǥaǥa idioka limedi me iwaǥati Ǥoniotagodi .
Niǥina ane diiǥaxinaǥatece epaa lowooko , niǥini doletibige me dinikeenaǥaneǥe . Pida niǥina ane doletibige meo me yeloǥo Aneotedoǥoji , niǥini beǥewi , codaa me iǥenaǥa .

Ǥodatematigo liciagi niǥicoa niliicaǥajetecidi oko me yotete catinedi boote ane daǥa libiniena . Niǥida moko ǥodiciagi naǥana boote ane daǥa dakaketigi manonya . Pida Aneotedoǥoji epaaǥigotedoǥowa me ǥodoe eotedibige me ikee miniaaǥiniwa eliodi loniciwaǥa , codaa me najigotedoǥowa ǥodoniciwaǥa me jilaagaǥataǥatedibece ǥodatematiko .

Inioxoadipi yemaanigipi . Jinoǥoleetibige daǥa oojetee . Pida ikanitece Aneotedoǥoji mepaa yelatetema , odaa eote lawikodico niǥini oko aneo ane beyagitaǥadomitiwaji . Igaataǥa maditaǥa lotaǥanaǥaxi Aneotedoǥoji mee Ǥoniotagodi Aneotedoǥoji , “ Emokee mida yoniciwaǥa me joojete . Odaa jao lawikodico niǥina oko anowo ane beyagitaǥadomitiwaji . ”
Naǥa niniǥodi Jesus , meetediogi , “ Deǥemaǥa jao me ideloǥo , aǥica jao . Pida Eiodi doǥetetediwa . Odaa akaamitiwaji meni me Ǥanoenoǥodi .

Jinaǥa domaǥa aaǥati niǥica Aneotedoǥoji aneotetema ǥanioxoa leeǥodi niweenigi anelici . Yakadi melici okanicodaaǥica niweenigi , pida jinaǥa domeǥelici niǥica niweenigi aneo eledi oko me eyamaǥatice eliwaǥatakaneǥegi .

Odaa José ijaa Nicodemus joǥodibata lolaadi Jesus , odaa joǥoilipaditigi niǥelateli , oyatitibige niǥijo ladokojegi . Owo anepaa lakatigi judeutedi moyoetini niǥina némeǥegi anoixotiwece wetiǥa-lawimaǥajegi .

Niǥida makaamitiwaji iwikodeni niǥina ane idei niwiloǥonaǥaxi leeǥodi eliwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa ele maniniitibeci niǥina modoliceta niǥina ane ǥanebi , igaataǥa owooǥotitiwaji me idi ǥanaǥajegi ane daǥaxa mele , codaa ane diǥicata daǥa daa .
Jesus eledi ida aneetetege licoǥegi Davi . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeote Jesus me Newikatitoǥodi ǥodoiigi Israel , codaa akaa ligegi meote .

Pida digo aneeta lotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji mee , “ Aǥica ini ane nadi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa wajipata , oteǥexaaǥaǥa dakatiwece lacilo niǥicoa anele Aneotedoǥoji ane laǥajegitetege niǥina oko anoyemaa Aneotedoǥoji . ”

Codaa nige itiwaǥajitiwaji Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo , niǥijo aneo Jesus me yewiǥatace , odaa Aneotedoǥoji , aneote Cristo me yewiǥatace , aaǥaǥeote me ǥadewikitace , codaa eote gela ǥadolaadi , leeǥodi Liwigo ane itiwaǥajitiwaji .
Liwigo Aneotedoǥoji eledi meetoǥowa catiwedi ǥodaaleǥena moko lionigipi Aneotedoǥoji .
Jinaǥa adininaalenitiwaji ! Aǥica ane yakadi me yame Aneotedoǥoji . Niǥina oko icota me nopilaǥaditio niǥica aneyatini .

Ja jinataǥa niǥica Aneotedoǥoji meliodi meletetema oko , codaa iǥenaǥa me iloikatidi niǥina eledi oko . Iloikatidi niǥina anoika monakato , pida eliodi meletedaǥadomitiwaji nige diǥikaniteda manakatoni . Nigikanitiwaji manakatoni , odaa aǥaleeǥeetedaǥawatiwaji makaami loiigi , ǥadiciagi niǥijoa libiwedi oliveira anonakagidi .

Akaami inioxoadipi , adinatiitalo ǥadawikodico nigepaaǥicota lanokegi Ǥoniotagodi . Digawinitiwaji ! Niǥina bajendeoodi nibeotege me ili niǥinoa elanigijedi nigepaaǥicota limedi me yopilaǥaditedio . Niǥinoa lawodigijedi eliodi niwalótema , pida adoǥowikomata migetaǥa nipadi me nibeotege limedi ebicitedi .
Jemaa Ǥoniotagodi midioka limedi me iwikode Onesíforo loiigiwepodi , leeǥodi elioditibece meo yoniciwaǥa , codaa aǥica daǥa niboliǥatici me ee niwilogojegi .
