Enice ionigipi yemaanigipi , jemaa midioka limedi madinexocaǥatitege Cristo , amaleeǥaǥa abo ǥadaaleǥena nige dinikee , me daǥa adoiitalo . Codaa me daǥa ǥodiboliǥa nigejoǥota lodoe Cristo nigeno .
Digawini ane jemaa me igegitaǥawa . Ikanitiwaji Aneotedoǥoji Liwigo me ǥadajacaǥatitema inoatawece ane oeni , amanagawini aǥawii ane yemaa ǥadolaadi mawii .

Niǥinoa notaǥa yakadi me jinakatonaǥa , codaa inatawece niǥina oko leeditibige modibatege leeǥodi ele niǥinoa notaǥa . Digawini ane diitigilo niǥinoa notaǥa , “ Jesus Cristo enagi digoina iiǥo , enagi me yewikatidi niǥinoa abeyacaǥaǥa . ” ( Joaniǥidaa meo Paulo niǥida ligegi ) . Emeǥee daǥaxa me ee abeyaceǥegi caticedi niǥinoa eletidi abeyacaǥaǥa .
Inioxoadipi , jiditedini niǥinoa owidijedi yotaǥa . Leeditibige madinoniciwaǥatiteloco ǥatiwaǥatakaneǥegi leeǥodi me ǥadexocitege Ǥoniotagodi , odaa ja yajigotedaǥawa eliodi nimaweneǥegi .
Niǥina oko ane diletibige daǥa datiteti me dabiditi , leeditibige me dinowedi adeǥenitini , adeǥeyamaǥatice eliwaǥatakaneǥegi .
Jiǥidaaǥee Jesus onijoteci me yeleotedeloco libeyaceǥeco oko , odaa jiǥidaa leeǥodi meote midioka limedi me iǥenaǥa niǥina oko anakaa iomaǥaditedicoace mepaa nepilidi .
Igaanaǥa owajipatalo niǥijoa lotaǥa Jesus , odaa niǥijoa judeutedi joǥodibatacalo wetiadi me domoǥoyokoletelogo .
Natigide , jemaa mowooǥotitiwaji Cristo me lacilo inoatawece ǥoneleegiwadi , codaa niǥina ǥoneleegiwa jiǥiniaa lacilo iwaalo , odaa Cristo lacilo baǥa Aneotedoǥoji .
Ijo eledi onietiniwace codaa monalaketiniwace , inaaǥeledi oigoetiniwace , odaa oyokoletiwece niwiloǥonaǥaxi .

Niǥina me inibeoonaǥatege niǥica ǥonaǥajegi , ele me joleeǥatibige me jotetaǥateloco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , odaa aǥejamaǥajoǥotice daǥa jotonaǥatedice Aneotedoǥoji . Niǥina me jotetaǥateloco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi liciagi niǥina ǥapileceǥe anoyate catinedi ninyoǥodi ane daǥa ika niwatece me yadeegi ninyoǥodi , igaataǥa dotetetini . Inibeoonaǥatege Niǥijoa ane dakatediwece digoida lodoe Aneotedoǥoji , micataǥa niǥijo lacilo-sacerdotitedi me dakatiobece Aneotedoǥoji liǥeladi , ixomaǥatice caticedi naǥajo lipegeteǥe epoacajo , odaa ja dakatiwece digoida lodoe Aneotedoǥoji .
Jinaǥawanitege loenataka niǥina oko ane idei nexocaǥa . Niǥinoa loenataka aǥica jaoǥate . Pida abakeni ǥanilokokenatiwaji mikeenita me beyagi loenataka niǥina oko ane idei nexocaǥa .

Inioxoadipi , jinaǥadiniliitiwage . Niǥina ane diliko , oǥoa , domige iǥoadi nioxoa , niǥini oko ja beyagi me dotaǥatibige liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji , codaa me beyagi me yowo liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji . Nige beyagi mawinitece liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji , odaa niǥida makaami aǥaleeǥoteteni niǥijoa niiǥenatakaneǥeco , pida jaǥawii makaami niǥoaǥodi niǥijoa niiǥenatakaneǥeco .
Niǥijoa lapoaco one dooze pérola . Onidatecibeci epoagi one onaniteci aca pérola . Odaa niladigodi naǥani nigotaǥa one oolo ane yapidi , ane igeditice macataǥa galaapa .

Pida Cristo baǥa daǥaxa me ǥoneǥegi caticedi okanicodaaǥica niotagi . Igaataǥa eote ijoatawece niǥijoa Aneotedoǥoji ane iiǥete meote , micataǥa niǥina nionigi ane dowediteloco diimigi . Oko baǥa ǥodiciagi niǥini diimigi , nigidioka limedi mabo ǥodaaleǥena , codaa nigidioka limedi me jinakatonaǥa mida ǥonaǥajegi ane inibeoonaǥatege .
Emaani eledi oko manitawece ǥadaaleǥena . Codaa oxaxini ane beyagi , pida oleetibige me iwitece anele .

Odaa aǥica daǥa leegi ja datalale iiǥo . Odaa onijoteci liwai niǥidiwa deez liwailidi nigotaǥa ja daa . Odaa ja nigo seete miili oko . Odaa niǥijo eledi oko ane daǥa nigo eliodi me doitibigiwaji , odaa joǥodoǥetetibigimece Aneotedoǥoji ane ideite ditibigimedi , modi me loniciweǥenigi .

Baǥa jopooǥatibige me yaxawa niǥijo oko ane libakedi meo niǥina oko me dinilakidetiwage niǥina me idoa itoataale oko ane leeditibige me dinilakidetiwage . Pida Aneotedoǥoji boǥoniniwatece , odaa ayopotedibige eledi oko me yaxawa niǥijo neǥeote ligegitetege Abraão me yajigote anele .
Odaa jeǥeetalo Pilatos , “ Igaamee ina me deǥemaani madigiti ? Aǥowooǥoti mida inaǥatetigi me ǥadikanitice , codaa mida inaǥatetigi me jiiǥenatakataǥawa metiǥadotoniteloco nicenaǥanaǥate ? ”

Niǥijo ǥoneleegiwa yalomeǥeteloco Aneotedoǥoji lotaǥanaǥaxi , niǥijo liwai anee , “ Niǥijoa liciagi niǥina waxacoco anoyadeegiticogi lodoe nematagodi , codaa liciagi niǥina waxacoco me diǥicata layaageǥegi niǥina monoxotegi , jiǥidaaǥee niǥijoa Ǥoneleegiwa me notokotedini .

Niǥijo Samuel malee yewiǥa , loiigi Israel joǥodipokota meo ane dibata oko meo me inionigi-eliodi . Odaa Aneotedoǥoji ja yajigotediogi Saul me ninionigi-eliodi , niǥijo lionigi Quis , anida aneetege licoǥegi loiigiwepodi Benjamim . Odaa cwareenta nicaaǥape Saul mijo me inionigi-eliodi .

Igaataǥa eliodi oko ane doǥoyemaa moyiwaǥadi niǥinoa lacilodi loiigi Ǥoniotagodi , oteǥexaaǥaǥa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi aǥoyiwaǥadi . Odaa oninaaletiniwace eledi oko niǥina me niiǥaxinaǥanaǥa . Liwigotigi niǥijo ane niiǥaxinaǥanaǥa idiwa judeutedi . Niǥidiwa judeutedi jeǥepaanaǥa notigimadaǥa aǥoyemaa moyiwaǥadi niǥijoa lacilodi loiigi Ǥoniotagodi .
Catinedi naǥadi niǥelate onidiwa inoatawece ane latopaco eijedi anidiwa cwaatolo loǥonaka , inoa eijedi anoyawaligeǥetinigi iiǥo le , codaa me ilaaǥaxodi .
Ja jajigo yoǥeeǥegitiogi niǥina anoniotici , liciagi ǥadoǥeeǥegitiwa , amaleeǥaǥa idioka limedi me ilaǥatiwage , digo anejinaǥa me ǥodilaǥatiwage .

Oleetibige midioka limedi moteteni niǥijoa iiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco ane jeloǥoditedaǥawa , codaa niǥina mawinitibigelogo niǥijoa niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco , iwitece micataǥa niǥina ǥowinigijegi ane inowikojoǥota . Odaa oleetibige midioka limedi manakatoni Ǥoniotagodi , me daǥamiǥitice , codaa memaani eledi oko leeǥodi me ǥadexocitege Jesus Cristo .

Onidiwa icoa seete bootitedi nelecoli , idoatawece oyatita wetiǥa lamoǥo moyoe . Onadatecibeci yalitedini onaniteci taalia liitilo ninyoǥodi . Niǥidi noiigi oibake niǥida ninyoǥodi niǥidoa bootitedi me diniwilegi lodoe Aneotedoǥoji , mina epaa lakatigi .
Pida owoo ane iǥenaǥa , odaa ikani mawii ane beyagi . Idi akaamitiwaji aniǥicoa doǥoyowooǥodi Aneotedoǥoji . Jao niǥida igegi amaleeǥaǥa anibolikitiwaji .
Yemaa midioka limedi madiniwikodenitibece , makaami okaaǥegipi , codaa me daǥakaami loidenigipi . Adinatiitiogi niǥina oko leeǥodi madinemaanitiwage .

Niǥidi oko doide Aneotedoǥoji me iloikatidi minitaǥa noledi ane daǥa ipe , axawani niǥidi oko mewi monakato Ǥoniotagodi amaleeǥaǥa iwoko niǥica noko nige iloikatidi niǥina oko abeyacaǥaǥa . Pida nigiwikodeni , niǥina baǥa adinowetitiwaji adaǥawii niǥinoa ane beyagi anowote . Oxaxini niǥinoa libeyaceǥeco . Niǥina mowo ane beyagi , micataǥa daǥa napioyaǥadi codaa me lowoodi .
Jowooǥotaǥa Aneotedoǥoji me ibake inoatawece niǥinoa ane ǥoninyaco meote aneletema niǥina oko anoyemaa Aneotedoǥoji , aneniditediogi me lionigipi , anakaa lowoogotetece .

Pida inatawece oko oyowooǥodi me iwitecetiwaji Ǥoniotagodi , odaa joaniǥidaa leeǥodi makaami inikaǥawepodi . Jemaatiwaji mida ǥadixakedi mawii anele , idiǥida ajemaa doǥowooǥotitiwaji mawii ane beyagi .

Catiwedi niǥini eledi nopegedi-le , adi aca nameeja oolo aneite moyalegi ica najidi ane liditege lanigi , codaa adi aca iwokodaǥaxi aneo me nalaǥatibigoǥoji maleekoka dinilakidetedoǥogi Aneotedoǥoji . Naǥadi iwokodaǥaxi onileǥeta oolo . Catinedi naǥadi iwokodaǥaxi ada aca boote anei moyotete ica niweenigi Aneotedoǥoji ane yajigotediogi loiigi niǥijo jotigide , anodita “ Maná ” . Codaa catinedi adiaaǥadi naǥadi iwokodaǥaxi idi niǥijo ligiilaǥadi Arão anidioka limedi me dione , icaaǥicoa itiwataale wetiadi ane liciaceekawa taaboa ane diniditelogo liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji .

Migica ane yakadi me dinabaketibece leeǥodi me iǥenaǥa ? Jowooǥotaǥa me diǥica ane yakadi ! Pida igamige leeǥodi me diǥica ane yakadi me dinabaketibece ? Leeǥodi aǥica ini ane iǥenaǥa daǥa leeǥodi me yotete liiǥenatakaneǥeco Aneotedoǥoji , pida leeǥodi me nakato Jesus , odaa ja iǥenaǥa .

Aǥiwaǥatakani mejotelogo Eiodi , codaa Eiodi miniwa meetaǥa ? ” Odaa jeǥeetediogi Jesus niǥijo anodiotibece , “ Niǥinoa anejitedaǥawatiwaji , aǥejitece emeǥee . Pida Eiodi aniniwa meetaǥa , joaneǥepaaǥeote libaketedi .

Odaa ja yatecoǥo ijo noiigi-nelegi , odaa jiǥidiaaǥite miditaǥa joǥodakapetege Paulo ijaa Silas . Odaa niǥijoa ǥoniwinoǥododi joǥodiiǥenatakatalo moyaaǥadi lowoodi Paulo ijaa Silas , odaa joǥonalaketiniwace oyatitiogi niale-libiwe .
Natigide jajigotaǥawatiwaji gela ǥaniiǥenatakaneǥegi , madinemaanitiwagetiwaji . Digo aneji me ǥademaanitiwaji , ǥadiiǥeni maǥaǥa adinemaanitiwage .

Niǥida moko aǥodigecaǥaloǥotidi niǥida ǥobakegitema Aneotedoǥoji , igaataǥa jowooǥotaǥa nige daa niǥina ǥodolaadi , odaa Aneotedoǥoji ja najigotedoǥowa eledi ǥodolaadi gela . Niǥina ǥodolaadi maleeǥejonaǥateloco niǥina iiǥo liciagi nopegedi ane daǥa leegi odaa ja daa . Pida ǥodolaadi Aneotedoǥoji anicota me najigotedoǥowa digoida ditibigimedi baǥa liciagi diimigi anele ane daǥa daa . Niǥini diimigi aǥoko loenatagi , pida Aneotedoǥoji loenatagi .
Niǥidiaaǥidi Jesus dinigetaǥatee , mee , “ Niǥina ane idadiwaǥadi , aǥemokee me idadiwaǥadi , pida aaǥaǥa eyiwaǥadi Niǥijoa ane idimonyatedinigi niǥina iiǥo .

Odaa Ananias ja niniǥodi , meetalo , “ Iniotagodi , eliodi oko onatematitiwa anini niǥini ǥoneleegiwa . Oditece icoatawece niǥicoa loenataka ane beyagi me dakapetege niǥidi anodiotaǥadici digoida nigotaǥa Jerusalém .

Igaataǥa digawini anodaaǥee niǥica oko niǥicoa nokododi : Adodigomadadi , daǥaxa moyemaa dinyeelo , codaa modi minoa nimaweneǥeco , anaǥaxakenaǥaǥa , lemaanigi moiwo eledi oko . Codaa aǥoyiwaǥadi eliododipi , aǥodiniotagodetema eledi oko , aǥodeemitetibige Aneotedoǥoji , aǥoyemaa eledi oko , oteǥexaaǥaǥa oiwikode eledi oko . Codaa owo liwitakegitigi eledi oko , adinajacaǥaditema niǥinoa lidaǥataka lolaadi ane beyagi , codaa loidenaǥa , codaa odakapetege anele . Ayakadi me jinakatonaǥa niǥina oko liciagi , yediiǥa mowo loenatagi ane beyagi anowookonaǥa . Niǥica oko odiletibige deǥeletibigiwaji caticedi eledi oko , nalokecajoli , pida baadoǥoyemaateda Aneotedoǥoji .
Leeǥodi Cristo me yeleo , odaa Aneotedoǥoji jeǥeote me ǥodeǥenaǥa . Odaa natigide aǥalee dakaketema Cristo me noǥa ica Aneotedoǥoji lélaǥatetema ǥobeyaceǥeco .

Leeǥodi me ee nebi Cristo , odaa jowooǥodi codaa ajawienataka me diǥica niweenigi ane daǥa yakadi me jelicaǥa daǥa leeǥodi moibootiogi niwicidi . Pida nigica ane diletibige diǥica niweenigi ane daǥa yakadi me jelicaǥa leeǥodi moibootiogi niwicidi , nige yeligo niǥica niweenigi , odaa ja dibatá .

Nige ajoini ǥonioxoadipi me ǥadalaki nadoneǥegi inaa niweenigi , odaa jaǥakamaǥakaami niǥica Jesus Cristo liotagi anele , leeǥodi midioka limedi mowoo notaǥa aneetece ǥotiwaǥatakaneǥegi , codaa me iwitece niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anewi , anakaa iwitece . Niǥina mowoo niiǥaxinaǥaneǥeco anewi , odaa ja ǥadiciagi niǥina oko ananiodi inoatawece nokododi me doletibige me yoniciwadi .
